scn aaFreesideCoopClarenceEncounterScript
;this script has to be seperate from the quest due to how quickly it ;needs to reach the disablePlayerControls block
short timer short timerPassedFiveSeconds = 0
Begin Gamemode
if (getStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest == 30 && GetHasNote aaFreesideCoopFirstHoseaTape == 1) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 40 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 30 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 40 1 endif
if (getStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest == 40 && timerPassedFiveSeconds != 1) PlaySound DRSMetalGarage01Open if (timer < 4) set timer to timer + getsecondspassed else showmessage aaFreesideCoopClarenceEntersSteelMill aaClarenceSteelMillRef.enable aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.enable aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.enable aaClarenceCookSteelMillDialogueTriggerRef.enable set timerPassedFiveSeconds to 1 PlaySound DRSMetalGarage01Close EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 endif endif End

scn aaRTBNcrQuestVariables
short hasQuestTriggerBeenEntered short refusedToWorkForNCR short agreedToHelp short toldRangerWilsonAboutVault23 short hoseaSurrendered short rangerWilsonHasMoved
Begin Gamemode if (aaRangerWilsonUndercoverRef.GetDead != 1 && (getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest >= 10) || aaHoseaFirstMeetingRef.GetDead == 1) aaRangerWilsonCampGolfRef.enable endif
if (getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 110) if(aaVulture01Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture02Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture03Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture04Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture05Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture06Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaDexterRef.GetDead == 1 && aaPaulaRef.GetDead == 1 && aaBethRef.GetDead == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 110 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 200 endif endif
if (getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 190) if(aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture01Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture02Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture03Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture04Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture05Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture06Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaDexterRef.GetDead == 1 && aaPaulaRef.GetDead == 1 && aaBethRef.GetDead == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 190 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 200 endif endif
if ((getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest >= 50 && getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest <= 130) || (getQuestCompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 1 && getStage aaRTBNcrQuest < 240)) if (aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1) setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 10 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 10 1 endif if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 230 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 230 1 endif if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 235 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 235 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 12 1 endif
if(aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1 && aaDexterRef.GetDead == 1 && aaPaulaRef.GetDead == 1 && aaBethRef.GetDead == 1) if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 12 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 12 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 190 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 190 1 endif if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 120 != 1 && getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 != 1) setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 120 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 120 endif endif endif
if (getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 140 || getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 250 || (getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 255 && getStage aaRTBNcrQuest >= 240)) if(aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 245 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250) setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250 0 endif setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 245 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 endif endif End

Begin OnActivate if (aaVault23ElevatorRepairQuest.hasElevatorBeenRepaired != 1) if player.getav Repair >= 50 ShowMessage aaV23ElevatorBrokenMsg set ScreenNumber to 1 elseif player.getav Repair < 50 ShowMessage aaV23ElevatorBrokenNoSkillMsg set ScreenNumber to 0 endif elseif (aaVault23ElevatorRepairQuest.hasElevatorBeenRepaired == 1) ShowMessage aaV23ElevatorWorkingMsg set ScreenNumber to 2 endif End

scn aaVault23ControlPodScript ;See V112 for generic setup.
short mode ref myLink
Begin OnActivate player if (IsActionRef player == 1) if (aaFirewaterBunkerPowerTurnedOn.isPowerTurnedOn == 1) if (player.getItemCount aaVault23AccessPass >= 1) set myLink to getLinkedRef ;the linked ref should be the door. if ((myLink.getOpenState == 3) || (myLink.getOpenState == 1)) && mode != 2 ;door closed or open playgroup Forward 0 ;pull handle out set mode to 2 activate myLink ;activate all the things that this is an activate parent of - klaxon light and activator. setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 120 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 110 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 120 1 endif else showmessage aaVault23OpenMainDoorWithoutKeycardMsg endif else showmessage aaFirewaterBunkerPowerMessage endif endif end
Begin GameMode
if (mode == 2) if (isAnimPlaying == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef ;the linked ref should be the door. playgroup Left 1 ;pull handle down set mode to 3 myLink.activate player endif endif
end

scn aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogueVariables
short gaveVault23PlansToHosea float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled short haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender
Begin Gamemode
if(gaveVault23PlansToHosea == 1) if(hasFadedOut != 1) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent set hasFadedOut to 1 endif if(controlsReenabled != 1 || hasFadedIn != 1) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed if (timer >= 5 && hasFadedIn != 1) RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX set hasFadedIn to 1 endif if (timer >= 11 && controlsReenabled != 1) aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.SetRestrained 0 EnablePlayerControls aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.StartConversation Player, aaHoseaReadVault23Plans set controlsReenabled to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveForceDialogueScript
short eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered
Begin OnTrigger player if (eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered != 1) if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 240) DisablePlayerControls ;four different force greets
;status quo if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 240 && getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 140) ;status quo - vultures alive ncr alive, wilson force greets and tells player to make choice. Player told Vultures' location earlier if (aaRTBNcrQuest.toldRangerWilsonAboutVault23 == 1) aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueStatusQuoToldWhereHoseaWasEarlier set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 else ;status quo - vultures alive ncr alive, wilson force greets and tells player to make choice. Player did not tell Vultures location earlier aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueStatusQuoDidNotTellWhereHoseaWasEarlier set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 endif endif endif
; hosea dead if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 245) DisablePlayerControls aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueHoseaDead set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 endif
;hosea surrendered if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 250) DisablePlayerControls if(aaRTBNcrQuest.hoseaSurrendered == 1) aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueHoseaSurrender set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 endif endif endif End

scn aaRTBTheVulturesQuestKillNCRUpdateScript
; most of the quest updating logic is contained within dialogue and different triggers in the different places the player is asked to visit
short hasRangerWilsonBeenKilled short givenVulturesLights
Begin Gamemode
if (getstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 145) if (aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.getDead == 1) setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 1 set hasRangerWilsonBeenKilled to 1 endif endif
End

scn aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogueVariables
short wilsonHasSurrendered float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled
Begin Gamemode
if(wilsonHasSurrendered == 1) if(hasFadedOut != 1) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent set hasFadedOut to 1 endif if(controlsReenabled != 1 || hasFadedIn != 1) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed if (timer >= 5 && hasFadedIn != 1) aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.disable RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX set hasFadedIn to 1 endif if (timer >= 11 && controlsReenabled != 1) EnablePlayerControls aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.StartConversation Player, aaHoseaReadVault23Plans set controlsReenabled to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn aaHoseaSurrenderScript
short hoseaSurrendered float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled
Begin Gamemode
if(hoseaSurrendered == 1) if(hasFadedOut != 1) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent set hasFadedOut to 1 endif if(controlsReenabled != 1 || hasFadedIn != 1) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed if (timer >= 5 && hasFadedIn != 1) aaVulture01Ref.disable aaVulture02Ref.disable aaVulture03Ref.disable aaVulture04Ref.disable aaVulture05Ref.disable aaVulture06Ref.disable aaPaulaRef.disable aaDexterRef.disable aaBethRef.disable aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.disable aaFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveRef.disable aaVulture01Ref.MarkForDelete aaVulture02Ref.MarkForDelete aaVulture03Ref.MarkForDelete aaVulture04Ref.MarkForDelete aaVulture05Ref.MarkForDelete aaVulture06Ref.MarkForDelete aaPaulaRef.MarkForDelete aaDexterRef.MarkForDelete aaBethRef.MarkForDelete aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.MarkForDelete aaFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveRef.MarkForDelete aaFirewaterCaveSewerLidRef.lock 255 aaFirewaterBunkerDoorRef.lock 255 player.removeItem aaFirewaterBunkerAccessCard 1 RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX set hasFadedIn to 1 endif if (timer >= 11 && controlsReenabled != 1) EnablePlayerControls set controlsReenabled to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn aaStartRaceToTheBottomScript
short DoOnceMessage float StartTimer short bTeleportOut
Begin Gamemode
; if Radio New Vegas is enabled, it means the player has completed chargen and has exited Doc Mitchell's house. if ( DoOnceMessage == 0 ) if (RNVTARef.GetDisabled == 0) set DoOnceMessage to 1 set StartTimer to 30 endif
elseif ( DoOnceMessage == 1 ) if ( StartTimer <= 0 ) set bTeleportOut to 1; ShowMessage aaRaceToTheBottomDownloadMessage set DoOnceMessage to 1 ResetPipboyManager Set DoOnceMessage to -1 SetStage aaStartRaceToTheBottomModQuest 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed aaStartRaceToTheBottomModQuest 0 1 else set StartTimer to ( StartTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif End

ESP.ORIGINAL: Billy Jackson's Diary
ESP.TRADUIT: 比利·杰克逊的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid says he wants to leave town. Says this place is a deadend. Can't say I disagree with him, hoping he won't end up like me. Although, its a rough world out there. The Wasteland will chew him up and spit him out if he's not careful. Said he wanted to become a mercenary once he can afford a rifle. Good money in that but those boys are no joke. Told him to consider doing something else, like joining the Followers or something. Broke my heart when he told me to go fuck myself. I'm going to need to visit that motel near McCarran, try and talk some sense into him at some point. I don't know if I'm ready...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那孩子说他想离开这里，说这个地方是个死胡同。我不能说我不同意他的观点，希望他不会像我一样的下场。虽然外面的世界很残酷，如果他不小心，废土会把他嚼碎吐出来。他说，一旦他买得起步枪，就想当一名雇佣兵。这方面的收入不错，但那些人可不是闹着玩的。我告诉他考虑做点别的，比如加入天启追随者之类的。当他叫我去死的时候，我的心都碎了。我得去麦卡伦营地附近的那个汽车旅馆看看，找个时间劝劝他。我不知道我是否准备好了...

ESP.ORIGINAL: El Rey Motel Terminal Password
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃尔·雷汽车旅馆终端密码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sug4rB0mbz!
Managed to get admin privileges...
ESP.TRADUIT: 设法获取了管理员权限...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that was way easier than I expected. Pre war security really was a joke. Turns out they were accidently logging the password to the server. Managed to hop onto the box from here since they've gave this machine access past the firewall. This should be a good place to keep a quick journal of the job. Keeping a timestamp so Ella knows how hard this job gets. Might be able to barter a few extra caps out of it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这比我预期中容易多了。战前的安全真的是个笑话，原来是他们意外地记录了服务器的密码。由于他们给了这台机器穿过防火墙的权限，所以设法从这里跳到盒子上。这应该是一个快速记录工作的好地方。保持一个时间戳，这样艾拉就知道这个工作有多难。也许可以用它来交换一些额外的瓶盖......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journey south of Repconn...
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞普康南部之旅...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Pretty good haul today. Had a look in those houses just south of Repconn HQ (I left that shithole as soon as I seen the pile of corpses by the entrance. No way Jose). The houses seemed abandoned. Might be account of the prison breakout I keep hearing about or the deathclaws that have moved into the quarry. Had plenty of pre war food stockpiled. Salisbury Steak, Sugar Bombs. Jackpot.
Need to be careful though. Pretty sure I'm being followed. Someone watching me from that old steel factory near the old rock crushing plant through binoculars. Seen him in Freeside too. Keeping my gun under the pillow tonight...
ESP.TRADUIT:
今天收获颇丰。在Repconn总部南边的那些房子里看了看（我一看到门口的一堆尸体就离开了那个鬼地方。没办法，何塞）。那些房子似乎被遗弃了，可能是我一直听说的越狱事件或者是采石场死亡爪的原因。有很多战前的食物储备，肉汁汉堡排，糖衣炸弹麦片。头奖。
不过还是要小心，我很确定有人在跟踪我。有人在碎岩场附近的旧钢铁厂用望远镜看着我。我在自由之城也见过他。今晚把我的枪放在枕头下...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea Holotape 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿全息磁带 1

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shortcut
ESP.TRADUIT: 捷径

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jackie,
Read this carefully you little shit. This is the final time I'm warning you. Don't lose the key to this door again. We just barely found it last time. Why on earth did you hide it behind "the stalagmite"? We're in a cave you fucking moron.
Holton
ESP.TRADUIT:
杰姬，
仔细阅读这个，你这个小混蛋。这是我最后一次警告你，别再把这扇门的钥匙丢了，上次我们好不容易才找到。你到底为什么要把它藏在“石笋”后面？我们在山洞里，你个该死的白痴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rubber Dinosaur Programming
ESP.TRADUIT: 橡胶恐龙编程

ESP.ORIGINAL: In software engineering, rubber dinosaur debugging is a method of debugging code. The name is a reference to a story in which a programmer would carry around a rubber dinosaur and debug their code by forcing themselves to explain it, line-by-line, to the prehistoric reptile. Many other terms exist for this technique, often involving different (usually) inanimate objects, or pets such as a dog or a cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在软件工程中，橡胶恐龙调试是一种调试代码的方法。这个名字指的是一个故事，在这个故事中，程序员会带着一只橡胶恐龙，通过强迫自己向这种史前爬行动物逐行解释来调试他们的代码。这种技术还有许多其他术语，通常涉及不同的（通常是）无生命的物体，或宠物，如狗或猫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Place For Bootlickers
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有马屁精的地方

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The NCR is not welcome in Vegas. Their system of governance is broken and all those who uphold it are part of the problem. That system is our enemy, not the small business owners, workers and not even the soldiers who fight us. The problem is that these people are so devoted to the idea of the old world that they'll die to defend it. Until they understand that the very thing they're upholding and the problems it causes, we, the Vultures, are happy to oblige them. Any bootlickers are welcome to join them.
To the people of Vegas. Here's our gift to you. The food grown on Vegas land, from our soil, we give back to their rightful owners. You no longer need to be intimidated by the Hawthornes and their thugs into working with them. We'll protect your land from those parasites if you aid us. Soon, it won't just be the scraps we scavenge or that which the NCR gives out of pity. We can defeat this two headed beast together.
The Vultures
ESP.TRADUIT:
维加斯不欢迎NCR。他们的治理体系已经崩溃，所有维护这个体系的人都是问题的一部分。这个制度是我们的敌人，而不是那些小企业主、工人，甚至不是那些与我们作战的士兵。问题是，这些人如此执着于旧世界的观念，以至于他们愿意为捍卫旧世界而死。在他们明白他们所维护的东西及其引发的问题之前，我们，秃鹫，很乐意为他们效劳。欢迎任何马屁精加入他们。
致拉斯维加斯的人们，这是我们送给你们的礼物。在维加斯土地上生长的食物，来自我们的土壤，我们把它们还给它们的合法主人。很快，这就不仅仅是我们捡来的残羹剩饭，也不仅仅是NCR出于怜悯而施舍的食物。我们可以一起打败这个双头兽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 23 - Electronic Key Cards Guidelines
ESP.TRADUIT: 23号避难所 - 电子密钥指南

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This Vault Tec and Poseidon Energy joint facility uses state of the art physical security technology in order to ensure resident safety and efficient business practices.
In order to enter and exit the facility, enter their rooms and to operate certain equipment, employees must carry the keycard granted to them during registration.
There are five levels of access:
1. Visitor 2. Junior Staff 3. Intermediate Staff 4. Senior Staff 5. Executive Staff
Authentication is granted based on an electronic chip within the keycard. Each keycard communicates wirelessly with the central server when held within vicinity of the control panel of the appropriate doors and with the appropriate pieces of technology. Employees are expected to be wary of the presence of potential tailgating actors.
Visitor wristbands can be given to family members of residents before Vault closure. Please enquire at the administration wing for further details on registering their status as a Vault resident.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个避难所科技和海神能源的联合设施采用了最先进的物理安全技术，以确保居民的安全和有效的商业行为。
为了进出设施，进入他们的房间和操作某些设备，员工必须携带登记时授予他们的密钥。
有五个级别的访问权限:
1. 访客 2. 初级人员 3. 中级人员 4. 高级人员 5. 行政人员
认证是根据密钥内的电子芯片进行的。每张密钥在靠近适当的门的控制面板时，通过适当的技术与中央服务器进行无线通信。员工应警惕潜在的尾随者的存在。
访客腕带可以在避难所关闭前发给住户的家属。请向行政楼询问有关登记为避难所居民的进一步细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 23 All Clear Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 23号避难所 - 完全清除通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Following a nuclear event, Vault-Tec will monitor hazards such as radiation levels, enemy invasion, subsequent attacks, and other factors. Once conditions are deemed safe, this terminal will receive an all-clear notice.
Upon receiving the all-clear notice, Vault-Tec personnel may be evacuated at Mr Reeves' discretion. Disregard any notices from organizations or individuals not associated with Vault-Tec or Poseidon Energy, including government and military.
Build a better future with Vault-Tec!
ESP.TRADUIT:
在核事件发生后，避难所公司将监测诸如辐射水平、敌人入侵、后续攻击和其他因素等危害。一旦条件被认为是安全的，这个终端将收到一个完全清除的通知。
在收到完全清除通知后，避难所科技的人员可以根据雷韦斯先生的决定进行疏散。不要理会任何与避难所科技或海神能源无关的组织或个人的通知，包括政府和军队。
与避难所科技一起建立一个更好的未来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: To The Merc Who Has Been Hunting Me
ESP.TRADUIT: 给一直在追捕我的雇佣兵

ESP.ORIGINAL: For The Last Time, Leave Me Alone...
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一次，别来烦我...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Jesse
I regret to inform you that I'm not interested in joining your merry band of assholes. I've never heard of an endeavour so purely Unamerican in my entire life. Mr Reeves has been nothing but good to us by providing us with this opportunity. If memory serves me right, you'd be a pile of ash out there if it wasn't for him. Left to die with no Geiger counter to tell you how long you have left. Now, with all that said, I'm sure you understand my choice. Now would you kindly fuck off with your commie propaganda?
From/ Bill
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：杰西
我很遗憾地告诉你我没兴趣加入你们这群混蛋。在我的一生中，我从未听说过如此不符合美国特色的努力。里夫斯先生为我们提供了这次机会，他对我们很好。如果我没记错的话，如果不是他，你现在已经是一堆灰烬了，只能死在没有盖革计数器告诉你还剩多久的地方。说了这么多，我相信你理解我的选择。现在请你带着你的共产主义宣传滚蛋好吗？
- 比尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd Like To Report A Crime
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想报告一个犯罪事件

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Security Chief Holloway
Hi, I'd like to report a crime and one of your robots told me to put in a ticket via the Vault mailing system. Jesse Cooper is trying to organise us workers against Mr Reeves. I told him we wouldn't be anywhere without the boss and told him where to shove it. Cooper is in it for himself and I thought security would be interested to know what he's up to.
Thank you Bill Fitzpatrick
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：安全主任霍洛威
你好，我想举报一个犯罪行为，你们的一个机器人让我通过避难所邮寄系统放一张票进去。杰西·库珀正试图组织我们这些工人反对雷韦斯先生。我告诉他，没有老板，我们哪里也去不了，并告诉他，让他见鬼去吧吧。库珀是为了他自己，我想保安会有兴趣知道他的目的。
谢谢你， - 比尔·菲茨帕特里克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank You For Your Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您的报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Bill
NOTE: This is an automated reply.
Thank you for your report citizen. A moderator will analyze the ticket and get back to you in three to five working days.
Thank You Security Office Holloway
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：比尔
注：这是一个自动回复。
谢谢您的报告，公民。版主会在3到5个工作日内分析并回复您。
谢谢你， 霍洛威安保办公室

ESP.ORIGINAL: Join The Vault 23 Union
ESP.TRADUIT: 加入23号避难所工会

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Bill
I know we haven't always seen eye to eye but at the end of the day, you are one of us. Reeves is taking advantage of you as much as he is of us. I've worked for years in the agricultural wing and I'm telling you that these rations he's providing us with are a joke. Sure, we'll never have the same overabundance we did as when the Vault door first closed but something is fishy with the numbers. I know for certain we grow more than what's being given out to us. Its obvious he's using this ration system as leverage to make us work more hours. Have you noticed the people working non-contractual overtime are getting more ration tickets? This is not sustainable if we want to thrive down here.
The truth that he doesn't want us to know is that he needs us more than we need him. We can leverage a better deal if we all just organise. What's he gonna do when there's no food growing? Consider my offer at least, we need someone with your combat experience in our corner.
From/ Jesse
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：比尔
我知道我们的看法并不总是一致，但说到底，你是我们中的一员。雷韦斯在利用你，就像他在利用我们一样。我在农业部门工作多年，我告诉你，他为我们提供的这些口粮简直是个笑话。当然，我们永远不会像避难所大门刚关闭时那样拥有过剩的粮食，但这些数字有问题。我可以肯定的是，我们种植的东西比提供给我们的要多。很明显，他在利用这个配给系统作为筹码，让我们工作更多的时间。你有没有注意到，那些不按合同约定加班的人拿到的配给票越来越多？如果我们想要生存下来，这种做法是不可持续的。
他不想让我们知道的真相是，他需要我们多于我们需要他。如果我们都能组织起来，我们就能达成更好的协议。没有了粮食生长，他能怎么办？至少考虑一下我的提议，我们需要一个像你这样有战斗经验的人。
- 杰西

ESP.ORIGINAL: Appointment With Mr Reeves
ESP.TRADUIT: 与雷韦斯先生的约定

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Dr Williams
Hi doctor, I'd like to arrange an appointment. I'm sure you have a big waiting list but I feel this is urgent. I'd like you to come to my office next thing early tomorrow morning. Try and avoid any of the workers seeing you. Wouldn't want them worry about my health.
Thanks Mr Reeves
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：威廉姆斯医生
嗨，医生，我想安排一次预约。我相信你有一个很长的等待名单，但我觉得这很紧急，我希望你明天一早就到我的办公室来。尽量避免任何工人看到你，我不想让他们担心我的健康。
谢谢你， - 雷韦斯先生

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like the autospy report
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要尸检报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Dr Williams
Doctor, I'd like the report on the autopsy as soon as you have it. Do not let this get out. I would like to avoid a riot from Cooper's supporters. That would put all of us in danger which I'm sure you already realise.
Security Chief Holloway
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：威廉姆斯医生
医生，我希望你一拿到尸检报告就马上给我。不要让这事传出去，我想避免库珀的支持者发生骚乱。那会使我们所有人都处于危险之中，我相信你已经意识到了。
- 安全主任霍洛威

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reply to I'd like the autospy report
ESP.TRADUIT: 回复：我想要尸检报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Security Chief Holloway
I'm sorry but ethically I cannot comply with your request. It violates everything I learned from my time as a student. The truth deserves to be heard no matter how inconvenient. Cooper's family deserve to know.
Dr Williams
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：安全主任霍洛威
我很抱歉，但从道德上讲，我不能满足你的要求。这违反了我从学生时代学到的一切。不管有多麻烦，真相都应该被听到。库珀的家人有权知道。
- 威廉姆斯医生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Appointment With Mr Reeves
ESP.TRADUIT: 与雷韦斯先生的约定

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Mr Reeves
Sure thing sir. Expect me at your quarters around 4AM.
Thanks Dr Williams
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：雷韦斯先生
当然，先生。凌晨4点左右在你的住处等我。
谢谢你， - 威廉姆斯医生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome New Engineer
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎新工程师

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jenni,
Hello, I thought I'd take time out my day to congratulate you on your promotion from Junior to a fully qualified engineer. I do this as a thank you for all your hard work last year. I'll send some engineers round to upgrade the lock as soon as their schedule permits. Keep up the hard work and I see more promotions in your future.
Mr Reeves
ESP.TRADUIT:
詹妮,
你好，我想花点时间祝贺你从初级晋升为一名完全合格的工程师，我这样做是为了感谢你去年的努力工作。只要他们的日程安排允许，我就会派一些工程师去升级锁。继续努力工作，我相信你将来会得到更多的晋升。
- 雷韦斯先生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Office Closed
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生办公室关闭

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I regret to inform you that all medical services will be put on hold until we train up some new people. Doctor Williams exposed himself as a communist traitor and I do not feel that his values align with those of the company. It is because of this that we must part ways with the doctor. Thank you for your understanding and patience. Keep up the hard work everyone!
Mr Reeves
ESP.TRADUIT:
我很遗憾地通知你，所有的医疗服务将被搁置，直到我们培训出一些新人。威廉姆斯医生暴露了自己是一个共产主义叛徒，我觉得他的价值观与团队的价值观不一致。正因为如此，我们必须与这位医生分道扬镳。感谢你们的理解和耐心，大家继续努力工作吧！
- 雷韦斯先生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come over please
ESP.TRADUIT: 请过来

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Ann
Please come over. My mom's at the diner for the night on a date. We've got the room to ourselves. She won't find out.
From Chris
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：安
请过来，我妈今晚在餐厅约会，房间里只有我们两个人。她不会发现的。
- 克里斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come over please
ESP.TRADUIT: 请过来

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Ann
Ah well, thought I'd at least try my luck. Maybe next time ;)
From Chris
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：安
啊好吧，我想我至少该试试运气。也许下次吧：）
- 克里斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ All
I'm inviting you, yes YOU, to invite the Vault 23 union. Mr Reeves is taking advantage of our labour and we deserve to be paid our worth. We do not deserve to be paid in minor rations while he and his partner eat what they want in their fancy suite. We will get everyone a fair deal but in order to do so we must stand TOGETHER!
From/ Jesse
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：安
我邀请你，是的，邀请你加入23号避难所工会。雷韦斯先生正在利用我们的劳动力，我们应该得到我们的价值。我们不应该在他和他的伙伴在他们的豪华套房里随心所欲吃东西的时候得到微薄的口粮。我们会让每个人都得到公平的待遇，但为了做到这一点，我们必须站在一起！
- 杰西

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come over please
ESP.TRADUIT: 请过来

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Chris
Sorry I can't. I've got homework to do. I really need to pass this engineering test tomorrow. Its my last shot.
From Ann
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：克里斯
对不起，我来不了，我有家庭作业要做。我真的需要通过明天的工程考试，这是我最后的机会了。
- 安

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE - PLEASE DO NOT REPLY DIRECTLY TO THIS EMAIL]
A Security Officer will be visiting you tomorrow for suspicious activity. Please do not resist. Any attempts will be met with force.
ESP.TRADUIT:
[这是一条自动信息 - 请不要直接回复此邮件]
明天将有一名安保人员因可疑活动而访问你。请不要抵抗，任何企图都将遭到武力打击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got to stick together
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须团结一致

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Jesse
I'm with you Jesse, what happened to Kyle was the last straw for me. I'm done risking my life to keep this vault running only to get those shitty Dandy Boy Apples as a reward. Those ants can chew into the cables all they want as long as they're not chewing on my ass.
From Oliver
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：杰西
我支持你，杰西，凯尔的遭遇让我忍无可忍。我受够了冒着生命危险维持避难所运转却只为了得到那些烂苹果作为奖励。那些蚂蚁想怎么咬电缆都可以只要它们不咬我的屁股。
- 奥利弗

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Jesse
Count me in Jesse. My ma's leukemia is getting worse but the boss has told us she isn't a key worker. Fucking heartless bastard. If you can guarantee her treatment then I'm there.
From Cassandra
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：杰西
算我一个，杰西。我妈的白血病越来越严重了，但是老板告诉我们她不是关键员工，该死的没心没肺的混蛋。如果你能保证她的治疗，我就去。
- 卡珊德拉

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Jesse
Sorry I can't risk it. I've got a family to worry about. I don't want anything to do with work politics. I just want to get paid to see my kids grow up.
From Lauren
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：杰西
抱歉我不能冒这个险，我还有家人要担心呢。我不想和职场政治扯上任何关系，我只是想赚钱看我的孩子长大。
- 劳伦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To/ Jesse
Let me think about it. Its very risky for me as you well know. I know what Reeves' henchmen are capable of. My brother is never coming back. But I've got a wife to worry about.
From Terry
ESP.TRADUIT:
致：杰西
让我想想。这对我来说很危险，你知道的。我知道雷韦斯的爪牙能做什么，我哥哥再也不会回来了。但我还有老婆要操心。
- 特里

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The most popular wattage for hydroponic bulbs is between 400-600 Watts. Most hydro gardeners use High-Intensity Discharge (HID) lights. HID bulbs produce light by sending an arc of electricity between two electrodes that are encased in glass with a mixture of gas and metal salts. The gas aids the creation of the arc, which then evaporates the metal salts, producing bright white light.
The Vault Tec 485W bulb is optimised for both growth and power consumption. It can be combined with a renewable source of electricity such as that of Lake Mead to create a sustainable method of agriculture underground. It is advised to leave the lights on for 12-15 hours per day for optimal results for growth.
ESP.TRADUIT:
水培灯泡最受欢迎的功率在400-600瓦之间。大多数水培园丁使用高强放电（HID）灯。HID灯泡通过在两个电极之间发送电弧来产生光线，这两个电极被包裹在玻璃中，里面是气体和金属盐的混合物。这种气体有助于产生电弧，电弧蒸发金属盐，产生明亮的白光。
避难所科技485W灯泡在生长和耗电方面都进行了优化。它可以与米德湖等可再生能源相结合，创造一种可持续的地下农业方法。建议每天开着灯12-15小时，以获得最佳的生长效果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALERT: This wing has been locked down due to hostile action by dissidents. Please remain calm while the security team deals with the situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警报：由于持不同政见者的敌对行动，这里已经被封锁了。请保持冷静，安全小组正在处理这一情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Year: 2076

I'm glad construction has finally finished. This contract will be enough to keep our bellies full without having to send my platoon to the front lines. I think Elsa will be happy that Mr Reeves has accepted our invitation to dinner. I'm more than happy to thank that man. I'm just happy that I haven't disappointed her. She was very skeptical when I made the decision to go private, which in all honesty, so was I. I could never have dreamed of getting offered this position. Guess two decades of command experience paid off in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴施工终于完成了，这份合同足以让我们填饱肚子不用派我的队伍去前线。我想埃尔莎会很高兴雷韦斯先生接受了我们的晚餐邀请，我非常乐意感谢那个人，我只是很高兴我没有让她失望。当我做出私有化的决定时，她非常怀疑，说实话，我也是，我做梦都想不到会得到这个职位。看来二十年的指挥经验终于有了回报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Year: 2079

Doctor Reed told me I should start writing down my thoughts. Said it might help. I'm sure he means well but I've never really been good at sharing my feelings, even if this is just for me to read personally. Honestly what's even the point any more. Everythings fucked. My men are fucked, skins falling off their face with how crazy the Muller Counters are clicking. Radio fucking silence.
No matter how many times I talk about it I still can't get over that two faced prick. We were supposed to be secure just like them. Must not offer value. He's always been the ideal American hasn't he?
ESP.TRADUIT:
里德医生告诉我，我应该把自己的想法写下来，他说可能会有帮助。我相信他是好意，但我从来都不善于分享我的感受，即使这只是为了我个人阅读。说实话，现在还有什么意义呢，一切都完了。我的人都完蛋了，他们的皮都掉下来了，盖革米勒计数器的声音太疯狂了。无线电他妈的沉默了。？
不管我说了多少次，我还是无法忘记那个两面派的混蛋。我们本来应该像他们一样安全，不能提供价值。他一直都是理想的美国人，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Year: 2085
That's it settled. We're gonna unseal the bunker and start exploring whatever's out there. Radiation is getting in anyway. We're running out of food. What option do we have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样决定了。我们要打开地堡开始探索外面的东西，反正辐射还是会进来。我们的食物快吃完了，我们有什么选择呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Year: ????
jgdffjnfn mjfeff fafbafn ffhegnfnvn nmskkl fgbff cxc zv rerq
Thank You For Your Purchase Of A Vault Tec Vault
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您购买避难所科技避难所

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Thank you for being our valued customer. We hope our Vault Tec Vault will meet your expectations. Let us know if you have any questions.
Vault Tec
ESP.TRADUIT:
感谢您成为我们宝贵的客户。我们希望我们的避难所科技避难所能够满足您的期望。如果您有任何问题，请告诉我们。
- 避难所科技

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've got to say I'm shocked at just how productive we've been ever since we went underground. It makes we wish we made the move sooner. All we would've had to have done is pay for their healthcare, food, water and tuition in return for their services. Honestly the amount of growth we would've seen would have blown everyone's mind.
Either way, there's no point thinking about lost opportunities. We've got a bright future ahead of us in this Vault. Best part is that I don't ever need to eat any canned garbage like they recommended in those government presentations.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不得不说，我对我们转入地下后的工作效率感到震惊，这让我们希望我们能更早地做出这个决定。我们所要做的就是支付他们的医疗保健、食物、水和学费，作为对他们服务的回报。说实话，我们看到的增长数量会让每个人都大吃一惊。
无论如何，思考失去的机会是没有意义的。我们在这个避难所里有一个光明的未来。最棒的是，我不需要像那些政府报告中建议的那样吃任何罐装垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expenses are down...
ESP.TRADUIT: 开支下降...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expenses are down and productivity is up from the days before we arrived here. I don't need to pay wages anymore. Just the food that the workers grow to feed themselves. I also don't need to pay for lawyers to find the right loophole to stop those thieves in the government. This really is the good life. My own little Kingdom and with Anna as my queen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与我们来到这里之前的日子相比，支出减少了，生产力提高了。我不需要再支付工资了，只要工人们种植的食物可以养活自己。我也不需要花钱请律师去寻找合适的漏洞来阻止政府中的那些小偷。这真的是美好的生活，我自己的小王国，安娜是我的王后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Made a deal with the doctor...
ESP.TRADUIT: 与医生达成了协议...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anna is really worried about my leg. Doesn't matter how many times I've told her it'll pass she won't listen. The swelling has came and gone the last few years and has never really been a problem. I've put an appointment on with the doctor just to prove to her I'm right. He'll be coming to my quarters early tomorrow morning. I can't let the workers think me incapable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安娜真的很担心我的腿，不管我跟她说过多少次都会过去的她就是不听。在过去的几年里，肿胀时有发生，也时有消失，从来没有真正成为一个问题。我和医生约好了见面，只是为了向她证明我是对的，他明天一大早会到我的住处来。我不能让工人们认为我无能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That rabble rouser Cooper has been at it again. First it was about the quality of the corn he was getting and then it was the amount the very next week. Now, he won't shut the hell up about the overtime him and his crew have had to work. Do they not understand that if the work is not done we will all starve? Holloway needs to have a chat with that young man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个煽动者库珀又来了。首先是他收获的玉米的质量，然后是下个星期的数量。现在，他还在喋喋不休地说他和他的手下加班加点。难道他们不明白，如果工作不完成，我们都会挨饿吗？霍洛威需要和那个年轻人好好谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meds are running low...
ESP.TRADUIT: 药物不足了...

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've had to start rationing meds. Treatment for radiation poisoning included. I've had to limit the use of RadAway to those who are essential to the running of Vault 23. This includes myself, my family and the heads of each department. The long term plan is to find a way to synthesize what we need using the technology we already have. I know this is possible if everyone is willing to put in the time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不得不开始定量配给药物，包括治疗辐射中毒。我不得不将辐特宁的使用限制在那些对运行23号避难所至关重要的人身上。这包括我自己，我的家人和每个部门的领导。长期计划是找到一种方法，利用我们已经拥有的技术来合成我们需要的东西。我知道这是可能的，如果每个人都愿意投入时间！

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've forgotten your pass Holloway...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你忘了你的通行证霍洛威...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Holloway if you've forgotten your pass again, you've already done it twice this month, go to the good doctor. He said he'll let you use his pass. Stop by his dorm and be kind to the man. He's under a lot of stress these days.
Mr Reeves
ESP.TRADUIT:
霍洛威，如果你又忘了你的通行证，这个月你已经两次了，去看医生吧，他说他会让你用他的通行证。去他的宿舍看看，对他好一点，他这些天压力很大的。
- 雷韦斯先生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Food rationing requirements...
ESP.TRADUIT: 食品配给要求...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would've thought running this place would have got easier over the years. Damn, was I wrong. Food rationing starts tomorrow and I'm not sure how everyone will handle it. It's going to follow the same priority system we used with the meds. I'm sure it'll piss off Jesse Cooper and his crew but fortunately for us not many people like that lot. We've got to ride this out until we're able to expand our crop growth facilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为这么多年来经营这里会更容易，该死的，我错了。明天开始实行食品配给，我不确定每个人会如何应对，这将遵循我们在药品上使用的优先原则。我相信这会惹恼杰西·库珀和他的手下，但幸运的是没有多少人喜欢他们。我们必须渡过难关，直到我们能够扩大我们的作物种植设施。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holloway needs to deal with the situation...
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍洛威需要处理好这种情况...

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is getting out of hand. That fool Holloway wasn't supposed to make a martyr out of him. This is unsustainable, we'll all starve unless he gets this in order. Its fucking chaos down here. I need him to go and crack some skulls and get those bastards back in line or I'll have to find someone else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事有点失控了。霍洛威这个傻瓜不应该让他成为殉道者，这是不可持续的，我们都会饿死的，除非他能解决这个问题。这里他妈的太乱了，我要他去敲碎那些混蛋的脑袋让他们乖乖听话，否则我就得另找别人了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 23 - You don't need a password for this senior door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 23号避难所 - 这扇高级门不需要密码。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Phil, for the last time you don't need a fucking password if you already have a senior card. That password you use for everything is now visible in the logs. If you're gonna name your password after one of the women in one of those porno mags then try not to type it into a monitored terminal. Now all the engineers know what you're into hahahahahaha! Jesus H. Christ. Think about how embarrassed your wife will be if she hears about this.
For the last time, the CORRECT password is a communal one. I'm glad we didn't let you choose it. Thank god. Next time you forget, just bring your senior card.
ESP.TRADUIT:
菲尔，最后说一次，如果你已经有了一张高级卡，你就不需要他妈的密码了。你用的那个密码现在在日志中是可见的，如果你要用那些色情杂志中的一个女人的名字来命名你的密码，那么尽量不要在有监控的终端上输入。现在所有的工程师都知道你在做什么了，哈哈哈哈哈！上帝啊。想想如果你的妻子听到这件事，她会多么尴尬。
最后说一次，正确的密码是公用密码。我很高兴我们没让你选，感谢上帝。下次你忘记了，就带着你的高级卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry stranger, I'm not feeling too great at the moment. Talk to Clive if you want small talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，陌生人，我现在感觉不是很好。如果你想闲聊，可以和克里弗谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conroy [010039F0] (mod) Quest : ([010042B9]aaFreesideCoopConroyDialogue) 010042B9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleOldUniqueConroy\aaFreeside_GREETING_000042BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Freeside Co-op. Haven't seen your face around here before. You a newcomer in town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到自由城合作社。以前没有在这里看到过你的脸，你是城里的新来者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : First time greeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_GREETING_00000EAC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. At this rate you'll be a regular. What can I get ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。照这样下去，你会成为常客的。你想要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_GREETING_00000EAF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back to the hub of grub. What can I get ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回到食品的中心。我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_GREETING_00000EB0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not welcome here. Get out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里不欢迎你，滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you looking at? Can't a man get a drink in this town without some clown trying to start some small talk. What is it you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在看什么？在这城里，男人要想喝上一杯肯定会有小丑来跟你搭讪。你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_GREETING_00001D0F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again. What is it you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_GREETING_00001D10_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey stranger, welcome to Camp Mccarran. You're welcome to enter the grounds as long as you're on your best behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，陌生人，欢迎来到麦卡伦营地。只要你表现良好，我们欢迎你进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_GREETING_00003CD8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is a military camp. We've got enough on our plate with the Fiends in the area. Still, we don't take too kindly to troublemaking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是个军营，这一带的恶魔帮已经够我们忙的了。不过，我们对制造麻烦的人可不会太宽容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_GREETING_00003CD8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we're clear, otherwise you're gonna end up real familiar with an NCR service rifle rather than a cell like you might expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们说清楚了，否则你就得熟悉一把NCR制式步枪而不是你想象中的牢房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_GREETING_00003CD8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that out the way, how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说了这么多，我有什么可以帮你的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_GREETING_00003CD8_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good riddance that Fitz is dead. One less scumbag in the area. Anyway, what can I do to help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好费茨死了，这个地区又少了一个人渣。我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_GREETING_00006E6A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're back. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你回来了，我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_GREETING_00006E6B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy stranger. Haven't seen you around these parts before. Maybe you can you spare a few caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好陌生人，以前没在这见过你。你能给我几个瓶盖吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_GREETING_00003FC2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Fitz dead, hopefully Conroy can get his act together. Maybe we can go see Doc Usanagi now if we get enough caps. Anyway, how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 费茨死了，希望康罗伊能振作起来。如果我们有足够的瓶盖，也许我们现在可以去看看宇佐木医生。不管怎样，我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_GREETING_00006E68_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hate to ask again but do you have any more caps you can spare for a man down on his luck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再问了，但你还有没有多余的瓶盖可以给一个运气不好的人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_GREETING_00006E69_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were you I'd watch myself around these parts. I'm the king around here. Is that clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我是你，我会在这些地方自己小心。我是这里的国王，清楚了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_GREETING_00004876_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again? What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_GREETING_00004877_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not paid to chat. Talk to the guy with the eyepatch. He's the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是拿钱来聊天的。跟那个戴眼罩的人聊，他是老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodyguard [01004B68] (mod) NPC : Bodyguard [01004B65] (mod) Quest : ([01004B6B]aaFreesideCoopFitzBodyguardDialogue) 01004B6B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueFitzBodyguard2\aaFreeside_GREETING_00004B6D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of here before I change my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我改变主意之前离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_GREETING_000079F4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry stranger, I'm not sure you're talking to the right person. I'm only a simple therapist and from what I can see you're not one of my clients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，陌生人，我不确定你是不是找对人了。我只是个普通的心理医生，在我看来你不是我的客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_GREETING_00010D17_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for medical attention or want to donate supplies then you should talk to Julie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在寻找医疗服务或想捐赠物资，那么你应该和朱莉谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_GREETING_00010D17_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's the young woman with the mohawk. Although... you do look pretty weathered. No offence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她就是那个留着莫霍克头的年轻女人。尽管...你看起来确实饱经风霜，无意冒犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_GREETING_00010D17_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I help raiders get out of the lifestyle if you're needing someone to talk to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要找人倾诉，我可以帮助掠夺者摆脱这种生活方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_GREETING_00010D17_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_GREETING_00010D1B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought I was clear: go meet Hosea and then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经说得很清楚了：去见何西阿，然后我们再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_GREETING_00016FC6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to keep a low profile here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试图在这里保持低调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_GREETING_00016FC7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll talk soon. For now, go do your job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们稍后再谈。现在，去做你的工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_GREETING_00016FC9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made yourself clear the first time. Now scram if you know what's good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你第一次就说得很清楚了。如果你知道什么对你有好处，赶紧滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_GREETING_00016FCA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No-one gets in to see the boss without my say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有我的同意，任何人都不能进去见老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_GREETING_00017864_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, do I know you? What you staring at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我认识你吗？你在看什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_GREETING_00017865_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go right on in. The boss is waiting. He's not a man to be kept waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直接进去吧。老板正在等，他不是一个可以等人的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_GREETING_0001786B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for? The boss won't wait forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在等什么呢？老板不会永远等下去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_GREETING_0001786C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry pal. You had your chance. The Vultures don't offer a second try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，伙计，你有过机会。秃鹫不会给你第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_GREETING_0001AD07_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the hub of grub: The Freeside Co-op. Go inside and speak to Ella if you're looking for Vegas made produce for a reasonable price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到食品中心：自由城合作社。如果你正在寻找价格合理的拉斯维加斯生产的产品，请进去和艾拉交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, I think I managed to say the catchphrase right this time. Gotta say that's a shock. Doesn't matter, I'm getting paid either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，我想我这次说对了广告语，不得不说这太令人震惊了。无所谓，反正我都能拿到钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you're welcome to keep your weapons but any sign of trouble and you'll be getting a bullet straight in your eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，欢迎你保留你的武器，但任何惹麻烦的迹象都会让你的眼睛直接中弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've already had one robbery. So any funny business won't be tolerated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经发生过一起抢劫案了，所以任何不正当的行为都是不能容忍的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you deaf? Ella said I wouldn't have to deal with customers that often. I don't get paid enough for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你聋了吗？艾拉说我不用经常和顾客打交道，我的工资可不够干这破事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said talk to Ella at the counter. Still standing there? Fine. What is it you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我让你去柜台跟艾拉谈谈，还站在那里？好吧，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah you again. Do you have a thing for bodyguards or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，又是你。你对保镖有好感还是怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_GREETING_00018CB4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be shy. Take a seat when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别害羞，准备好了就坐下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0001AD08_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad we had the chance to talk. I hope we meet again in less troubling times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴我们有机会谈谈。我希望我们能在不那么麻烦的时候再见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0001AD09_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go meet the other recruit and prove yourself. Contact me when the job is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去见见其他新兵，证明自己。工作完成后联系我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0001AD0A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you came after all. Glad to see you're on our side. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你还是来了，很高兴你站在我们这边。我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0001BE3F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了？我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0001BE44_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad you're with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你站在我们这一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0001F8F4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR won't know what hit them.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR不会知道是什么袭击了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't wait to get some time off and go to the Thorn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等不及要找个时间去荆棘街了。
