ESP.ORIGINAL: I might hit the Wrangler sometime this week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这周我可能会去原子牛仔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0001F8F7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't wait to shoot some Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迫不及待地想射杀一些恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0001F8F8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish those damn radio stations would get some new songs already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那些该死的电台已经有新歌了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDAE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever seen a cazador? Those things scare the shit out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过大毒蜂吗？那些东西把我吓坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDA9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd love to see The Strip up close at least once before I die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在死之前至少近距离看一遍长街。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDAA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is some place huh? Hope you don't mind hearing the screams of feral ghouls while you sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好地方，对吧？希望你不介意睡觉时听到食尸鬼的尖叫声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDAD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could really go a snack. You got any recommendations? I'm so done with Salisbury Steak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想去吃点零食，你有什么建议吗？我受够了肉汁汉堡排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDB1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other day, I think I saw some Legion scouts checking out New Vegas. I really wish I shot at him now. Scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几天，我好像看到一些军团侦察兵在新维加斯侦察。我真希望我马上就朝他开枪，人渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDB0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mind Dexter, he can be a bit of a smart ass. He's alright though, don't take it the wrong way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意德克斯特，他有时候挺聪明的，不过他没事，别误会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDAF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you got rid of that annoying Ranger that's been hounding us. Heard she ran away like a coward! Good job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你把那个骚扰我们的游骑兵赶走了。听说她像个懦夫一样逃跑了！干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDAB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you got rid of that annoying Ranger that's been hounding us. That'll show the NCR that we know how to fight back! Good job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你把那个骚扰我们的游侠解决了。这样就能让NCR明白我们是知道怎么反击的！干得好1
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162D] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0102162A] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F8FA] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F609] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F604] (mod) NPC : Vulture Soldier [0101F60D] (mod) Quest : ([0101F8F3]aaRTBGenericVultureDialogue) 0101F8F3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleVultureGenericVoiceType03\aaRTBGener_GREETING_0003DDAC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, hi. Do I know you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，嗨，我认识你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_0001FBDE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue.hasTalkedToFrank to 1 aaVultureHoseaRoomGuardRef.disable aaVultureHoseaRoomGuardRef.MarkForDelete aaHoseaFirstMeetingRef.disable aaHoseaFirstMeetingRef.MarkForDelete
The Sharecropper farms are just up the road there. Let me know once you've got the caravan schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 佃农农场就在这条路上，一旦你有了商队的日程表就通知我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_0002079E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume you've got questions if you're still here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还在这里，我猜你有问题要问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_0002079E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. Do you have the schedule? I hope Hosea doesn't think we're taking too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。你有日程表吗？我希望何西阿不会觉得我们花了太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_0002079F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was nice meeting you. Hope I see you again soon back at Firewater Cave. I assume you've got questions if you're still standing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴认识你，希望很快能在烈酒洞穴再见到你。如果你还站在这里，我猜你有问题要问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_000207A3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, how about that? Not often they let outsiders in here. Ah well, they don't pay me enough to care. Just try to keep out of trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，怎么样？他们不常让外人进来。啊好吧，他们给的钱还不够我关心。别惹麻烦就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_GREETING_000207BF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Go ahead and take the tape. It's just on the table there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？去拿带子吧，就在那边的桌子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_GREETING_000207C6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Command coming to get that holotape is the most exciting thing that's happened here the past few weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 指挥官来拿全息磁带是过去几周发生的最令人兴奋的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_GREETING_000207C7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again for helping us with the NCR. Still feel like I've got plenty to do in this life before I go. Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你在NCR的事上对我们的帮助。在我走之前，仍然觉得我这辈子有很多事情要做。总之，我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_GREETING_00036A88_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. Not really sure how I can help you but I'll give it a shot. What is it you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。我不太清楚我能如何帮助你，但我可以试一试。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_GREETING_00021ECF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, its you again. How can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，又是你。我能帮上什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_GREETING_00021ED0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe they found us. They won't be taking me without a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不敢相信他们找到我们了，他们不会不战而退的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_GREETING_00036A87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll show them not to mess with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让他们明白不要随便惹我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_GREETING_00036A89_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work handling that whole situation. I'm just glad it wasn't me that had to go out there. Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整件事处理得很好，我很庆幸去的不是我。有什么能为你效劳的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDialogue_GREETING_00036D6A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need weapons and ammo for the bear? I've got you covered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要熊的武器和弹药吗？我已经为你准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDialogue_GREETING_00036D69_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hi. Its nice to meet you. I'm Dexter and you must be the new recruit. I'm the guy who fixes everything around here so let me know if ya need help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢嗨，很高兴见到你，我是德克斯特，你一定是新来的。我是修理这里所有东西的人，如果你需要帮助，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDialogue_GREETING_000221C3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我能为你做什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDialogue_GREETING_000221C3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. What can Dexter do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。德克斯特能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDialogue_GREETING_000221C4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for helping out with the republic. It's about time we caught a break honestly. Now, is there anything I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你对共和国的帮助。老实说，我们也该松一口气了。现在，有什么我可以为你做的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_00036D68_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really hope Hosea has a handle on this situation. If you need stims or chems, I can sell you some. What'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的希望何西阿能处理好这种情况。如果你需要兴奋剂或药物，我可以卖给你一些。要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_00036D67_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah so you're the one Hosea was talking about. I'm Beth and I'm the doctor around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来你就是何西阿说的那个人。我是贝丝，我是这里的医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_000224A5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can patch you up or provide you some medical supplies but you'll have to pay for what you take.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以给你包扎，或提供一些医疗用品，但你得付钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_000224A5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supplies are tight unfortunately, otherwise I'd fix you up for free. But for now, we gotta be stingy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是供应很紧张，否则我就免费帮你安排。但现在，我们得小气点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_000224A5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah you're back. I've not got much time to talk but I guess I can spare a little. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你回来了。我没多少时间聊天，但我想我可以抽出一点时间。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_00022783_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hero of Firewater Cave returns! I still owe you a drink. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 烈酒洞穴的英雄回来了！我还欠你一杯酒。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00036A86_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah it's you! You survived! I really hope you managed to convince those residents to help us. We're gonna need it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是你！你活下来了！我真希望你能说服那些居民来帮助我们，我们需要这个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, good to see you again. Welcome to Firewater Cave. I hope Paula didn't give you too rude of a welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，很高兴再次见到你。欢迎来到烈酒洞穴，我希望葆拉没有太粗鲁的欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0002408E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, she's just being protective. You'll be friends in no time. Anyway, how did you get on? Did you manage to get the caravan schedule?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，她只是在保护自己，你们很快就会成为朋友的。总之，你过得怎样？你弄到了商队的日程表吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0002408E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 60 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 50 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 60 1
Welcome back. I hope this cave is to your liking. If not, well I'm afraid there's not much I can do. You're gonna have to get used to roughing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来，我希望你喜欢这个山洞。如果不是的话，那恐怕我也无能为力了，你得习惯艰苦的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024372_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I had access to the same decorating services as the White Gloves Society but sadly it's not to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我能享受到和白手套协会一样的装潢服务，但很遗憾，这是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024372_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024372_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah you're back. I hope you're making friends around here, if not, just give it a little time. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你回来了。我希望你能在这里交到朋友，如果没有，给自己一点时间。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024373_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. How's life treating you friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。你的生活过得怎么样，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0002A08A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you killed that squad then? Good. Wilson won't make our lives hell from now on. I wouldn抰 feel any guilt if I were you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你杀了那个小队？很好，威尔逊以后不会再让我们的生活陷入困境了。如果我是你，我不会感到内疚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was very much a kill or be killed scenario. The same will happen again if they try anything similar!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很大程度上就是一场杀或被杀的戏码。如果他们尝试任何类似的事情，同样的事情会再次发生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm praying they don't send any more troops our way. Once we tie up a few loose ends, we might need to relocate just to be safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我祈祷他们不要再派军队来了。一旦我们解决了一些问题，为了安全起见，我们可能需要迁居。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came through with the Vault and with the defence of Firewater Cave. For that you should be very proud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在避难所和烈酒洞穴洞的保卫战中取得了胜利。为此，你应该感到非常自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going down there was dangerous. Before, you mentioned everyone was dead? What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里很危险。之前你说所有人都死了？发生了什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 1 1
You managed to get them to back off? Thank god! But I think we may need a new place to lie low.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他们劝走了？感谢上帝！但我觉得我们可能需要一个新的藏身处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way the NCR don't send an investigator to check for any evidence that we've been here. We'll make sure they don't find a thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR不可能不派调查员去查我们来过这里的证据，我们要确保他们什么都找不到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll inform the others to start packing their things tomorrow. We'll still be here for the time being. It's gonna take some time I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会通知其他人明天开始收拾行李。我们暂时还会在这里，我想这需要一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, if you come by and we're long gone then don't be shocked. We'll get in touch with you if that happens so don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，如果你来的时候我们已经走远了，不要惊讶。如果发生这种情况，我们会联系你的，所以不要担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, what you did there was impressive. Down right heroic! You got them to leave without a single drop of blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你的表现都令人印象深刻，完全是英雄！你让他们一滴血都没流就离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not many people could pull that one off. The world would be a far better place if they could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有多少人能做到。如果他们能做到，世界将会变得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I like giving compliments when they're deserved and what you did certainly fit the bill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我喜欢在你应得的时候给予赞美，而你所做的也确实符合要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you came through with the Vault. I remember you mentioning that everyone was dead. What the hell happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，你完成了避难所的任务。我记得你说过所有人都死了，到底发生了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a few things to tidy up around here and then we'll head back to Camp Golf if you need to speak to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里还有一些事情要处理，如果你想跟我谈谈，我们回高尔夫营地再说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_00034ABE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's take care of this raider scum first and then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们先解决这个掠夺者人渣，然后再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0003508D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was tough but the bastard's down. Good job, you held your own there. Almost like one of the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很艰难，但那杂种已经倒下了。干得好，你挺过来了，就像一个游骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0003508E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really came through for us and the NCR doesn't forget its allies. Take these caps, you deserve them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的帮我们挺过来了，NCR也不会忘记盟友的。拿着这些瓶盖，你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0003508E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 1000 aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.RemoveScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction
I'm watching you. Make one wrong move against the boss and you'll be sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在看着你。对老板做出一个错误的举动，你都会后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bodyguard [01037609] (mod) NPC : Bodyguard [01037607] (mod) Quest : ([0103760C]aaJackHawthorneBodyguardDialogue) 0103760C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackHawthorneBodyguard\aaJackHawt_GREETING_0003760E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't look like the rest of these wannabes. You must be the one Coleridge told me about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来不像其他的崇拜者，你一定就是柯勒律治跟我说过的那个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_GREETING_0003760F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I called you here because I wanted to thank you for helping get justice for my daughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫你来是因为我想谢谢你帮我女儿讨回公道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_GREETING_0003760F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. I've said all I have to say unless you've got some more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来。我要说的都说完了，除非你还有问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_GREETING_00037610_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh look who it is? It's nice seeing you again my fellow Vulture! Wasn't just me expecting a party or something after joining was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，看看谁来了？很高兴再次见到你，我的秃鹫伙伴！不是只有我在加入后期待派对什么的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_000402DF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah well, maybe another time after we retake Vegas huh? Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊好吧，等我们夺回维加斯再说？我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_000402DF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hi again. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦嗨，又见面了。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_GREETING_000402E2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? You look like you want something. Do I know you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？你看起来想要点什么。我认识你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_GREETING_00040349_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again? What do you want this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？这次你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_GREETING_0004034A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you were held at gunpoint. Tell me more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说有人拿枪指着你，告诉我更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. A couple of days ago, was business as usual when all of a sudden, a gang comes in and kicks the front door in; nearly taking it off its hinges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。几天前，一切如常，突然，一帮人进来，把前门踢开，几乎把铰链都扯下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were screaming at the top of their lungs, demanding I give them all the caps in the register.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们声嘶力竭地叫着，要求我把收银台里所有的瓶盖都给他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It shook me up a little as it would anyone but my Pa taught me how to use a shotgun back on the ranch so I bided my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这把我吓得够呛，我想任何人都会这样吧。不过我老爸在农场教过我用猎枪，所以我默默等待机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear the ringleader tell me to get out of town or I'd be leaving it in a bodybag. My Pa taught me to not to let anyone threaten me that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到那个主犯跟我说，让我离开这个城镇，否则就把我装在裹尸袋里扔出去。我爸爸教过我不要让任何人以这种方式威胁我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So on their way out, I took a shot at one of them. Didn't hit the bastard clean enough, they managed to get away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他们出去的时候，我对其中一个家伙开了一枪。可惜没完全打中那个杂种，他们成功地逃脱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought maybe The Kings would have come running to help with the gunshots so close by. But maybe they just don't care. Bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还想也许猫王帮的人听到枪声了会来帮忙，但可能他们真的不在乎吧。杂碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those thieves managed to get away with my entire day's profits. I can't do without that money I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些窃贼成功地带走了我一整天的利润。恐怕我不能没有这笔钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The job is to track them down and get my money back. There's a good share of the profits in it for you. Now, do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作内容是找到他们，把我的钱要回来，你可以分得一大笔利润。现在，你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 10 setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 10 1
I have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back soon now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请尽快回来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00000EAE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back soon now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请尽快回来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000402DB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBillyJacksonQuestProgressionEnduranceCheck
[SUCCEEDED] Wow, fuck me. You can certainly hold your liquour. Well, a promise is a promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]哇哦，我艹。你的酒量肯定很好，好吧，承诺就是承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001A2F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before he left, Frank said every mercenary needs a secret hideout to stash their gear. I was skeptical about what he was saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开之前，弗兰克说每个雇佣兵都需要一个秘密的藏身之处来存放他们的装备。我对他说的话持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001A2F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea where the kid learns these things. Either way, he said the El Rey Motel was a good place for that kind of thing. I hope he's alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这孩子从哪学来的这些东西。不管怎样，他说埃尔·雷汽车旅馆是做这种事的好地方，我希望他没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001A2F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 10 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 1
<Take shot of vodka> Your turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: <喝下伏特加>到你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Shit, I really thought you had that one there. That would have been the first contest I've ever lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]该死，我还以为你真有两下子呢。那将是我第一次输掉比赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_000022E0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't look so great friend. You might wanna go sleep that off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来不是很好，朋友。你可能想去睡觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_000022E0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Take shot of vodka] <Try to stop yourself from stumbling>
ESP.TRADUIT: [喝下伏特加]<试着让自己不要跌倒>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a guy called Frank Adams. Heard you know him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫弗兰克·亚当斯的人，听说你认识他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, course I know Frank; we go way back. I've been watching out for that kid for years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我当然认识弗兰克，我们是老相识了。我照顾那孩子好多年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001A31_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nowadays, he won't listen to a word I say. You know what its like with the young, think they know best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如今，我说的话他一句也不听。你知道年轻人的是什么样子的，以为他们自己最懂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I can tell you that he isn't here anymore, in Freeside I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告诉你，他已经不在这里了，我是说自由城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: This again, I thought we went over this. What makes you think I'll tell you this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又来了，我以为我们已经谈过了。你为什么认为我这次会告诉你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00003710_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah. *mumbles incoherently*
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，对。*语无伦次地喃喃自语*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_00001D12_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about a little contest then? I win, you tell me where Frank is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么来个小比赛怎么样？我赢了，你告诉我弗兰克在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I really shouldn't... Should I? Right enough, I'm sure Frank would understand. He knows a bargain when he sees one.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我真的不应该...我应该吗？没错，我相信弗兰克会理解的，他一眼就能看出什么是便宜货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D14_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm listening. What's this contest then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我听着呢。是什么比赛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D14_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 25
How about a little contest then? I win, you tell me where Frank is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么来个小比赛怎么样？我赢了，你告诉我弗兰克在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] How about you take your contest and ram it. Frank is like a son to me. You think I'd sell him out for free drinks? Go get fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]带上你的比赛滚你妈的怎么样。弗兰克对我来说跟儿子一样，你认为我会因为免费的酒出卖他？去死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D15_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could keep buying you drinks then you can tell me where he went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以继续请你喝酒，然后你就可以告诉我他去哪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我说的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then. Back to the bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，回到瓶子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, where is it he went?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，他去哪了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh sorry. Just before he... wait a minute. How do I know this is not some sort of trick? Maybe Frank did become a merc after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，抱歉。就在他...等一下，我怎么知道这不是什么诡计？也许弗兰克真的当上了雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D19_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know how cutthroat that business is. As far as I know, you could be wanting to kill him. What makes you think I'll tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那行有多残酷。据我所知，你可能想杀了他，你凭什么认为我会告诉你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D19_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still haven't told me where he went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是没有告诉我他去了哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh sorry. Just before he... wait a minute. How do I know this is not some sort of trick? Maybe Frank did become a merc after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，抱歉。就在他...等一下，我怎么知道这不是什么诡计？也许弗兰克真的当上了雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D1B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know how cutthroat that business is. As far as I know, you could be wanting to kill him. What makes you think I'll tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那行有多残酷。据我所知，你可能想杀了他，你凭什么认为我会告诉你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00001D1B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Take shot of vodka] Your turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: [喝下一杯伏特加]该你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well that's one shot down. Good job. But pretty much anyone can handle at least one. Guess its my turn...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧这确实是一杯。干得好，但是几乎所有人都能做到吧。我猜轮到我了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022D8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: *drinks shot*
ESP.TRADUIT: *一口闷*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Take shot of vodka] Your turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: [喝下一杯伏特加]该你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] What a lightweight... don't worry kid, being able to drink like me isn't a good thing. Thanks for buying though.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好轻啊...别担心，孩子，能像我这样喝酒可不是件好事。谢谢你的支付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022D9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might wanna go to bed or something though, you can barely stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是去睡觉吧，你都快站不稳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022D9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Take shot of vodka] <Try to stop yourself from stumbling>
ESP.TRADUIT: [喝下伏特加]<试着让自己不要跌倒>

ESP.ORIGINAL: We each take a shot of vodka and keep drinking until one of us gives up. How does that sound?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们每人喝一杯伏特加，一直喝到其中一个人放弃。听起来如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds like a challenge. Tell ya what, I'll tell you where he's went if you manage to drink at least three shots of a vodka of my choosing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来是个挑战。这样吧，如果你能喝下至少三杯我选的伏特加，我就告诉你他去哪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The swill those Garret Twins cook up is hella strong. Sounds like we should get started, let me pour you a shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加勒特双胞胎煮出来的酒很烈。听起来我们应该开始了，让我给你倒一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBillyJacksonDrinkingContestEnduranceCheck2
[SUCCEEDED] Oh god! Gotta say you took that one like a champ. Two is child's play though. Looks like its my turn again...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]噢上帝！不得不说你像个冠军一样，不过两杯也是小菜一碟。看来又到我了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: *drinks shot*
ESP.TRADUIT: *一口闷*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Take shot of vodka] Your turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: [喝下一杯伏特加]该你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Shit, you took the first one well, but this shit is strong. Looks like I win unfortunately for you. Thanks for the drinks though.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]该死，你第一杯做得很好，但这东西很厉害。看来我赢了，很不幸。不过还是谢谢你的酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might want to go sleep that one off. You look a little worse for wear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是睡一觉吧，你看起来有点不舒服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Take shot of vodka] <Try to stop yourself from stumbling>
ESP.TRADUIT: [喝下伏特加]<试着让自己不要跌倒>

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, maybe this isn't a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 转念一想，也许这不是个好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a lightweight... don't worry kid, being able to drink like me isn't a good thing. Think it's about time for you to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好轻啊...别担心，孩子，能像我这样喝酒可不是件好事。我想你该走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was fun but I'd like some peace and quiet now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很有趣，但我现在想要一些平静和安宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonD_000022DF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBillyJacksonSpeechCheck1
[SUCCEEDED] There is always a chance the kid was right all along and it was just me trying to bring him down.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]总有可能那孩子一直都是对的只是我想打倒他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025BF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe signing up to become a mercenary was the right call after all. Or maybe he's face down in a ditch somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许签约成为雇佣兵终究是个正确的决定，也可能他现在脸朝下躺在某条水沟里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025BF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I need to make things right with that kid. If he's gotten himself into trouble I'd never forgive myself for not trying to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我得跟那孩子和好。如果他惹上了麻烦，我永远也不会原谅自己没有努力去帮助他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025BF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I trust you though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我能信任你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025BF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 45
Frank might still be alive. If you tell me now, I might be able to find him and get him back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克可能还活着。如果你现在告诉我，我也许能找到他并把他带回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I have no clue who the hell you are. Now leave me the fuck alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我完全不知道你是谁。现在让我一个人呆着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025C0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you just tell me. I could probably find Frank fairly quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不如你直接告诉我，我可能很快就能找到弗兰克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBillyJackson
[SUCCEEDED] Ah what the hell, he might be dead already. Maybe with me telling you, there's a chance you can save him.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]啊管他呢，他可能已经死了。也许我告诉你，你有机会可以救他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025C2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before he left, Frank said every mercenary needs a secret hideout to stash their gear. I was skeptical about what he was saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开之前，弗兰克说每个雇佣兵都需要一个秘密的藏身之处来存放他们的装备。我对他说的话持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025C2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea where the kid learns these things. Either way, he said the El Rey Motel was a good place for that kind of thing. I hope he's alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这孩子从哪学来的这些东西。不管怎样，他说埃尔·雷汽车旅馆是做这种事的好地方，我希望他没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025C2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more thing... If you find him, tell him I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一件事...如果你找到他，告诉他我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025C2_4.wav

You don't want their death on your conscience do you? Tell me and maybe you can save his life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不希望他的死让你良心不安吧？告诉我，也许你能救他的命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I have no clue who the hell you are. Now leave me the fuck alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我完全不知道你是谁。现在让我一个人呆着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000025C3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't tell me. You've killed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不告诉我，就是你杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBillyJacksonStrengthCheck1
[SUCCEEDED] Watch your fucking mouth! We can go right here, right now if you want! I'm not scared of some asshole wastelander!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]闭上你的臭嘴！如果你想的话，我们可以现在就去！我才不怕那些混蛋废土客！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000028A2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to keep all your teeth, you better tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想保住所有的牙齿，你最好告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Don't make me laugh kid. Scram before you get yourself hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]别逗我笑了，孩子。在你受伤之前赶紧走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonS_000028A3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I...I will destroy you if you don't tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...如果你不告诉我，我会毁了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBillyJacksonQuestProgressionUnarmedCheck
[SUCCEEDED] Why don't I just tell you where he went. We both know how ugly this could get and I don't want any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]不如我直接告诉你他去哪了。我们都知道事情会有多糟，我不想惹麻烦。
