ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 45 setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 10 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 1
Have you ever fought a finalist of the Reno Grand Prix?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾与里诺大奖赛的决赛选手交过手吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Don't make me laugh kid. Scram before you get yourself hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]别逗我笑了，孩子。在你受伤之前赶紧走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_000028A6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see if you can deal with these hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看你能不能对付这双手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it. Got any ideas on how to clear your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来吧。有什么办法能洗清你的罪名吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't bring it up with the twins. Its a lot of money for them to just forgive. I know they keep a journal with all the numbers up in their room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会对双胞胎提起这件事的，这对他们来说是一大笔钱，他们不可能就这样原谅。我知道他们在自己的房间里保留了一本日记，上面有所有的数字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00002B85_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you go up there and just scribble my name out so they can no longer read it? Do that and I'll help ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不如你上去把我的名字涂掉，让他们看不出来，怎么样？这样做，我就会帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_00002B85_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can help each other out. I do you a favour and you tell me where he's gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以互相帮助。我帮你一个忙，你告诉我他去了哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can. Maybe we can... I saw the Garret's have been sending bounty hunters to hunt people who haven't paid their tabs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以。也许我们可以...我听说加勒特家一直在派赏金猎人去追捕那些没还钱的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonA_00002B87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say I owe the Garetts a large sum of caps. They seem to have forgotten about it since no-one has came after me yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我欠加勒特一家一大笔钱。他们好像已经忘了，因为还没人来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonA_00002B87_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to keep it that way. You sort that out and I'll tell you where Frank is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想让别人知道。你解决这个问题，我就告诉你弗兰克在哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonA_00002B87_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can help each other out. I do you a favour and you tell me where he's gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以互相帮助。我帮你一个忙，你告诉我他去了哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's still on the table. What about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，还可以商量。怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonA_0000370B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: About that favour we talked about...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我们谈到的那个忙...

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 254 caps> I could pay the tab.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付254瓶盖>我可以付帐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a lot of money. Not sure why you'd be willing to pay it out of your own pocket. I'm not complaining though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一大笔钱，不知道你为什么愿意自掏腰包。不过我并不是在抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonP_00002B8A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A deal is a deal. Let me keep my end of the bargain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交易就是交易，让我遵守我的承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonP_00002B8A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before he left, Frank said every mercenary needs a secret hideout to stash their gear. I was skeptical about what he was saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开之前，弗兰克说每个雇佣兵都需要一个秘密的藏身之处来存放他们的装备。我对他说的话持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonP_00002B8A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea where the kid learns these things. Either way, he said the El Rey Motel was a good place for that kind of thing. I hope he's alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这孩子从哪学来的这些东西。不管怎样，他说埃尔·雷汽车旅馆是做这种事的好地方，我希望他没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonP_00002B8A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem Caps001 254 setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 10 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 1
Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我说的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew you didn't have the stomach for it. You need to watch yourself, not everyone is as forgiving as me. Now, leave me be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道你没有这个胆量。你得小心点，不是每个人都像我一样宽容。现在，别烦我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonB_00002B8C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我说的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then. Let me know if you change your mind. Now, why don't you leave me be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，如果你改变主意了就告诉我。现在，你能不能别烦我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonF_00002B8E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我说的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then. He's probably already dead anyway. Too late to change anything. Now, if you don't mind I got a bottle I'd like to finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，反正他可能已经死了，已经来不及改变什么了。如果你不介意，我还有瓶酒想喝完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonC_00002B90_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: About that favour we talked about...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我们谈到的那个忙...

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's handled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm glad we got that business sorted. It's time for me to hold up my end of the deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我很高兴我们把这事解决了。是时候兑现我的承诺了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0000370F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before he left, Frank said every mercenary needs a secret hideout to stash their gear. I was skeptical about what he was saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开之前，弗兰克说每个雇佣兵都需要一个秘密的藏身之处来存放他们的装备。我对他说的话持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0000370F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea where the kid learns these things. Either way, he said the El Rey Motel was a good place for that kind of thing. I hope he's alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这孩子从哪学来的这些东西。不管怎样，他说埃尔·雷汽车旅馆是做这种事的好地方，我希望他没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0000370F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more thing... If you find him, tell him I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一件事...如果你找到他，告诉他我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0000370F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 10 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 13 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 16 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 1
What can you tell me about Camp McCarran?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说麦卡伦营地的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got assigned here not long ago. It's pretty fucking scary not knowing when the next round of potshots from the Fiends are gonna come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不久前被分配到这里。不知道恶魔帮的下一轮攻击什么时候会来，真是太他妈可怕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotten so bad, that Major Dhatri's been hiring some mercs to deal with those junkie fucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事态严重到，达特里少校一直在雇佣兵对付那些该死的瘾君子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, I keep telling myself it could be worse. My sister's out at Forlorn Hope and every day I'm expecting to be called to Colonel Hsu's office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我一直告诉自己情况可能会更糟。我妹妹在飘零希望营地工作，我每天都在期待着被叫到许上校的办公室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, I hope she's doing alright. Anyway, what else can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我希望她一切都好。我还能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDB_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the area?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我这个地区的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too much. Don't cross the bridge just past the El Rey unless you've got a death wish. Thats Fiend territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不算太多。除非你想死，否则不要穿过埃尔·雷前面那座桥，那是恶魔帮的领地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's also the Aerotech Park near here if you're down on your luck. The Followers have a man over there who tries to help out where he can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你运气不好的话，这附近还有个航空科技园。在那边有个天启追随者的人，想要尽他所能帮助我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard Captain Parker tries his best to keep order there but is having some issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说帕克上尉尽力维持那里的秩序，但有一些问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, word of advice, don't talk to that guy over by the balcony of the motel over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，给你个建议，别跟汽车旅馆阳台那边的那个人说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDD_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he's dealing chems but we haven't been able to prove it. That shit's the devil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为他在贩毒，但我们还没能证明。那玩意是魔鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDD_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about all I know stranger. Anyway, what else can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道这些了，陌生人。我还能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDD_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMap ElReyMotelMapMarker ShowMap AerotechOfficeParkMapMarker
Not too much. Don't cross the bridge just past the El Rey unless you've got a death wish. Thats Fiend territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不算太多。除非你想死，否则不要穿过埃尔·雷前面那座桥，那是恶魔帮的领地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00006E6C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's also the Aerotech Park near here if you're down on your luck. The Followers have a man over there who tries to help out where he can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你运气不好的话，这附近还有个航空科技园。在那边有个天启追随者的人，想要尽他所能帮助我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00006E6C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard Captain Parker tries his best to keep order there but is having some issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说帕克上尉尽力维持那里的秩序，但有一些问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00006E6C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about all I know stranger. Anyway, what else can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道这些了，陌生人。我还能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00006E6C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于恶魔帮你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murdering bastards. They're so hopped up on Psycho that they'll gladly charge a line of rifles with no hesitation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为所欲为的杂种。他们对疯狂药如此亢奋，以至于会欣然向一排步枪冲锋，毫不犹豫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other times, they'll just sit there and stare at us from over the bridge as if they don't know we're at war. My advice, don't take any chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他时候，他们只是坐在桥那边盯着我们，好像他们不知道我们在打仗。我的建议是，不要冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, what else can I help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我还能帮你什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsTel_00003CDF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsGoo_00003CE1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen a merc called Frank Adams near the El Rey Motel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在埃尔·雷汽车旅馆附近见过一个叫弗兰克·亚当斯的佣兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know anyone with that name unfortunately. I did see a well armed man go and talk to Fitz over by the balcony. Seemed shady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很不幸，我不认识叫这个名字的人。我确实看到一个全副武装的人去阳台跟费茨说话了，看起来很可疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsSee_00003CE3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seemed to be staying in one of the rooms at the motel. Didn't see him leave though. Might still be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎是住在汽车旅馆的一个房间里。但没有看到他离开，可能还在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jenkins [010039F4] (mod) Quest : ([01003CD7]aaFreesideCoopPvtJenkinsDialogue) 01003CD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePvtJenkins\aaFreeside_aaPvtJenkinsSee_00003CE3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can spare some caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以腾出一些瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a lifesaver man. How much can you spare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是救世主，你能拿出多少钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveStartDon_00003FC5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: God bless you sir. How much can you spare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑你，先生。你能拿出多少钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveStartDon_0003CC73_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give one cap> Here's a cap.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给一瓶盖>这是一个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every little helps. Thanks a lot for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每一点都有帮助，非常感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveDonateOn_00003FC8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem Caps001 1 RewardKarma 1
<Give ten caps> Here's ten caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给十瓶盖>这是十个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should be able to get some water with this. Thank you so much stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该能用这个弄点水来。非常感谢你，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveDonateTe_00003FCA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem Caps001 10 RewardKarma 5
I'll head to the Westside right away. Etienne will fix me up some grub with this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上去西区，埃迪尼会给我弄点吃的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveDonateTe_00003FCB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem Caps001 10 RewardKarma 5
<Give one hundred caps> Here is one hundred caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给一百瓶盖>这是一百个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God is smiling upon me today! You're a hero. This here will keep me going for a while!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝今天在向我微笑！你是个英雄，这能让我坚持一段时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveDonateHu_00003FCD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem Caps001 100 RewardKarma 10
Ah sorry. I must have left my caps at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，对不起。我一定是把瓶盖忘在家里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Sigh* That's okay stranger. If you go home and get it, I'd really appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: *叹气*没关系的，陌生人。如果你回家去拿，我真的会很感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveCancelDo_00003FCF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get a job you bum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找份工作吧，你个瘪三。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Conroy! We got a fucking snob over here. How about we teach them a lesson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿康罗伊！这里有个势利鬼，我们给他们点教训怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveGetAJob_00003FD1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardKarma -10 startCombat player aaConroyRef.startCombat player
What can you tell me about this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这个地方你了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the place to go where you've got nowhere else to be. Aerotech won't take us on account of Conroy's little problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个你无处可去的时候能待的地方。由于康罗伊的小问题，航空科技园不愿意接受我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not gonna give up on him. That scumbag Fitz keeps him hopped up on Jet even though he knows it's killing him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会放弃他的。那个混蛋费茨一直让他嗑杰特，即使他知道这会害死他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem is, Conroy can't go cold turkey or it'll kill him. So gotta take it slow and just hope he can wean himself off it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，康罗伊不能突然戒掉，否则他会死的。所以得慢慢来，希望他能戒掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We sleep out here on account of the people going in those rooms not coming back out. Lot of shady character's about this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们睡在外面，因为进那些房间的人不会出来。这地方有很多可疑人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么能为您效劳的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who, me? Not much to tell stranger. Used to own a ranch back west until I came here trying to strike gold at Gommorah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁，我？没什么可告诉陌生人的。我曾经在西部拥有一个牧场，直到我来到这里试图在蛾摩拉淘金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter how much I lost. Always that voice in the back of my mind saying it'll be black next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管我失去了多少。我脑海里总有个声音在说，下次会是黑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: House is no different from Fitz up there. Preying on the same impulses except he has the power to make the rules himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯和上面的费茨没什么不同。他同样在利用人们的冲动，只是他有能力自己制定规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just shows that if you have enough caps, you can get people to think whatever the hell you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是表明，如果你有足够的瓶盖，你可以让人们认为你想做什么就做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, thats just me rambling, what else can I help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，这只是我的胡言乱语。还有什么我能帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a man named Frank Adams. Seen anybody called that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫弗兰克·亚当斯的人。见过叫这个名字的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see a whole bunch of shady individuals in this area. I don't know anybody by that name but some people just stand out anywhere they go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会看到这片区域有很多可疑的人。我不认识叫这个名字的人，但有些人无论走到哪里都很引人注目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well armored guy goes up and talks to Fitz on the balcony up there. No idea what they were chatting about but it looked like they had a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全副武装的家伙走上去在阳台上跟费茨说话。不知道他们在聊什么，但看起来他们已经达成协议了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fitz must have rented out one of the rooms up there to him. Seemed a pretty quiet guy, barely left the motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 费茨一定是把上面的一个房间租给了他。看起来是个很安静的人，几乎没离开过汽车旅馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If ya ask me, he looked a bit out of his depth. Kind of had a nervous energy about him what little I did see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你问我，我觉得他看起来有点不知所措，我看到的他有点紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't seen the guy for days, then out of nowhere we hear this loud bang. A gunshot coming from his room, sounded like a powerful round.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好几天没见到这家伙了，然后我们突然听到一声巨响。一声枪响从他的房间里传来，听起来像是一发强有力的子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't make anything of it. A lot of people go in those rooms when life isn't for them anymore if ya catch my drift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么也没做。当生活不再属于他们的时候，很多人会去那些房间，如果你明白我的意思的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then a whole gang of shady motherfuckers I ain't seen before come rolling out that room, I wasn't gonna start asking questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后一群我没见过的见不得人的混蛋从房间里出来，我没打算开始问问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dragged the man out the room. He looked dead to me but he could have been unconscious. Couldn't tell ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把他拖出了房间。在我看来他已经死了，但他也可能是已经昏迷了，我说不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope to see you again soon stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望很快能再见到你，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveGoodbye_000042B8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: May the lord bless your journey. Hope to see you again soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿主保佑你的旅途，希望很快能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveGoodbye_0003EF36_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you might know something about what happened to a merc called Frank Adams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你可能知道一些关于一个叫弗兰克·亚当斯的佣兵的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone doesn't know when to keep their mouth shut it seems. Maybe I do. Maybe I don't. Problem is: I don't see what that has to do with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某人似乎不知道什么时候该闭嘴。也许我知道，也许我不知道，问题是，我不明白这和你有什么关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_00004879_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This again. I told you it ain't any of your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是这个，我告诉过你这不关你的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_0000487A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like someone who can hook me up with what I need. Think you can help out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像是能满足我需求的人，你能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends. Are you NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 视情况而定。你是NCR的人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDoYouSell_0000487C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a loyal customer like yourself, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，对于像你这样的忠实客户来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDoYouSell_00004882_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I've told you all I know stranger. Hope that helps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把我知道的都告诉你了，陌生人。希望能有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDoYouSell_00004883_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah good man. I know of a place called Aerotech. You might wanna head there if you're struggling for caps. They can help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好人。我知道有个地方叫航空科技园，如果你还在为瓶盖发愁的话，你可能会想去那里。他们可以帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzConvinceY_0000487F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue.convincedFitzNotNCR to 2 ShowMap AerotechOfficeParkMapMarker
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Keep it on the down low. I can get you set up with Med X, Jet. Whatever gets you going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，低调点。我可以帮你安排放射线-X、杰特，只要能让你去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzConvinceN_00004881_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue.convincedFitzNotNCR to 1 showbartermenu
What can you tell me about this area?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我这个地区的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I pretty much run this joint. Anything going on around here better pass through my crew. Got that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里基本上都是我管的，这里发生的任何事最好经我的手。明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_00004885_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you want or can I have a smoke already?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想要什么吗，还是我可以抽根烟了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_00004885_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself on the way down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下去的时候小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzGoodbye_00004887_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a few armed guards here. Surprised the NCR hasn't said something to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有几个武装警卫，没想到NCR居然什么都没跟你说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would they do that? Me and the gang here aren't causing any problems. No matter what they say, they can't prove shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为什么要这么做？我和这帮家伙没惹什么麻烦。不管他们怎么说，都证明不了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzWhyDoNCRT_00004B70_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they change their mind, we can always move our business across the bridge. Got any more dumb questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们改变主意，我们随时可以转移生意。还有什么愚蠢的问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzWhyDoNCRT_00004B70_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. Did you see anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，你还看到什么了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too much I'm afraid. Kept my head down on account of not wanting to get shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不多。我一直低调行事，因为我不想中枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005144_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did see the ringleader talk to Fitz up there but don't tell him I said that. Looks like the made a deal. That's about all I saw stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实看到了主谋和费茨在上面说话，但别告诉他是我说的，看上去他们达成了某种协议。这就是我所看到的，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005144_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that helps ya find him. Maybe this information's worth a few caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这能帮你找到他。也许这个信息值几个瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005144_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 22 1
<Let him continue.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <让他继续>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too much I'm afraid. Kept my head down on account of not wanting to get shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不多。我一直低调行事，因为我不想中枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005146_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did see the ringleader talk to Fitz up there but don't tell him I said that. Looks like the made a deal. That's about all I saw stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实看到了主谋和费茨在上面说话，但别告诉他是我说的，看上去他们达成了某种协议。这就是我所看到的，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005146_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that helps ya find him. Maybe this information's worth a few caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这能帮你找到他。也许这个信息值几个瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005146_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 22 1
Is that all? That was useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这些吗？这是没用的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too much I'm afraid. Kept my head down on account of not wanting to get shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不多。我一直低调行事，因为我不想中枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005148_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did see the ringleader talk to Fitz up there but don't tell him I said that. Looks like the made a deal. That's about all I saw stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实看到了主谋和费茨在上面说话，但别告诉他是我说的，看上去他们达成了某种协议。这就是我所看到的，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005148_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that helps ya find him. Maybe this information's worth a few caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这能帮你找到他。也许这个信息值几个瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005148_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 22 1
Has a merc called Frank Adams been this way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个叫弗兰克·亚当斯的雇佣兵来过这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea who that is I'm afraid. Only people that pass through here are deadbeats and myself. I'm already paying my muscle way too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我不知道那是谁。路过这里的只有我和无业游民，我已经为我的壮汉付出太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDenyKnowA_0000514B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think I could afford another guard. Now if that's all you've gotta ask. Scram.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可雇不起另一个守卫了。如果你就想问这个，赶紧离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDenyKnowA_0000514B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFitzThreatenWithGuns
[SUCCEEDED] Okay! Okay! We don't need any conflict here, do we? Just don't tell anyone about this. Breaking deals is bad for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好的！好的！我们不必在这里发生任何冲突，对吧？只是不要告诉任何人这件事，破坏协议对生意不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzThreatenW_00005713_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 65
The guard on your right still has her safety on. How about you tell me what I want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你右边的守卫还开着保险呢。不如你告诉我我想知道的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Looks like we've got a troublemaker here! Guards!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]看来这里有个闹事的！守卫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzThreatenW_00005714_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaFitzBodyguard1Ref.startcombat player aaFitzBodyguard2Ref.startcombat player
Tell me what you know before you get shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你中枪之前告诉我你知道什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFitzThreatenWithEnergyWeapons
[SUCCEEDED] Okay! Okay! We don't need any conflict here now, do we? Just don't tell anyone about this. Breaking deals is bad for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧！好吧！我们现在没必要发生任何冲突，对吧？只是不要告诉任何人这件事，破坏协议对生意不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzThreatenW_00005712_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 65
You think that leather armor is gonna stop a laser beam from turning you to ash? Speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得皮盔甲能阻止激光束把你变成灰烬吗？说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Looks like we've got a troublemaker here! Guards!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]看来这里有个闹事的！守卫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzThreatenW_00005715_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player startcombat player aaFitzBodyguard1Ref.startcombat player aaFitzBodyguard2Ref.startcombat player
Tell me before I vaporise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我让你蒸发之前告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFitzSpeechCheck
[SUCCEEDED] Of course, you don't run an enterprise like mine without having some street sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]当然，经营我这样的企业，没点街头常识是不行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzSpeechChe_0000570B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was just making sure you're not one of them. I wouldn't tell tell anyone about this. Not good for business if people knew I was going back on a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想确定你不是他们中的一员，我不会告诉任何人这件事。如果有人知道了我在交易中出尔反尔，对生意不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzSpeechChe_0000570B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXp 70
Well armed men keep coming to the motel? What's the NCR gonna think? Time to get this out your hair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，一直有武装人员来旅馆？NCR会怎么想？是时候让这个无法打扰你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You're not gonna do shit. How about you just run along before you get hurt?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你什么都干不了。趁你还没受伤，赶紧跑如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzSpeechChe_00005716_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll talk to the NCR about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我该跟NCR谈谈你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。我们聊点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzCancelTal_0000570A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. Not a word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，保持安静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad we could reach an arrangement. The gang seemed to come from across the bridge. Sounds crazy as that's Fiend territory. I trust my guard though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴我们能达成协议。那伙人似乎是从桥对面来的，听起来很疯狂，因为那是恶魔帮的地盘。不过我相信我的守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She knows what she saw. One thing I could tell ya is that they weren't Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她知道她看到了什么。有一件事我可以告诉你，他们不是恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I looked through the binoculars to see them coming this way. They seemed to know the perfect route past all the Fiend patrols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我通过望远镜看到他们朝这边来的时候，似乎知道一条绕过所有恶魔帮巡逻队的完美路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They eventually get here and their leader offers me a substantial amount of caps for access to the room your guy is staying in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们最终来到了这里，他们的领导人向我提供了大量的瓶盖，以进入你的人所住的房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm a pretty loyal businessman. Each of my customers is like family ya see. I offer them a service no-one else can provide them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我是个非常忠诚的商人。你看，我的每个顾客都像我的家人一样，我为他们提供了别人无法提供的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As such, I would never sell out a paying customer but I'm also clever enough to know that a shootout is bad for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我永远不会出卖付费客户，但我也足够聪明，知道枪战对生意不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell my bodyguards to only shoot when its needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉我的保镖只有在需要的时候才开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说重点吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad we could reach an arrangement. The gang seemed to come from across the bridge. Sounds crazy as that's fiend territory. I trust my guard though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴我们能达成协议。那伙人似乎是从桥对面来的，听起来很疯狂，因为那是恶魔帮的地盘。不过我相信我的守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She knows what she saw. One thing I could tell ya is that they weren't Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她知道她看到了什么。有一件事我可以告诉你，他们不是恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_2.wav
