ESP.TRADUIT: 当我通过望远镜看到他们朝这边来的时候，似乎知道一条绕过所有恶魔帮巡逻队的完美路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They eventually get here and their leader offers me a substantial amount of caps for access to the room your guy is staying in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们最终来到了这里，他们的领导人向我提供了大量的瓶盖，以进入你的人所住的房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm a pretty loyal businessman. Each of my customers is like family ya see. I offer them a service no-one else can provide them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我是个非常忠诚的商人。你看，我的每个顾客都像我的家人一样，我为他们提供了别人无法提供的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As such, I would never sell out a paying customer but I'm also clever enough to know that a shootout is bad for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我永远不会出卖付费客户，但我也足够聪明，知道枪战对生意不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell my bodyguards to only shoot when its needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉我的保镖只有在需要的时候才开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能告诉我什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, after the gang leave. I talk to Conroy down there. You know, the old junkie by the car?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，等那伙人走了，我和康罗伊在下面谈话。你知道，就是车旁边那个老瘾君子?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can give him a little discount if you know what I'm saying? Scratch my back and I'll scratch his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以给他打个折，你懂我的意思吗？帮我一把，我也帮他一把。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have him tail the gang and watch where they're going. Seemed to go back across the bridge. They managed to leave just at the right time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他跟踪那伙人，监视他们的去向，好像回到桥那边去了。他们设法在恰当的时间离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR guard was just changing shifts. So Conroy follows em. Says they were hiding out in some steel mill next to the old rock crushing plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR的警卫刚刚换班。所以康罗伊跟踪了他们，说他们躲在旧碎石厂旁边的钢铁厂里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, knowing Conroy he'd say anything for a fix. So you do what you think is best with that info.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我对康罗伊的了解他为了抽两口什么话都说得出来，所以你得用你认为最好的方法处理这些信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say let sleeping dogs lie but its your life. Now, with that out of the way. Can I go for a smoke already?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说不要自找麻烦，但这是你的生活。现在，撇开这个问题，我能去抽支烟吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 30 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 20 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 22 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 22 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 30 1 aaHoseaHolotapeSteelMillRef.enable
<Attack> Well, let's get this over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>好吧，让我们把这个问题解决了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got an intruder. Kill them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们发现了入侵者。杀了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_000079F7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasClarenceAttackedPlayer to 1 startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.startcombat player
aaClarenceCookDetectionForceDialog
We got an intruder here! You there! Don't you move a muscle unless you want us to turn you into swiss cheese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里有入侵者！你就在那儿！别乱动，除非你想让我们把你打成瑞士奶酪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookD_00007FB4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is our turf. What the hell are you doing here? Better be a good fucking reason!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是我们的地盘。你在这里做什么？最好他妈的有个好理由！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookD_00007FB4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasPlayerTalkedToClarence to 1
What is this place and who are you guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方，你们是什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're misunderstanding the situation that you're in here. Last I checked I'm the one asking the questions here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你误解了你现在的处境。据我所知，我才是在这里问问题的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookW_00007FB6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, will you answer the fucking question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你他妈能回答我的问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookW_00007FB6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm going to have fun killing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 我将以杀死你为乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guys, light em up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计们，开枪吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_00007FB8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasClarenceAttackedPlayer to 1 startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.startcombat player
I think you better shut up before I rip you all to fucking pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你最好在我把你们都撕成碎片之前闭嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woah, calm down there! We were only asking. You know what man? Take as long as you need. Our home is your home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，冷静点！我们就是问问，你知道吗，伙计？你需要多久就多久，我们的家就是你的家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookT_00007FBA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me explain...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我解释一下...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on already. Tell me why the hell you're here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，告诉我你为什么来这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookL_00007FBC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone's definitely been here while we've been gone. Guys, shoot anyone you don't know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不在的时候肯定有人来过。伙计们，枪杀任何你们不认识的人！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone's definitely been here while we've been gone. Guys, shoot anyone you don't know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不在的时候肯定有人来过。伙计们，枪杀任何你们不认识的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookP_00007FBE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaClarenceCookSpeechCheck1
Prospector, eh? You should know its dangerous to poke around places that don't belong to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 勘探者，嗯？你应该知道在不属于你的地方乱翻是很危险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_00008B3B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I'm gonna ask you, why here of all places?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我要问你，为什么偏偏选在这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_00008B3B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 65
<Lie> Sorry, I'm just a prospector and I didn't know this spot was already taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>抱歉，我只是个勘探者，我不知道这个位置已经有人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how are you gonna carry all that shit out in the middle of Fiend territory. Looks like we got an intruder AND a bad liar boys! Take em out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要怎么在恶魔的地盘上把这些东西带出去呢。看来我们遇到了一个入侵者和一个骗子！弟兄们，干掉他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_00008B3C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasClarenceAttackedPlayer to 1 startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.startcombat player
<Lie> Sorry, I'm just here to get the steel equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>抱歉，我只是来拿钢铁设备的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaClarenceCookLuckCheck1
I looked into some leads and it looks like Frank was kidnapped by some street gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我查了一些线索，看起来弗兰克被某个街头帮派绑架了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A street gang? Sounds like a good lead. While you were away, I did some digging and heard about a couple of people who've been robbed recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 街头帮派？听起来是个好线索。你不在的时候，我做了一些调查，听说最近有几个人被抢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Crimson Caravan's been hit a few times recently. I also heard Cassidy Caravans and a few other smaller players got burned to a crisp too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 深红商队最近被打了好几次。我还听说卡西迪商队和其他几个小参与者也被烧成了灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also remember Pa saying before I left that some of our caravans had been attacked coming and going from our ranches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还记得爸在我离开之前说过，我们的一些商队从我们的牧场来往时受到了攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure which of the attacks are related, if any. Could be one big coincidence but I'm starting to have my doubts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定哪几次袭击有关联。可能只是个巧合，但我开始怀疑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if there's a pattern. Definitely something to think about. Ah well, all that matters is that we catch the bastards. I want my caps back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道其中是否有规律，这绝对是值得思考的问题。好吧，重要的是我们要抓住那些混蛋，我得拿回我的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you manage to overhear the name of the gang or anything that could help us? Any clue could help us catch them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有设法偷听到那帮人的名字或任何可以帮助我们的东西？任何线索都可以帮助我们抓住他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 50 setObjectiveCompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 40 1 setObjectiveDisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 50 1 aaJackieMillsworthFortREF.enable
Found a holotape in one of the gang's outposts. Sounds like they're called "The Vultures".
ESP.TRADUIT: 在该团伙的一个前哨基地发现了一盘全息磁带。听起来他们好像叫 "秃鹫"。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's way lamer than I expected. Normally, raider gangs call themselves something intimidating but I'm just left feeling kinda indifferent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比我想象的烂多了。一般来说，掠夺者会把他们自己称为吓人的东西，但我只是觉得有点无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's duds in every avenue of life I guess. Anyway, I recommend you go speak to Jackie over at the Old Mormon Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想生活的各个方面都有失败者。总之，我建议你去找旧摩门要塞的杰姬谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's one of those hippies. The way I heard it she's got some contacts in some of the gangs in Vegas. She's helped a few Fiends "rehabilitate".
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是个嬉皮士，据我所知，她在维加斯的几个帮派里有关系。她帮助一些恶魔帮“恢复名誉”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, we need that old bat. Chat her up and see if you can learn anything about these "Vultures".
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们都需要那只老蝙蝠。和她聊聊，看看你能不能了解一些关于“秃鹫”的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. I can defend myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我可以保护自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. You've got that wasteland hardass look about you. If I didn't already have Roy out front then there'd maybe be a job opening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你看起来就像废土上的硬汉。如果不是我已经把洛伊请到前面来了也许会有职位空缺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: People like me, you and Roy are what people should be looking up to out there. Too many people dependent on those hippies over at the old Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我，你和洛伊这样的人才是人们应该尊敬的人。太多的人依赖旧要塞的那些嬉皮士了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place could be a lot better if people were actually willing to put some effort in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们真的愿意付出一些努力，这个地方会好得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's definitely rough out there. Don't envy anyone living in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，外面确实很艰苦。不要嫉妒任何住在自由城的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter where you go in the wasteland, there's always some scumbags who can't take to an honest living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这片废土上，无论你走到哪里，总有一些人渣无法过上诚实的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: People like me, you and Roy are what people should be looking up to out there. Too many people dependent on those hippies over at the old Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我，你和洛伊这样的人才是人们应该尊敬的人。太多的人依赖旧要塞的那些嬉皮士了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place could be a lot better if people were actually willing to put some effort in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们真的愿意付出一些努力，这个地方会好得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing worse than a thief. Someone ought to clean up these streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有比小偷更糟糕的了，应该有人把这些街道清理干净。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right? I've been saying that for ages. The customers just seem to ignore me though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对吧？这句话我说了很久了。不过，顾客们似乎都不理我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093E1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: People like me, you and Roy are what people should be looking up to out there. Too many people dependent on those hippies over at the old Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我，你和洛伊这样的人才是人们应该尊敬的人。太多的人依赖旧要塞的那些嬉皮士了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093E1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place could be a lot better if people were willing to actually put some effort in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们愿意付出一些努力，这个地方会好得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093E1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah I hate hobos. Love killing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我讨厌流浪汉，我喜欢杀死他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tuned out the moment you started whining. Are you gonna tell me what you sell here or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开始抱怨的时候我就不听了。你到底要不要告诉我你卖什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're right. Hard work pays off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你是对的。努力工作是有回报的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally. Someone in this town who isn't afraid to work. Need more like you here in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算，这个城镇里一个不怕工作的人，自由城需要更多像你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000096C6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think its a little more complicated than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为比这更复杂一些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I agree with you stranger. You might not lead a fulfilling life but perhaps you want a fulfilling meal instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能说我同意你的观点，陌生人。你可能没有过上充实的生活，但也许你想吃一顿充实的饭？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000096C8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you. I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈，我要离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really know or care what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不知道也不关心你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's a bit rude isn't it? You in a rush? Nah, maybe you're just hungry. Perhaps I can get you some food?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点粗鲁，不是吗？你赶时间吗？不，也许你只是饿了。要不我给你弄点吃的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000096CF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, enough about that. What is it you sell here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，就说这么多。你们这里卖什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If its an omelette you're wanting, it'll only be five minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想吃煎蛋卷，只要5分钟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000099B1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I'm looking for some work. Got any?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找工作，有吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure do. Got plenty of problems around here that I can't take care of on account of having to work behind the counter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然有。这里有很多问题我无法解决因为我得在柜台后面工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C90_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm needing someone who knows their way around a gun. I'd normally just use Roy but I need him around to make sure I'm not held at gunpoint again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一个会用枪的人。我通常会用洛伊但我需要他在我身边确保我不会再被人用枪指着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C90_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can tell you more if you're interested. So what do ya say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你感兴趣，我可以告诉你更多。你觉得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C90_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job's still open if you're interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作仍然开放，如果你有兴趣的话？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C93_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细想来，我不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like I've misjudged you. You definitely looked like the mercenary type. Come back if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我看错了你，你看起来绝对像个雇佣兵。如果你改变主意了就回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C92_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he survive a shotgun blast from such a short range?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是怎么在这么近的距离被霰弹枪击中后活下来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess he got lucky or my aim is just shit. Strange world we live in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是他走运了，或者我的准星太差了。我们生活在一个奇怪的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C95_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard on the radio that some courier survived getting shot in the head in Goodsprings. Maybe it's the same person?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听广播说清泉镇有个邮差头部中枪，活了下来。也许是同一个人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C95_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the culprit get past Roy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪犯是怎么躲过洛伊的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was out on lunch down at the Wrangler at the time. He's sweet on one of the escorts down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他当时在原子牛仔餐厅吃午饭，他爱上了下面的一个伴游女郎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C97_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor guy. Hasn't got the courage to just go ask her out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的家伙，没有勇气直接约她出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C97_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did the culprits look like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪犯长什么样子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a group of them. Ringleader seemed to be an older fella. The others seemed to look up to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们有一群人。领头的好像是个年长的家伙，其他人似乎都很仰慕他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C99_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were two women and two other guys with them. Seemed like a cobbled together bunch. Maybe they were all a gang?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有两个女人和另外两个男人和他们在一起，看起来像是一群拼凑起来的人。也许他们都是一伙的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C99_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm out of questions. Where should I start?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经没有问题了。我应该从哪里开始？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a decent idea of where you should start but there's one thing you should know first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你应该从哪里开始，但有一件事你应该先知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the first merc I've sent on this job. Hired another armed merc, decent price too. Went by the name of Frank Adams. Local around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是我派去做这件事的第一个雇佣兵。我还雇了另一个武装佣兵，价格也很合理，他的名字叫弗兰克·亚当斯，这附近的本地人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I抎 never pegged him to be a tough guy but I guess you've got to be to survive out there on a diet of radroach meat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不认为他是个硬汉，但我想你必须是个硬汉，才能在外面靠吃蟑螂肉生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always seemed like a fairly quiet kid but I guess people can surprise you. For example, who knew I'd be in business in my late twenties?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直都是一个安静的孩子，但我想人们可能会让你大吃一惊。举个例子，谁知道我快三十岁的时候还会经商呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Frank heard about the robbery, he offered to investigate as long as I could pay him well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克听说了抢劫的事，他说只要我能给他足够的钱，他就会去调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naive young kid undercut himself I think. Either way, I'm not one for complaining when I get a good deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这天真的小孩是在自毁前程。不管怎样，当我得到一笔好交易时，我不会抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm starting to think it might have been him that robbed me and he's came back for a double dip. Kid was always dirt poor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始觉得可能是他抢了我的东西，他又回来了，想来个一箭双雕。这孩子一直很穷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I think he's our best lead. You might want to start by talking to his drunken ass of a friend, Billy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我觉得他是我们最好的线索。你最好先去和他的醉鬼朋友比利谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can be found in the Atomic Wrangler, most likely crawling on the floor drunk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在原子牛仔找到他，很可能是醉醺醺地在地上爬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself there, I swear the card dealers cheat in that dump. Anyway, you need anything else before you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，我发誓庄家在那破地方骗钱。你走之前还需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Kings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我介绍下猫王帮吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're the biggest gang in town. People around here seem to think they're good for the community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是城里最大的帮派，这里的人似乎认为他们对社区有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, do they forget that they need to pay that pretty boy by the water pump everytime they want a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，难道他们忘了每次想喝水都要付钱给水泵旁的帅哥吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anywhere else, they call that extortion. Anyway, enough about those jokers. What else can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在其他地方，他们称之为勒索。不管怎样，关于那些小丑说得够多了，我还能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Silver Rush down the alleyway opposite this shop?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说这家店对面巷子里的银色冲击吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's owned by the Van Graffs. They're a powerful family from New Reno. Not to be messed with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是范·格拉夫家族的，他们是来自新里诺的强大家族。不要乱来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sell powerful energy weapons so if you're looking for something exotic then the Silver Rush is your best bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们出售强大的能量武器，所以如果你想要一些奇异的东西，那么银色冲击是你最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just make sure to keep your mouth shut, especially near Jean Baptiste. Don't think I've heard anything good about that man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定要闭上嘴，尤其是在让·巴普蒂斯特旁边。我可没听过关于那个人的好话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Atomic Wrangler?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说原子牛仔吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a cheap knock off of the Vegas casinos. Most people who don't meet the cap requirements those bots ask for end up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是拉斯维加斯赌场的廉价仿制品。大多数不符合那些机器人瓶盖要求的人最终都会在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put it this way, I'd love access to the Garret Twins' safe. Think that'd make me a very rich woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我想打开加勒特双胞胎的保险箱。我想这会让我成为一个非常富有的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know more about Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道更多关于自由城的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing. I can tell ya what I know. What exactly do you wanna know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。我可以告诉你我知道的。你到底想知道些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0000A25D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. What do you wanna talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你想聊些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0000A25F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me about Jackie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能告诉我关于杰姬的什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said, she's one of the Followers. Those kinda types pretend they're holier than thou but they're human like the rest of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说了，她是天启追随者之一。那种人假装自己比你更圣洁，但他们和我们一样都是普通人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's that old saying that never seems to disappear: "I'll scratch your back and you scratch mine".
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有句老话似乎永远不会消失:“我帮你，你帮我”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do her a favour and I'm sure she'll tell you want we wanna know. Could also try sweet talking her or maybe she keeps a diary, I dunno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮她个忙，我相信她会告诉你我们想知道的。也可以试着跟她甜言蜜语，或者她有写日记的习惯，我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I'm sure you'll figure it out. Just try not to start any fights, I don't want that associated with my brand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我相信你会想出办法的。尽量不要挑起任何争执，我不希望这与我的品牌有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you can tell me about The Vultures?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我秃鹫的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing I can tell you is they must be small time. I've heard of most gangs in Vegas. You've got The Kings, The Scorpions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一能告诉你的是它肯定很小，维加斯的黑帮我都听说过。有猫王帮、毒蝎帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A30_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've also got those bastard Fiends. Drugged out whackos. Never heard of The Vultures though. Gotta say that's a new one to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也有那些该死的恶魔帮，嗑了药的疯子。但从未听说过秃鹫，不得不说，这对我来说是一个新的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A30_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A30_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't got any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有其他问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Go and see what that old bat knows then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，那就去看看那只老蝙蝠知道什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A32_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I told you before, I'm a simple therapist. I typically help people who badly need someone to talk to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我之前说的，我只是个普通的心理医生。我通常会帮助那些急需倾诉的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D18_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I normally help people overcome addiction which is unfortunately a massive task in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常帮助人们克服毒瘾，不幸的是，在自由城这是一项巨大的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D18_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've not already, talk to Julie. She's got a few ideas on helping out the community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还没准备好，跟朱莉谈谈。她有一些帮助社区的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D18_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can I help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just let me know if you ever need to chat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要聊天，就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you calling weathered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在叫谁警惕？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry stranger. I didn't mean anything bad by it. You just look like someone who can look after themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心陌生人，我并没有什么恶意。你看起来像是一个能照顾自己的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's sort of become my specialty. Rehabilitating raiders that is. Well, if you're not an ex-raider then how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这已经成为我的专长了，也就是改造掠夺者。如果你不是前掠夺者的话，那我能帮你什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I really look like a raider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看起来真的像掠夺者吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry stranger. I didn't mean anything bad by it. You just look like someone who can look after themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心陌生人，我并没有什么恶意。你看起来像是一个能照顾自己的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's sort of become my specialty. Rehabilitating raiders that is. Well, if you're not an ex-raider then how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这已经成为我的专长了，也就是改造掠夺者。如果你不是前掠夺者的话，那我能帮你什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a raider. Just looking to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是个掠夺者，只是想谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My apologies then. I didn't mean anything by it. You just look like someone who can look after themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我道歉。我没别的意思，你看起来像是一个能照顾自己的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's sort of become my specialty. Rehabilitating raiders that is. Well, if you're not an ex-raider then how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这已经成为我的专长了，也就是改造掠夺者。如果你不是前掠夺者的话，那我能帮你什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you know about the local gangs. What can you tell me about The Vultures?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你了解本地的帮派，你能跟我说说秃鹫吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever you heard that from was right. Yeah I know about them. I could tell you but it depends, what do you want with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是谁告诉你的，都是对的。是的，我知道，我可以告诉你，但要看情况，你想要做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011000_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest.hasAskedJackieMillsworthAboutHosea to 1
The Freeside Coop was robbed. I think The Vultures might be responsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城合作社被抢劫了，我认为秃鹫可能要对此负责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robbing local businesses sounds very out of character for them. Normally they stick to NCR or raider targets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抢劫当地企业听起来不像他们的性格，通常他们会锁定NCR或掠夺者作为目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, their leader is a man named Hosea. He used to be one of us, the Followers I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，他们的领袖是一个叫何西阿的人。他曾经是我们中的一员，我是说天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was sick of the NCR pushing the common folk around, taking what they want. Sending all of Vegas' electricity and water back to California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他受够了NCR对老百姓的欺压，他们想要什么就拿什么，把维加斯所有的水电都送回加州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sympathise with him. But there are better ways to fight that don't involve violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我赞同他。但有更好的方式来抗争，不涉及暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, that's not the prevailing opinion out there in the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，这并不是废土上的主流意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Coop was just robbed up the street. Getting paid to find the pricks who did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条街上的合作社被抢了，拿着钱去找凶手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robbing local businesses sounds very out of character for them. Normally they stick to NCR or raider targets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抢劫当地企业听起来不像他们的性格，通常他们会锁定NCR或掠夺者作为目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, their leader is a man named Hosea. He used to be one of us, the Followers I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，他们的领袖是一个叫何西阿的人。他曾经是我们中的一员，我是说天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was sick of the NCR pushing the common folk around, taking what they want. Sending all of Vegas' electricity and water back to California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他受够了NCR对老百姓的欺压，他们想要什么就拿什么，把维加斯所有的水电都送回加州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sympathise with him. But there are better ways to fight that don't involve violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我赞同他。但有更好的方式来抗争，不涉及暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, that's not the prevailing opinion out there in the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，这并不是废土上的主流意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I don't have much choice but to do you that favour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我没什么选择，只能帮你这个忙了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Trust me, helping the unfortunate in Vegas is something we could all stand to do a little more of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴我们能达成一致。相信我，在维加斯帮助不幸的人是我们都能做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I need is a bit of a long story so I'll try to be as brief as possible. A few weeks back a little girl came through that gate there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要讲一个很长的故事，所以我会尽量简短。几周前，一个小女孩从那扇门进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: She couldn't have been older than six years old. Her parents were nowhere to be found which is sadly a more common occurence than you think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她不可能超过六岁，她的父母无处可寻。可悲的是这种情况比你想象的还要普遍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its getting rougher out there I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，外面的情况越来越糟糕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115C0_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest.hasJackieMillsworthAskedAboutPocketWatch to 1
aaJackieMillsworthSkipFavour
[SUCCEEDED] You're right. Hosea might have gone too far this time. He must have had his reasons but I can't just stand by as this escalates.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你是对的，何西阿这次可能做得太过分了。他肯定有他的理由，但我不能袖手旁观，任由事态升级。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll send a letter to my contact. Hosea should meet you if I put in a good word with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要给我的联系人写封信。如果我替你美言几句，何西阿应该会见你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The meeting place should be in one of the rooms on the second floor of The Gray in North Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会面地点应该是在北维加斯灰楼二层的一个房间里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea and Crandon came to an agreement that The Vultures could stay there for their help defending the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿和克兰登达成了协议，秃鹫可以留在那里，帮助他们保卫小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and convince Hosea to turn himself in or at least stop the attacks. This doesn't have to end in violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着说服何西阿自首或者至少停止袭击，这事没必要以暴力收场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it does then it will be the people of North Vegas who'll be caught in the crossfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果真的发生了，那么北维加斯的人民将会被卷入战火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I can't decide for you but at the very least think on my words stranger. Good luck. Now is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我不能替你决定，但至少想想我的话，陌生人，祝你好运。还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DE_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 60 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 50 1 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 55 1 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 57 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 60 1 player.rewardxp 65 aaEllaHawthorneRef.equipItem OutfitPrewarCasualwear2Dirty aaEllaHawthorneRef.KillActor aaFreesideCoopBlood1.enable aaFreesideCoopBlood2.enable aaFreesideCoopBlood3.enable aaFreesideCoopBlood4.enable aaFreesideCoopBlood5.enable aaFreesideCoopBlood6.enable aaMurderGrafittiRef1.enable aaMurderGrafittiRef2.enable aaMurderGrafittiRef3.enable aaFreesideCoopWarningNoteRef.enable
Hosea has went off the rails. Do you want more blood on your hands?
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿已经失控了，你想让你的双手沾满更多鲜血吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Sorry. Hosea will have his reasons. Do that favour though and I'll be able to tell you've got the people's best interests at heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]抱歉，何西阿会有他的理由。如果你帮我这个忙，我就能看出你是把人民的利益放在心上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000129DF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea is an asshole. Come on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿是个混蛋，拜托！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find the watch? Seems like a large area to search.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以找到这块表？要搜索的区域好像很大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd put my money on their leader, Yvette, having the watch. I recommend going in with a Stealth Boy if you want to avoid combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌，他们的头领伊薇特有这块表。如果你想避免战斗，我建议你用隐身小子再进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00012CC0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's likely carrying it on her. You might be able to swipe it off her if you get lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她可能带在身上了。如果你走运的话，也许能从她那里偷到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00012CC0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00012CC0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already killed some Scorpions at the Monte Carlo Suites. This might be the pocket watch here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在蒙特卡洛套房干掉了几个毒蝎帮了，这可能就是怀表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh have you? That's great news! The little one will be so glad. Thank you so much for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢你有吗？这是个好消息！小家伙会很高兴的。非常感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0001241E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: About the meeting I promised. I'll send a letter to my contact. Hosea should meet you if I put in a good word with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我承诺的会面，我会写信给我的联系人。如果我替你美言几句，何西阿应该会见你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0001241E_2.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 会面地点应该是在北维加斯灰楼二层的一个房间里。

ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我不能替你决定，但至少想想我的话，陌生人，祝你好运。还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

[SUCCEEDED] You're right. It might be best for her to try and move on. Bringing the watch back might bring back some supressed trauma.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你说得对，对她来说，试着放下过去可能是最好的选择。把表拿回来可能会带来一些压抑的创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000126FD_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，那根本不是我的本意。没关系，忘了这个忙吧，我可以安排你跟何西阿见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000126FD_2.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 我会写信给我的联系人。如果我为你美言几句，何西阿会来见你的。
