ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Mr House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得豪斯先生怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about House but who does really? The only thing I can judge him by are his actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太了解豪斯，但谁真正了解呢？我唯一能判断他的是他的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I look at Vegas currently, I see a city built on heaps and heaps of both old American dollars and bottle caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我现在看着维加斯，我看到的是一个建立在成堆的旧美元和瓶盖上的城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A place of tremendous wealth surrounded on all sides by poverty. While House and the Three Families get richer, children all over starve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个被贫穷包围的拥有巨大财富的地方。当豪斯和三个家族变得富有时，所有的孩子都在挨饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My question would be, where is the wealth going? Is whatever House is building worth all the misery he's conveniently ignoring in New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的问题是，这些财富都去哪儿了？豪斯在新维加斯所忽略的一切痛苦值得吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tower alone, could house several thousand people. Instead he uses it to stockpile caps for god knows what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光是那座塔，就能容纳几千人。但他却用它来囤积瓶盖，天知道是为了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about House but who does really? The only thing I can judge him by are his actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太了解豪斯，但谁真正了解呢？我唯一能判断他的是他的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I look at Vegas currently, I see a city built on heaps and heaps of both old American dollars and bottle caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我现在看着维加斯，我看到的是一个建立在成堆的旧美元和瓶盖上的城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_2.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 一个被贫穷包围的拥有巨大财富的地方。当豪斯和三个家族变得富有时，所有的孩子都在挨饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My question would be, where is the wealth going? Is whatever House is building worth all the misery he's conveniently ignoring in New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的问题是，这些财富都去哪儿了？豪斯在新维加斯所忽略的一切痛苦值得吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tower alone, could house several thousand people. Instead he uses it to stockpile caps for god knows what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光是那座塔，就能容纳几千人。但他却用它来囤积瓶盖，天知道是为了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you were a Follower Of The Apocalypse. Why did you leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你是天启追随者。你为什么要离开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, don't get me wrong, I have a lot of respect for the Followers. They truly do care about people which is sadly not too common in the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，别误会我的意思，我很尊重天启追随者。他们真的很关心人们，这在废土上并不常见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned a lot over the years. They taught me how to read and write which goes a long way in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些年来，我学到了很多东西。他们教我如何阅读和写作，这在世界范围内有很大的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The amount of knowledge that can be gathered from pre-war books is truly staggering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从战前书籍中可以收集到的知识量确实令人吃惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've ever had the privilege to visit a pre war library then you'll know what I'm talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你曾经有幸参观过战前的图书馆，你就会明白我在说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without them I wouldn't be anywhere near as good a physician as I am today. I also met a lot of great people like Jackie over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果没有他们，我就不会成为像今天这样优秀的医生。这些年来，我还遇到了很多像杰姬这样的好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, a few years back, I just felt like it was time to leave because it just wasn't for me anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗憾的是，几年前，我觉得是时候离开了，因为它不再适合我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I looked around at all the good we'd done but I also realised that things were just going to get worse because the NCR didn't want to change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我环顾四周，看到我们做的所有好事，但我也意识到，事情只会变得更糟，因为NCR不想改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kept thinking: "what's the point of believing in the potential for a better world if you're not willing to fight for it?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在想：“如果你不愿意为之奋斗，那么相信世界有可能变得更美好又有什么意义呢？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, don't get me wrong, I have a lot of respect for the Followers. They truly do care about people which is sadly not too common in the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，别误会我的意思，我很尊重天启追随者。他们真的很关心人们，这在废土上并不常见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 这些年来，我学到了很多东西。他们教我如何阅读和写作，这在世界范围内有很大的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_2.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 从战前书籍中可以收集到的知识量确实令人吃惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've ever had the privilege to visit a pre war library then you'll know what I'm talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你曾经有幸参观过战前的图书馆，你就会明白我在说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without them I wouldn't be anywhere near as good a physician as I am today. I also met a lot of great people like Jackie over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果没有他们，我就不会成为像今天这样优秀的医生。这些年来，我还遇到了很多像杰姬这样的好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, a few years back, I just felt like it was time to leave because it just wasn't for me anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗憾的是，几年前，我觉得是时候离开了，因为它不再适合我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I looked around at all the good we'd done but I also realised that things were just going to get worse because the NCR didn't want to change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我环顾四周，看到我们做的所有好事，但我也意识到，事情只会变得更糟，因为NCR不想改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kept thinking: "what's the point of believing in the potential for a better world if you're not willing to fight for it?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在想：“如果你不愿意为之奋斗，那么相信世界有可能变得更美好又有什么意义呢？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_0002377D_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaWhyLeaveFollowers
aaHoseaPeacefullyProtest
Yes. I know of some of the groups you're talking about. The uranium miner strikes of 2036 come to mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我知道你说的一些组织。我想起了2036年的铀矿矿工罢工事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those brave people managed to get the better working conditions that they needed all without bloodshed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些勇敢的人设法获得了他们所需的更好的工作条件，而且没有发生流血事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, comparing the strategies of pre-war resistance to those living in the wasteland today is like comparing apples and oranges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，将战前的抵抗战略与如今生活在废土上的人进行比较，就像拿苹果和橘子进行比较一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite the NCR being more civilised than the rest of the wasteland. Will people really notice when someone inconvenient disappears?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管NCR比废土上的其他地方更文明。当某个不方便的人消失时，人们真的会注意到吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happens more than you know. There's a lot of open country in the Republic where anything can happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种事发生的次数比你想象的要多。共和国有很多开放的地方，任何事情都有可能发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493C_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've read some books about the power of peaceful protest in the pre-war world, seemed a good tactic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我读过一些关于战前世界的和平抗议权力的书，似乎是个不错的策略。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. The NCR will not change its ways by simply asking politely. We have to force it to change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，NCR不会仅仅因为礼貌的请求就改变自己的方式。我们必须迫使它改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel the best way for the NCR to change for its people to see a society to be envious of. Only then, will they demand change from within.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得NCR最好的改变方式是让人民看到一个令人羡慕的社会。只有到那时，他们才会从内部要求改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want Vegas to be that society.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望维加斯成为这样的社会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_0002493D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you think we should work within the system to change things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你不认为我们应该在体制内工作，以改变现状吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I know of some of the groups you're talking about. The uranium miner strikes of 2036 come to mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我知道你说的一些组织。我想起了2036年的铀矿矿工罢工事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023780_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those brave people managed to get the better working conditions that they needed all without bloodshed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些勇敢的人设法获得了他们所需的更好的工作条件，而且没有发生流血事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023780_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, comparing the strategies of pre-war resistance to those living in the wasteland today is like comparing apples and oranges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，将战前的抵抗战略与如今生活在废土上的人进行比较，就像拿苹果和橘子进行比较一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023780_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite the NCR being more civilised than the rest of the wasteland. Will people really notice when someone inconvenient disappears?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管NCR比废土上的其他地方更文明。当某个不方便的人消失时，人们真的会注意到吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023780_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happens more than you know. There's a lot of open country in the Republic where anything can happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种事发生的次数比你想象的要多。共和国有很多开放的地方，任何事情都有可能发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023780_5.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 我读过一些关于战前世界的和平抗议权力的书，似乎是个不错的策略。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. The NCR will not change its ways by simply asking politely. We have to force it to change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，NCR不会仅仅因为礼貌的请求就改变自己的方式。我们必须迫使它改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023781_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel the best way for the NCR to change for its people to see a society to be envious of. Only then, will they demand change from within.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得NCR最好的改变方式是让人民看到一个令人羡慕的社会。只有到那时，他们才会从内部要求改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023781_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want Vegas to be that society.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望维加斯成为这样的社会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeaceful_00023781_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you think we should work within the system to change things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你不认为我们应该在体制内工作，以改变现状吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not really sure what the best way to change things are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太清楚改变事情的最好方法是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth is that no-one does really. Everyone is trying their best to make the best of a bad situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，没有人真正做到这一点。每个人都在尽自己最大的努力在糟糕的情况下做到最好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNotSureB_0002493B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly, what the Followers have been doing hasn't worked so its on us to try something different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，天启追随者所做的并没有奏效，所以我们需要尝试一些不同的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNotSureB_0002493B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Otherwise, Vegas will be trapped in the same cycle of poverty with no end in sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 否则，拉斯维加斯将陷入同样的贫穷循环，看不到尽头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNotSureB_0002493B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth is that no-one does really. Everyone is trying their best to make the best of a bad situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，没有人真正做到这一点。每个人都在尽自己最大的努力在糟糕的情况下做到最好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNotSureB_00023783_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly, what the Followers have been doing hasn't worked so its on us to try something different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，天启追随者所做的并没有奏效，所以我们需要尝试一些不同的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNotSureB_00023783_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Otherwise, Vegas will be trapped in the same cycle of poverty with no end in sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 否则，拉斯维加斯将陷入同样的贫穷循环，看不到尽头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNotSureB_00023783_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree with you. I think we need to fight to change things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意你的观点。我认为我们需要为改变现状而奋斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well well... you really are a true Vulture aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧...你真的是一个真正的秃鹫，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaForMoreA_0002493A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well well... you really are a true Vulture aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧...你真的是一个真正的秃鹫，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaForMoreA_00023785_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you call the gang The Vultures?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么把这帮人叫做秃鹫？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like a pejorative name doesn't it? Well, originally it was. Some rag in the Republic called us that after one of our raids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来像是一个贬义词，对吧？嗯，最初是这样的，在我们的一次突袭之后，共和国的一些小报这样称呼我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyCalle_00024932_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smooth operation that was. Took the food intended for McCarran and fed many a person in Outer Vegas for a solid week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个平稳的操作。拿走原本准备给麦卡伦营地的食物，让外维加斯的许多人吃了整整一个星期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyCalle_00024932_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever since reading that, me and everyone else in the gang have wore that name as a badge of honour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从读到这句话，我和其他帮派成员都把这个名字当作荣誉的徽章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyCalle_00024932_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like a pejorative name doesn't it? Well, originally it was. Some rag in the Republic called us that after one of our raids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来像是一个贬义词，对吧？嗯，最初是这样的，在我们的一次突袭之后，共和国的一些小报这样称呼我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyCalle_00023787_1.wav
