ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个平稳的操作。拿走原本准备给麦卡伦营地的食物，让外维加斯的许多人吃了整整一个星期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyCalle_00023787_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever since reading that, me and everyone else in the gang have wore that name as a badge of honour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从读到这句话，我和其他帮派成员都把这个名字当作荣誉的徽章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyCalle_00023787_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I managed to get the plans. I gave them to Frank who said he'll get them in the right hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我拿到了计划。我交给了弗兰克，他说他会交给合适的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good news. Once Frank manages to get them to our agents in the field I'll give the gang the green light for another few raids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好消息。一旦弗兰克设法把它带给我们的特工，我就会允许他们再进行几次突袭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024090_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know North Vegas has been struggling lately so they'll be happy when they see the haul we get from those caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道北维加斯最近过得很艰难，所以当他们看到我们从那些大篷车里搞来的东西时，他们会很高兴的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024090_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have an official ceremony or anything but let me welcome you to The Vultures. You're welcome to stay here as long as you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有什么正式的仪式，但让我欢迎你加入秃鹫。你在这里呆多久都可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024090_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah I got the plans. Am I a Vulture now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我得到了计划。我现在是秃鹫了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good news. Once Frank manages to get them to our agents in the field I'll give the gang the green light for another few raids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好消息。一旦弗兰克设法把它带给我们的特工，我就会允许他们再进行几次突袭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024092_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know North Vegas has been struggling lately so they'll be happy when they see the haul we get from those caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道北维加斯最近过得很艰难，所以当他们看到我们从那些大篷车里搞来的东西时，他们会很高兴的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024092_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have an official ceremony or anything but let me welcome you to The Vultures. You're welcome to stay here as long as you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有什么正式的仪式，但让我欢迎你加入秃鹫。你在这里呆多久都可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024092_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah I did your stupid task. Did I really have to perform some busy work just for you to trust me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我完成了你那愚蠢的任务。我真的需要做很多工作来让你相信我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid so. The NCR has been getting bolder. I think they're finally starting to take real notice. Either way, its good news you got the job done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕是这样。NCR已经变得越来越大胆，我想他们终于开始真正注意到了。不管怎样，好消息是你完成了任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024094_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once Frank manages to get them to our agents in the field I'll give the gang the green light for another few raids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦弗兰克设法把它带给我们的特工，我就会允许他们再进行几次突袭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024094_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know North Vegas has been struggling lately so they'll be happy when they see the haul we get from those caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道北维加斯最近过得很艰难，所以当他们看到我们从那些大篷车里搞来的东西时，他们会很高兴的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024094_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have an official ceremony or anything but let me welcome you to The Vultures. You're welcome to stay here as long as you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有什么正式的仪式，但让我欢迎你加入秃鹫。你在这里呆多久都可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaGotPlans_00024094_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for that job you mentioned earlier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好接受你之前提到的工作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah excellent. I chose Firewater Cave to hide from the NCR not just because it is out of their reach. Let me explain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊太好了。我选择烈酒洞穴来躲避NCR，不仅仅是因为他们够不着，我来解释一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadyFor_00024375_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: During my travelling days, I came across a Poseidon Energy call centre. This was back west before I started my war against the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我旅行的日子里，我遇到了一个海神能源呼叫中心。那是在我和NCR开战之前的西部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadyFor_00024375_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those sorts of places, if you're lucky, could have spare medical supplies hidden in a first aid locker. That's if you're willing to take the risk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种地方，如果你幸运的话，急救柜里可能藏着备用的医疗用品。前提是你愿意冒这个险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadyFor_00024375_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 70 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 60 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 70 1
I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem. Come back whenever you want to chat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。只要你想聊天，随时可以回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaStandard_00024654_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaIHaveNoMoreQuestions
Why are you sending me into the bunker? Why not one of the others who've been here longer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要把我送进地堡？为什么不是在这里待得更久的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know how it sounds. You must think I'm treating you like you're expendable. I actually need you more than you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这听起来很奇怪，你一定觉得我把你当成可有可无的人了，其实我比你想象的更需要你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fact you managed to track us down against all the odds proves that you're a very capable merc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你克服重重困难找到我们证明你是个很有能力的雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be the only one capable of surviving down there. We don't actually know what to expect other than the ghouls we managed to escape from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能是唯一能在那里生存下来的人。实际上，除了我们设法逃离的食尸鬼，我们不知道还会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C1F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What should I expect to face down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在那里会面对什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know exactly. When we first arrived, I sent Paula alongside a small group down to scout the bunker out to see what we were dealing with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太清楚。我们刚到的时候，我派葆拉和一小队人到地下碉堡去侦察，看看我们要对付的是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They had to retreat from a large pack of feral ghouls. We're lucky that there was no casualties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不得不躲避一大群凶猛的食尸鬼，我们很幸运，没有人员伤亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ghouls must've came out to hunt before we arrived. We've been here a few months now so god knows if they're still alive down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些食尸鬼一定是在我们到达之前就出来狩猎了。我们已经在这里呆了几个月了，所以天知道它们是否还在下面活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C21_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're lucky, they might have starved to death since we last ventured inside. If not, be careful as they'll be incredibly hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你够幸运，他们可能在我们上次进去之后就饿死了。如果没有，要小心，因为他们会非常饥饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C21_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, in most of these military bunkers, security bots are usually a big problem so you might want to be prepared for those too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，在大多数军事地堡中，安保机器人通常是一个大问题，所以你可能也要做好准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C21_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about Poseidon Energy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对海神能源了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much more than most people I'm afraid. A pre-war energy company. Pretty sure they built that old Enclave oil rig just off the coast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不会比大多数人多多少。一个战前的能源公司，他们肯定在海岸附近建了那个旧英克雷石油钻井平台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C23_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember reading the stories told by those that managed to escape that hellhole. It's the kind of thing that haunts you until the day you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得读过那些设法逃离那个地狱的人讲的故事，这种事会一直困扰你，直到你死为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C23_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any company willing to throw their backing behind those monsters has no empathy. That should tell you all you need to know about them. Be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何愿意支持这些怪物的公司都没有同情心。这应该能告诉你关于他们的一切，要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024C23_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, good. Take this keycard. Its the one I mentioned that unlocks the door down next to Beth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，很好。拿着这张密钥卡，就是我提到的那张，可以打开贝丝旁边的门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024F02_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also Dexter should be able to help you out if you need any particular weapons or ammunition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，迪克斯特应该能够帮助你，如果你需要任何特定的武器或弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024F02_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And finally good luck! Try not to get eaten down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后祝你好运！尽量别在下面被吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_00024F02_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaFirewaterBunkerAccessCard 1
I explored Firewater Bunker. There's a Vault inside with the number 23 on the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我探索了烈酒地堡，里面有一个避难所，门上写着数字23。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I guess that explains Vault Tec's involvement with this place. Did you manage to get inside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想这解释了避难所科技与这个地方的关系。你设法进去了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFoundVau_00025A87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. The control panel seemed like it wanted me to swipe a keycard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，控制面板似乎想让我刷一张密钥卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah damn. Wait, maybe that's what this other keycard opens. I'm not gonna lie to you this is a pretty difficult decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，该死。等等，也许这张密钥卡就是用来开门的，我不想骗你这是个很艰难的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where there's a Vault, there's normally people inside. I don't think opening their Vault door without their permission will make them too happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有避难所的地方，一般都有人在里面。我不认为未经他们允许打开避难所的门能让他们高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the risk is worth it though. We need to make first contact with the residents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我觉得冒这个险是值得的，我们得先和居民们取得联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They need to know that society still exists outside that steel door. If we're lucky we might get some new allies to join our fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们需要知道，社会仍然存在于那扇铁门之外。如果幸运的话，我们可能会找到一些新的盟友加入我们的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the NCR's similarities with the pre-war government, perhaps the residents narrowly escaping nuclear hellfire might sway them in our direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于NCR与战前政府的相似之处，或许那些勉强逃离核地狱之火的居民会倒向我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure their grandparents' stories will have left quite an impression. I am still skeptical about this entire thing though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他们祖父母的故事一定会给他们留下深刻的印象，但我仍然对整个事情持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Poseidon Energy having a stake in this place, I can't help but feel the spectre of the Enclave is involved in some way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于海神能源公司在这个地方有股份，我不禁感到英克雷的幽灵以某种方式参与其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I urge you to keep your wits about you. There is something fishy going on here for sure. I can answer whatever questions I can if you have any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我建议你们保持头脑清醒，这里肯定有蹊跷。如果你有任何问题，我都可以回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8B_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, that place is locked up tighter than the Lucky 38. Needed a keycard or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，那个地方锁得比幸运38还严。需要一张密钥或其他什么东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah damn. Wait, maybe that's what this other keycard opens. I'm not gonna lie to you this is a pretty difficult decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，该死。等等，也许这张密钥卡就是用来开门的，我不想骗你这是个很艰难的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where there's a Vault, there's normally people inside. I don't think opening their Vault door without their permission will make them too happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有避难所的地方，一般都有人在里面。我不认为未经他们允许打开避难所的门能让他们高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the risk is worth it though. We need to make first contact with the residents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我觉得冒这个险是值得的，我们得先和居民们取得联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They need to know that society still exists outside that steel door. If we're lucky we might get some new allies to join our fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们需要知道，社会仍然存在于那扇铁门之外。如果幸运的话，我们可能会找到一些新的盟友加入我们的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the NCR's similarities with the pre-war government, perhaps the residents narrowly escaping nuclear hellfire might sway them in our direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于NCR与战前政府的相似之处，或许那些勉强逃离核地狱之火的居民会倒向我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure their grandparents' stories will have left quite an impression. I am still skeptical about this entire thing though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他们祖父母的故事一定会给他们留下深刻的印象，但我仍然对整个事情持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Poseidon Energy having a stake in this place, I can't help but feel the spectre of the Enclave is involved in some way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于海神能源公司在这个地方有股份，我不禁感到英克雷的幽灵以某种方式参与其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I urge you to keep your wits about you. There is something fishy going on here for sure. I can answer whatever questions I can if you have any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我建议你们保持头脑清醒，这里肯定有蹊跷。如果你有任何问题，我都可以回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntGet_00025A8A_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What should I do if the residents are hostile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果居民有敌意，我应该怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really hope it doesn't come to that. What I'd say is that you're free to defend yourself if they attack you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的希望事情不会发展到那种地步。我想说的是，如果他们攻击你，你有自卫的权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23W_00026047_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd advise you to pull back when you can and we can come up with a plan to either evacuate or take the Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你能撤就撤，我们可以制定一个计划，要么撤离，要么占领避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23W_00026047_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is all hypothetical though, there's a good chance it doesn't come to that though if we're lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这都是假设，如果我们幸运的话，很有可能不会走到那一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23W_00026047_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't we all go together incase it goes wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一出了问题，我们不应该一起去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think that would be a good idea. The Vault doors opening to a group of armed individuals might give a bad impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为这是个好主意，避难所的门向一群武装人员敞开可能会给人留下不好的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23S_00026049_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something tells me that would come across as rather intimidating to people used to living a comfy life in a Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的直觉告诉我，这对习惯于在避难所里过着舒适生活的人来说是相当可怕的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23S_00026049_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I have to worry about any more keycards you've not told me about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还需要担心你没告诉我的其他密钥吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other than the ones I've already given you? I'm not sure. Those are the only ones I found in that call centre I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了我已经给你的那些吗？我不确定，恐怕我在呼叫中心只找到了这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23A_0002604B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Hopefully the next time we speak, we'll have a comfy Vault Tec home to sleep in. Maybe that's just wishful thinking on my part though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，希望下次我们谈话的时候，我们能有一个舒适的避难所科技之家睡觉。也许这只是我一厢情愿的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23N_0002604D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this keycard. I think this'll open the door you mentioned. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这张密钥卡，我想这能打开你提到的那扇门。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23N_0002604D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 110 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 100 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 110 1 player.additem aaVault23AccessPass 1
if (GetPCEnemyOfFaction NCRFactionNV != 1) if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 10 == 1) setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 230 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 230 1 endif endif
I'm honored to join, Hosea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很荣幸能加入，何西阿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah don't be silly. It's me who should be honored. If it weren't for brave people like you then Vegas would be truly lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，别傻了，该感到荣幸的是我。如果没有像你这样勇敢的人，维加斯就真的完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D92_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I reckon you'll want to meet everyone in camp. They'll be happy to walk you through their responsibilities and their day to day jobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我估计你会想见见营地里的每个人。他们会很乐意带你了解他们的职责和日常工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D92_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got settled in, I'd like to have a word with you. I have a job which requires someone of your talents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你安顿好了，我想和你谈谈。我有一份工作需要像你这样有才能的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D92_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. That's okay. I'm just happy to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，这没关系。我只是很高兴能提供帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome. I knew you'd be a good fit around here. You seem to really care which is more than I can say for the average wastelander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气，我知道你会很适合这里。你似乎真的很关心这比一般的废土客要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D94_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I reckon you'll want to meet everyone in camp. They'll be happy to walk you through their responsibilities and their day to day jobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我估计你会想见见营地里的每个人。他们会很乐意带你了解他们的职责和日常工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D94_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got settled in, I'd like to have a word with you. Need you for a job which requires someone of your talents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你安顿好了，我想和你谈谈。有一项工作需要你这样的人才。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D94_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I wanted to party hard enough to pass out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我想狂欢到醉倒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There'll be plenty of time for that after we deal with the NCR. I swear we'll drink enough Vodka to knock out Lanius himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们处理完NCR之后还有很多时间，我发誓我们会喝下足够的伏特加把拉尼尔斯打倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D96_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I doubt they'd allow such things within the Legion with all the bullshit about moral decay jammed into their heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我怀疑他们会允许军团内部发生这样的事情，他们的脑子里塞满了关于道德堕落的屁话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D96_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I reckon you'll want to meet everyone in camp. They'll be happy to walk you through their responsibilities and their day to day jobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我估计你会想见见营地里的每个人。他们会很乐意带你了解他们的职责和日常工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D96_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got settled in, I'd like to have a word with you. Need you for a job which requires someone of your talents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你安顿好了，我想和你谈谈。有一项工作需要你这样的人才。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D96_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: About time. I hope I don't have to run any more stupid errands now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早该这样了，我希望我现在不用再做愚蠢的差事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you realise we'll all need to pitch if we have any hope of beating the NCR. You might be thinking as long as you get paid you're fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你没意识到如果想打败NCR，我们都得投球。你可能会想，只要你有工资就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D98_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But make no mistake, you are an outlaw to them now. They'll want to catch you and put you on a chain gang if you're lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但别搞错了，你现在是他们的逃犯了。如果幸运的话，他们会抓住你，把你铐起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D98_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're unlucky, they'll bury you in an unmarked grave. Let's hope it doesn't come to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不走运，他们会把你埋在无名坟墓里。希望事情不会发展到这种地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D98_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I reckon you'll want to meet everyone in camp. They'll be happy to walk you through their responsibilities and their day to day jobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我估计你会想见见营地里的每个人。他们会很乐意带你了解他们的职责和日常工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D98_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got settled in, I'd like to have a word with you. Need you for a job which requires someone of your talents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你安顿好了，我想和你谈谈。有一项工作需要你这样的人才。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWelcomeT_00029D98_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I've found some really useful stuff in pre-war ruins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的，我在战前的废墟里找到了一些非常有用的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll know exactly what I mean then. Always worth exploring, especially if you're short on caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到时你就会明白我的意思了。总是值得探索的，特别是当你缺少瓶盖的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A077_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I found more than just meds that day. A couple of terminal entries and a pair of coordinates lead me out here to this cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，那天我发现的不只是药物。几个终端条目和一对坐标把我带到了这个洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A077_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also found a bunch of bizarre looking keycards inside. Not sure what they do other than the one that unlocks the bunker door down next to Beth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在里面发现了一堆奇怪的密钥卡，不知道除了能打开贝丝旁边的地堡外还能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A077_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what prospecting is. I've only lived in the wasteland my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道拾荒是什么，我这辈子只在废土上生活过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kids these days, think they know best. You ought to listen to your elders, you might learn something once in a while. Now where was I? Oh right...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在的孩子，觉得自己最懂。你应该听听长辈的话，偶尔也能学到点东西。我说到哪儿了？哦对...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A079_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found more than just meds that day. A couple of terminal entries and a pair of coordinates lead me out here to this cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天我发现的不只是药物，几个终端条目和一对坐标把我带到了这个洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A079_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also found a bunch of bizarre looking keycards inside. Not sure what they do other than the one that unlocks the bunker door down next to Beth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在里面发现了一堆奇怪的密钥卡，不知道除了能打开贝丝旁边的地堡外还能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A079_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like a complete waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来完全是在浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you would've let me finish you'd have learned it was well worth my time actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你让我把话说完你就会知道我花时间是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A07B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found more than just meds that day. A couple of terminal entries and a pair of coordinates lead me out here to this cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天我发现的不只是药物，几个终端条目和一对坐标把我带到了这个洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A07B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also found a bunch of bizarre looking keycards inside. Not sure what they do other than the one that unlocks the bunker door down next to Beth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在里面发现了一堆奇怪的密钥卡，不知道除了能打开贝丝旁边的地堡外还能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaExploreP_0002A07B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you explore the bunker below?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你探索过下面的地堡吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We did but it was far too dangerous. We nearly got overwhelmed. We're lucky to be alive honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们去了，但太危险了，我们几乎被压倒了。老实说，我们能活着已经很幸运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidYouEx_0002A07D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should have known it would have been dangerous when I read it belonged to Poseidon Energy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我读到它属于海神能源时就该知道它会很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidYouEx_0002A07D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那听起来真糟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It抯 not sounding promising is it? However, someone of your talents should be able to clear it out I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不太乐观，是吧？不过，我相信像你这样有才华的人应该能把它清理出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A07F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The terminal entries mentioned a name: Paul Reeves. Think he was some company executive who managed a joint project with Vault Tec.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终端条目中提到了一个名字：保罗·雷韦斯。我想他是某个公司高管，管理着一个和避难所科技合作的项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A07F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of those companies based on everything I've read were military contractors for the old US government on at least one occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据我所读到的一切，这两家公司至少在一个场合是旧美国政府的军事承包商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A07F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that means we could be sat on a military stockpile if those coordinates are correct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，这意味着如果这些坐标是正确的，我们可能坐在一个军事储备上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A07F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the worst that could be down there? A few robots?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面最糟糕的情况是什么？几个机器人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Poseidon is involved, you can never underestimate what could be lying in wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当海神参与其中时，你永远不能低估会有什么在等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A081_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The terminal entries mentioned a name: Paul Reeves. Think he was some company executive who managed a joint project with Vault Tec.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终端条目中提到了一个名字：保罗·雷韦斯。我想他是某个公司高管，管理着一个和避难所科技合作的项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A081_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of those companies based on everything I've read were military contractors for the old US government on at least one occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据我所读到的一切，这两家公司至少在一个场合是旧美国政府的军事承包商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A081_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that means we could be sat on a military stockpile if those coordinates are correct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，这意味着如果这些坐标是正确的，我们可能坐在一个军事储备上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A081_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They have a power plant in the Mojave. Helios One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在莫哈韦有一个发电厂，太阳神一号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. The Brotherhood Of Steel and the NCR killed each other over it. Must've had something inside for the Brotherhood to take interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。钢铁兄弟会和NCR为此互相残杀，里面肯定有什么让兄弟会感兴趣的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A083_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Usually the case with Poseidon. Danger usually follows closely behind them. Although, I'm sure a merc of your abilities can handle yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海神通常就是这样，危险通常紧跟着他们。不过，我相信像你这样有能力的雇佣兵能自己应付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A083_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The terminal entries mentioned a name: Paul Reeves. Think he was some company executive who managed a joint project with Vault Tec.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终端条目中提到了一个名字：保罗·雷韦斯。我想他是某个公司高管，管理着一个和避难所科技合作的项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A083_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of those companies based on everything I've read were military contractors for the old US government on at least one occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据我所读到的一切，这两家公司至少在一个场合是旧美国政府的军事承包商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A083_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that means we could be sat on a military stockpile if those coordinates are correct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，这意味着如果这些坐标是正确的，我们可能坐在一个军事储备上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPoseidon_0002A083_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can clear that bunker out for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以为你清理那个地堡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was just about to ask. We'd greatly appreciate you doing that. Also we've managed to pool some caps together for whoever is brave enough to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正想问呢，我们非常感激你这么做。我们还设法为那些足够勇敢去做这件事的人凑了一些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A085_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My thinking is that there's maybe something inside that can help in our struggle against the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的想法是也许里面有什么东西可以帮助我们对抗NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A085_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See what you can find. If you have any questions, I'll do my best to answer them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你能找到什么。如果你有任何问题，我将尽力回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A085_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I'll clear it since the rest of you are scared of a little combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还是把它清理掉吧，因为你们其他人都害怕小规模的战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can assure you when it comes to it The Vultures will fight to the death. However, I'm not in the habit of throwing away the lives of my troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以向你保证需要的时候秃鹫会战斗至死。然而，我不习惯牺牲我的士兵的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A087_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to keep your place in this band, I recommend you show the others a bit of respect. Got that? Good. Now if you're done wasting my time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想在这个团伙中保持你的位置，我建议你对其他人多一点尊重，明白了吗？很好，你浪费完我的时间了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A087_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My thinking is that there's maybe something inside that can help in our struggle against the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的想法是也许里面有什么东西可以帮助我们对抗NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A087_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See what you can find. If you have any questions, I'll do my best to answer them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你能找到什么。如果你有任何问题，我将尽力回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A087_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One Poseidon Energy Bunker coming right up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个海神能源地堡马上就到！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I like your enthusiasm anyway. We'd greatly appreciate your help. We'll throw some caps your way for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧我喜欢你的热情。我们非常感谢你的帮助，我们肯定会给你一些瓶盖的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A089_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My thinking is that there's maybe something inside that can help in our struggle against the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的想法是也许里面有什么东西可以帮助我们对抗NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A089_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See what you can find. If you have any questions, I'll do my best to answer them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你能找到什么。如果你有任何问题，我将尽力回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirewate_0002A089_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They attack NCR? He sounds like a terrorist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们攻击NCR？他听起来像个恐怖分子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess that'd be one word you could use. He's changed a lot from his days in the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可以用这个词。和在天启追随者的时候相比，他改变了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002A647_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: From an early age we're taught that we shouldn't use violence unless its absolutely necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从小我们就被教导，除非绝对必要，否则不应该使用暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002A647_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just look across the Colorado and look how much of a mess that's turned out to be. Hosea is not as bad as Sallow. Nowhere near close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要看看科罗拉多河的对岸，看看那是多么的糟糕。何西阿不像萨隆那么坏，还差得远呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002A647_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still keep in touch with Hosea. He's a good man even if he is a little misguided. Hopefully he comes back to the Followers one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然和何西阿保持着联系，他是个好人，尽管他有点误入歧途。希望有一天他能回到天启追随者身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002A647_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't really care what he and The Vultures believe. I just want to get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不在乎他和秃鹫的信仰，我只想得到报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever thought about using your talents to do some good in the world rather than for your own benefit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过用你的才能为这个世界做点好事，而不是只为你自己的利益？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC03_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, its good for the soul. I reckon it'd get tiring following the caps everywhere you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，这对灵魂有好处。我觉得你去哪都追着瓶盖走会很累的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC03_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Hosea is trying to do what is right even if he is a little misguided. He'd be welcome here if he ever gave up his silly crusade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少何西阿在努力做正确的事，即使他有点误入歧途。如果他放弃那愚蠢的斗争，这里会欢迎他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC03_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed so many raiders at this point that their motivations all blend together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此时我已经杀死了许多掠夺者，他们的动机都混合在一起了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the most literal sense of the word, I guess Hosea is a raider. I wouldn't say he's like the others though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从最字面的意义上来说，我猜何西阿是一个掠夺者。但我不认为他和其他人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC05_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know him, he's an idealist at heart. He truly believes he's doing what's right for Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了解他，他本质上是个理想主义者。他坚信他所做的一切对维加斯是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC05_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you've lived as long as me you get a sense of what drives most people. He seemed like a good man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你活得像我一样久的时候，你就会明白是什么在驱使着大多数人。他看起来是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC05_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still keep in touch after all these years. I hope he comes back to the Followers one day. We could certainly use the help these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多年过去了，我们仍然保持着联系。我希望他有一天能回到天启追随者身边，这些天我们确实需要帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC05_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must have a good reason for robbing the Freeside Coop. I'd like to have a word with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一定有充分的理由去抢劫自由城合作社，我想和他谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know Hosea. He's an idealist at heart. He wouldn't do that without having a good reason for it. Unless the man has changed over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了解何西阿，他骨子里是个理想主义者。如果没有充分的理由，他是不会这么做的，除非他这些年变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC07_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still keep in touch. We were close while he was still one of us and still send each other letters from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍然保持着联系。在他还是我们中的一员时，我们关系很好，现在仍然不时地给对方写信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC07_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he were to abandon his silly crusade, we'd welcome him back. We could really use his help these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他放弃那愚蠢的斗争，我们会欢迎他回来的。这些天我们真的需要他的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC07_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still keep in touch? I'd like to meet him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还保持着联系吗？我想见见他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I trust you? You might just go in there and start shooting no questions asked. Hosea is an old friend so I can't risk that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么能相信你呢？你可以直接进去，然后开始射击，不问任何问题。何西阿是我的老朋友，我不能冒这个险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC09_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you prove to me you're willing to do some good. Maybe I can help after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，如果你向我证明你愿意做一些好事，也许我最终能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AC09_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think talking with Hosea will help me make my mind up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想与何西阿交谈会帮助我下定决心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its always wise to meet someone yourself first before you make your mind up about them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你对某人下定决心之前，先见见他本人总是明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AEE8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we just met, I don't know if I can trust you. You might just go ahead and murder Hosea. I can't do that to one of my old friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们才刚认识，我不知道我能不能信任你。你可能会杀了何西阿，我不能这样对我的老朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AEE8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is something you could do to help me trust you if you don't mind doing me a favour that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意帮我一个忙的话，你可以做一些事情来帮助我信任你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AEE8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting paid to take him down. Tell me where he is now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收了钱干掉他，告诉我他现在在哪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry I am not selling my friend out to the likes of you. You'll need to prove to me that you're actually willing to do some good first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉我不会把我的朋友出卖给你这种人，你得先向我证明你真的愿意做点好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AEEA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If a favour is out of the question then I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask you to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不可能帮我的忙，那恐怕我就得请你离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002AEEA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's horrible. What happened to the girl's parents?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是太可怕了。那个女孩的父母怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murdered I'm afraid. As I said, its shocking how many times this kind of thing happens out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕是被谋杀了。就像我说的，这类事情发生的次数之多令人震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think she spoke a word for an entire week the poor girl. Eventually we got her to open up a little after some therapy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她整整一个星期都没说一句话，可怜的女孩。经过一些治疗，我们终于让她开口了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's still not one hundred percent but these things take time unfortunately. I hope she's going to be alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她还没有完全康复，但不幸的是，这需要时间。我希望她会好起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her parents are likely dead. No big deal. Everyone has to deal with death around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的父母可能已经死了。没什么大不了的。在这里，每个人都要面对死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I beg you to show some compassion. She's only young and I couldn't imagine going through the same trauma at her age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我请求你表现出一点同情心。她还很年轻，我无法想象在她这个年纪经历同样的创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think she spoke a word for an entire week the poor girl. Eventually we got her to open up a little after some therapy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她整整一个星期都没说一句话，可怜的女孩。经过一些治疗，我们终于让她开口了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's still not one hundred percent but these things take time unfortunately. I hope she's going to be alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她还没有完全康复，但不幸的是，这需要时间。我希望她会好起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't really care. Not really my problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不在乎，这不关我的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it's your problem now if you ever want to have a hope of meeting with Hosea. Show some compassion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这是你的问题了。如果你想见到何西阿的话，表现出一些同情心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CC_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她整整一个星期都没说一句话，可怜的女孩。经过一些治疗，我们终于让她开口了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's still not one hundred percent but these things take time unfortunately. I hope she's going to be alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她还没有完全康复，但不幸的是，这需要时间。我希望她会好起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1CC_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you manage to find out what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你查出发生什么事了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to piece together what I could of her story and it seems like she's the survivor of a raider attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法把她的故事拼凑起来了，她似乎是一次掠夺者袭击的幸存者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The family was ambushed just outside of Westside coming out of The Thorn and her parents were shot right in front of her. Animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家人在西区刚走出荆棘街就被伏击了，她的父母就在她面前被枪杀了。禽兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we got the girl talking she kept joking about how her father was always losing his watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们和那个女孩聊天时，她一直在开玩笑说她父亲总弄丢他的表。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The watch was missing from the corpses when I went to go talk to the militia. The gang responsible must have taken it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去找民兵谈话的时候，尸体上的表不见了。肯定是那伙人拿走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to retrieve that pocket watch. It'd mean a lot to her and also a lot to me. Do we have a deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能取回那块怀表，这对她来说意义重大，对我来说也很重要。成交吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you get me that meeting with Hosea, I guess I can help this girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你让我和何西阿见面，我想我可以帮助这个女孩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad even though you're clearly doing this for the wrong reasons. You'll still need to know what happened to her if you're going to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴，尽管你这样做显然是出于错误的原因。如果你想帮忙，你还是需要知道她发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJackieMillsworthDidYouFindOutWhatHappenedRevenge
I'll get the watch. This girl sounds like she needs cheering up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去拿表，听起来这女孩需要振作起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely. She'll be delighted if you're successful. I'm glad you at least have the drive to try and do some good in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对的，如果你成功了，她会很高兴的。我很高兴你至少还有动力去为世界做些好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the most likely culprit is The Scorpions gang. They hang out by the Monte Carlo suites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为最可能的罪魁祸首是毒蝎帮，他们常在蒙特卡洛套房附近活动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its likely they take the loot back there after their raids. I don't think the watch will be an exception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们很可能在袭击后把战利品带回那里，我认为怀表也不会例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get that trinket and I'll organise your meeting with Hosea. Have you got any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去拿那个饰品，我来安排你和何西阿的会面。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D8_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those scumbag raiders deserve to die. I'll deal with the problem and come back with the watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些卑鄙的掠夺者死有余辜。我会处理好这个问题然后带着表回来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think killing the culprits is the right reason we should be doing this but I find it difficult to disagree with your statement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为杀死罪犯是我们应该这样做的正确原因，但我很难不同意你的说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002B1D9_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我没什么选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is the girl now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那女孩现在在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully we managed to find a generous family back west to take her in. They always wanted a daughter after years of trying themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好我们在西部找到了一个慷慨的家庭收养了她。多年来，他们一直想要一个女儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002BD50_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, this kind of trauma doesn't leave you. It sticks with you until the day you die. All you can do is manage it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这种创伤不会离开你。它会伴随你直到你死去，你所能做的就是控制它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002BD50_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give her something to remember her parents by. You get that watch and I can make sure it gets in her hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给她点东西纪念她的父母。你去拿那块表，我保证她能拿到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002BD50_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002BD50_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以和我介绍一下自由城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you this is not the place to be if you're a recovering addict. Its very hard to remain sober in this town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告诉你，如果你是一个正在康复的瘾君子，这里不适合你。在这个城市很难保持清醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C02F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Especially with that slimeball Dixon and his ilk peddling chems on every corner. Not got much else to tell you I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤其是迪克森那帮混球到处兜售药品。恐怕没什么其它能告诉你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C02F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can answer any other questions you might have though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我可以回答你的其他问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C02F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Hosea?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么认识何西阿的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh we go way back. We used to both work in the library in The Boneyard. I'd say those were the days but that's just nostalgia talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我们是老交情了，我们以前都在晒骨场的图书馆工作。我想说那是过去的日子，但那只是怀旧的说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C031_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We both used to peruse the history section and we'd get to talking about our favourite periods of history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们俩经常阅读历史部分，我们会谈论最喜欢的历史时期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C031_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a charming young man back then and we certainly grew close. That all changed when he got transferred to an outpost on the frontier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时候他是个很有魅力的年轻人，我们的关系也越来越亲密。当他被调到边境的一个前哨后，一切都变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C031_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still keep in touch though despite him feeling a bit more distant with every letter sent back and forth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍然保持着联系，尽管每一封来往的信都感到他有点疏远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C031_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long distance relationships always seem doomed to fail don't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 异地恋似乎注定要失败，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0002C031_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool. When did you last see him if you don't mind me asking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酷。如果你不介意我问的话，你最后一次见到他是什么时候？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kinda business is it of yours? I thought people knew to keep their nose out of other people's affairs here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这跟你有什么关系？我以为这里的人都知道不要插手别人的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8D0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep that up in Freeside and you're more likely to get a knife in your belly than an answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在自由城继续这样下去你更有可能被捅一刀而不是得到答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8D0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope the same hasn't happened to Frank. He's not exactly built to live in this environment and I've not seen him in days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望弗兰克没有发生同样的事。他天生就不适合在这种环境下生活，我好几天没见到他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8D0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I saw him was in here on Friday night. We like to toast to all the good times and scrap we've collected over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后一次见到他是周五晚上在这里，我们喜欢为这些年来收集到的所有美好时光和废品干杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8D0_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really regret what I ended up saying though. Let's just say we had a bit of an argument.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很后悔我说了那些话。这么说吧，我们吵了一架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8D0_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you hurry up and tell me where he is before I break your neck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不快点在我扭断你的脖子前告诉我他在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch your mouth you fucking psychopath. Keep that kind of talk up in Freeside and you'll likely get a knife in your belly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说话注意点，你这个神经病。如果你在自由城说这种话，你很可能会被捅一刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8CF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope the same hasn't happened to Frank. He's not exactly built to live in this environment and I've not seen him in days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望弗兰克没有发生同样的事。他天生就不适合在这种环境下生活，我好几天没见到他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8CF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I saw him was in here on Friday night. We like to toast to all the good times and scrap we've collected over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后一次见到他是周五晚上在这里，我们喜欢为这些年来收集到的所有美好时光和废品干杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8CF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really regret what I ended up saying though. Let's just say we had a bit of an argument.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很后悔我说了那些话。这么说吧，我们吵了一架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002C8CF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry to hear that. What did you argue about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾听到这个消息。你们在争论什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to be sorry. It's my mess to clean up. I should never have been so dismissive of the kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要抱歉，这是我要收拾的烂摊子。我不应该如此轻视那孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBAF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had our little celebration here in the Wrangler on Friday and dear god we got blasted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们周五在原子牛仔酒吧举行了小小的庆祝活动，天哪，我们喝多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBAF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's when the kid starts going on about how Freeside isn't for him anymore. We had a pretty sweet gig going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时，这孩子开始说自由城不再适合他了。我们有一个很不错的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBAF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The amount of valuable stuff you can find in the garbage is insane. One man's forgotten waste is another's treasure or whatever the saying is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能在垃圾堆里找到这么多有价值的东西，简直是疯了。一个人被遗忘的废品可能是另一个人的宝藏或者随便什么说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBAF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I miss Friday nights at the bar. Those were the days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀念周五晚上在酒吧的时光，那些日子都过去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a party animal on our hands do we? I've had to slow it down to every fortnight since I can't face the hangovers anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们手上有个派对动物，对吧？我不得不放慢速度，每两周一次，因为我再也受不了宿醉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBB1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had our little celebration here in the Wrangler on Friday and dear god we got blasted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们周五在原子牛仔酒吧举行了小小的庆祝活动，天哪，我们喝多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBB1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's when the kid starts going on about how Freeside isn't for him anymore. We had a pretty sweet gig going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时，这孩子开始说自由城不再适合他了。我们有一个很不错的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBB1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The amount of valuable stuff you can find in the garbage is insane. One man's forgotten waste is another's treasure or whatever the saying is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能在垃圾堆里找到这么多有价值的东西，简直是疯了。一个人被遗忘的废品可能是另一个人的宝藏或者随便什么说法。
