ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBB1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care about your drama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不关心你的戏剧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did anybody ask you if you cared? You asked me if I knew where he was and I don't. Thought you'd maybe want to know why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人问过你关不关心吗？你问我知不知道他在哪，我不知道，还以为你会想知道为什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBB3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, will I continue my story or should I tell you to go eat shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我要继续我的故事，或者我应该告诉你去吃屎吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002CBB3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that you've learned some manners; we had our little celebration here in the Wrangler on Friday and dear god we got blasted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你已经学会了一些礼貌。我们周五在原子牛仔酒吧举行了小小的庆祝活动，天哪，我们喝多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D16F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's when the kid starts going on about how Freeside isn't for him anymore. We had a pretty sweet gig going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时，这孩子开始说自由城不再适合他了。我们有一个很不错的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D16F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The amount of valuable stuff you can find in the garbage is insane. One man's forgotten waste is another's treasure or whatever the saying is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能在垃圾堆里找到这么多有价值的东西，简直是疯了。一个人被遗忘的废品可能是另一个人的宝藏或者随便什么说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D16F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go with the latter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们选后者吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well let me officially tell you: eat shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我正式告诉你：吔屎啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D171_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So he didn't want to prospect with you anymore? Sorry to hear that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他不想再和你一起拾荒了？很遗憾听到这个消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I appreciate the sympathy but I know I went wrong with the kid. Shouldn't have blew up at him like that when he said he wasn't happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我感谢你的同情，但我知道我对这孩子做错了。当他说他在这里不开心时，我不应该那样对他大发雷霆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D733_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said the real money was in mercenary work. He didn't take it too well when I said that that kinda work is not for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说真正赚钱的工作是雇佣兵。当我说那种工作不适合他时，他很不高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D733_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of those types go through some military training before they enter that line of work. Frank could barely catch one of those rats on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数人在进入该行业之前都要接受一些军事训练，弗兰克在街上连一只老鼠都抓不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D733_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He stormed out yelling about how he'll show me and I haven't seen him again since. Honestly wish I could take everything back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怒气冲冲地走了出去，嚷嚷着要怎么给我看，从那以后我就再也没见过他了。真希望我能收回所有的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D733_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No money in raiding garbage especially in Freeside. If I was him, I'd be out of here too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洗劫垃圾可没钱，尤其是在自由城。如果我是他，我也会离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not all of us are wasteland hard asses. Some of us have to get by without caving in every skull we see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是所有人都是废土上的硬汉，我们中的一些人必须在没有撞破所有头骨的情况下生存下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D734_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said the real money was in mercenary work. He didn't take it too well when I said that that kinda work is not for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说真正赚钱的工作是雇佣兵。当我说那种工作不适合他时，他很不高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D734_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of those types go through some military training before they enter that line of work. Frank could barely catch one of those rats on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数人在进入该行业之前都要接受一些军事训练，弗兰克在街上连一只老鼠都抓不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D734_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He stormed out yelling about how he'll show me and I haven't seen him again since. Honestly wish I could take everything back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怒气冲冲地走了出去，嚷嚷着要怎么给我看，从那以后我就再也没见过他了。真希望我能收回所有的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D734_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found some useful items in the trash from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不时地在垃圾中发现一些有用的物品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it looks like you and I are cut from the same cloth. I wish you could've talked some sense into Frank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你跟我是一模一样啊，我希望你能跟弗兰克讲点道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D735_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said the real money was in mercenary work. He didn't take it too well when I said that that kinda work is not for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说真正赚钱的工作是雇佣兵。当我说那种工作不适合他时，他很不高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D735_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of those types go through some military training before they enter that line of work. Frank could barely catch one of those rats on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数人在进入该行业之前都要接受一些军事训练，弗兰克在街上连一只老鼠都抓不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D735_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He stormed out yelling about how he'll show me and I haven't seen him again since. Honestly wish I could take everything back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怒气冲冲地走了出去，嚷嚷着要怎么给我看，从那以后我就再也没见过他了。真希望我能收回所有的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D735_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that explains the smell. Its not just the alcoholism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就解释了味道，不仅仅是因为酗酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, this is the smell of hard work I'll have you know. You wouldn't know it if it came up and bit you in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我要告诉你这是努力工作的味道。如果它出现在你的屁股上，你不会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D736_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is what I was trying to tell Frank. Hard work pays off, there are no shortcuts in life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我想告诉弗兰克的。努力有回报，人生没有捷径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D736_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said the real money was in mercenary work. He didn't take it too well when I said that that kinda work is not for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说真正赚钱的工作是雇佣兵。当我说那种工作不适合他时，他很不高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D736_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of those types go through some military training before they enter that line of work. Frank could barely catch one of those rats on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数人在进入该行业之前都要接受一些军事训练，弗兰克在街上连一只老鼠都抓不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D736_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He stormed out yelling about how he'll show me and I haven't seen him again since. Honestly wish I could take everything back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怒气冲冲地走了出去，嚷嚷着要怎么给我看，从那以后我就再也没见过他了。真希望我能收回所有的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonQ_0002D736_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in. Sounds easy, you're welcome to join me along for the ride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入。听起来很简单，欢迎你加入我的旅程。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold up, as much as I'd like to; its not that simple. We both need to do our part otherwise that corn will be in Vegas before we can capitalise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打住，虽然我很想，但事情没有那么简单。我们都需要做我们的工作，否则，在我们能够获利之前，玉米就运到拉斯维加斯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's two parts to this job. First part is getting the schedule, that's what you'll be doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份工作有两个部分。第一部分是获得日程表，这是你要做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to go to the Sharecropper Farms just up the road and get that manifest. Hosea said he doesn't care how you get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得去这条路前面的佃农农场拿到那张表，何西阿说他不在乎你怎么完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I'd prefer you didn't kill any of them. I've spoke to the farmers. They seem like good people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我希望你不要杀任何人。我已经和农民谈过了，他们看起来都是好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The second part is delivering it to our hideout safely. That's what I'll be doing once you hand it to me. You got any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二步是把它安全送到我们的藏身处。等你把它交给我，我就会这么做。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can handle it. Don't worry, you don't need to come along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能应付。别担心，你不需要一起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't going to suggest that anyways. We've each got a seperate job to do, yours sounds the more difficult one I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我也不打算提这个建议。我们每个人都有各自的工作要做，恐怕你的工作比较难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First part is getting the schedule, that's what you'll be doing. Its a risky job so I don't envy you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一部分是获得日程表，这是你要做的。这是一份危险的工作，所以我不羡慕你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to go to the Sharecropper Farms just up the road and get that manifest. Hosea said he doesn't care how you get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得去这条路前面的佃农农场拿到那张表，何西阿说他不在乎你怎么完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I'd prefer you didn't kill any of them. I've spoke to the farmers. They seem like good people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我希望你不要杀任何人。我已经和农民谈过了，他们看起来都是好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The second part is delivering it to our hideout safely. That's what I'll be doing once you hand it to me. You got any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二步是把它安全送到我们的藏身处。等你把它交给我，我就会这么做。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I'll do the busy work since no-one else seems to want to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我会做这些繁忙的工作，因为其他人似乎都不想做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, don't worry you won't be doing all the work. Hosea told me we've each got our own responsibility on this little test of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，别担心，你不会做所有的工作。何西阿告诉我，在他的这个小小的考验中，我们每个人都有自己的责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's two parts to this job. First part is getting the schedule, that's what you'll be doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份工作有两个部分。第一部分是获得日程表，这是你要做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to go to the Sharecropper Farms just up the road and get that manifest. Hosea said he doesn't care how you get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得去这条路前面的佃农农场拿到那张表，何西阿说他不在乎你怎么完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I'd prefer you didn't kill any of them. I've spoke to the farmers. They seem like good people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我希望你不要杀任何人。我已经和农民谈过了，他们看起来都是好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The second part is delivering it to our hideout safely. That's what I'll be doing once you hand it to me. You got any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二步是把它安全送到我们的藏身处。等你把它交给我，我就会这么做。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFrankAdamsMotelGiveOpinionOfPlanBad
This gang seems to have a vendetta against you. Do you know why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这帮人似乎与你有仇，你知道为什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father is quite a powerful man. He's won quite a few big business deals and has a fair few ranches in his name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲是个很有权势的人。他赢得了不少大生意，还以他的名义经营了不少农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0002E8A0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's probably quite a few people jealous of our family but honestly that抯 just a guess. Who knows what these "Vultures" want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能有很多人嫉妒我们家，但老实说，这只是一个猜测。谁知道这些“秃鹫”想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0002E8A0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe there's a question you have that I can actually answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你有个问题我可以回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0002E8A0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they've captured Frank. He might be in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们已经抓住了弗兰克，他可能有麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor kid. Hope he's alright, doesn't deserve this. Although, he did sign up for a job so he must've known what to expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的孩子，希望他没事，不值得这样。不过，他确实签了份工作所以他肯定知道会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0002E8A2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about him. Your main focus should be on getting my caps back. We'll cross the Frank bridge when it comes to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别为他担心，你的主要精力应该放在拿回我的瓶盖上。弗兰克的问题到时候我们会解决的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0002E8A2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0002E8A2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those brahmin barons worked hard to earn their caps. It doesn't matter what politicans they support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些婆罗门大亨努力工作，获得他们的瓶盖。他们支持什么政客并不重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you believe that hard work should pay off? I抎 say most people who aren抰 crazy would agree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你认为努力工作应该得到回报？我想大多数人都会同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you a question though. Do you think Jack Hawthorne, who has one business meeting a week, has a difficult job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过让我问你一个问题。你认为每周有一次商务会议的杰克·霍桑的工作很困难吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might say he has to manage a lot of stress ensuring the business stays together and has to make risky deals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会说，他必须管理大量的压力，确保业务保持不变，并且必须进行有风险的交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now think about the peasant that tends to Hawthorne's crops. What about the stress of their family not getting enough to eat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在想想那些照料霍桑庄稼的农民，他们的家人吃不饱饭的压力又如何呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That and the backbreaking work on a farm is far more difficult than anything Jack has to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，在农场的繁重工作比杰克必须做的任何事情都要困难得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also when a big business deal goes wrong, who suffers from his bad performance in the market? Let me give you a clue: its not Jack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，当一笔大生意出了问题，谁会因为他在市场上的糟糕表现而受苦呢？让我给你一个提示：不是杰克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think that is fair for the average worker who is forced to work a thankless job or else they'll starve?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为这对那些被迫从事一份吃力不讨好的工作的普通工人公平吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE60_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really know much about the NCR political situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对NCR的政治形势并不了解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're lucky. Its an endless war of backstabbing politicians ready to sell their soul to the highest bidder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很幸运。这是一场无休止的战争，背后捅刀子的政客们准备把自己的灵魂卖给出价最高的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE61_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The average worker breaks their back in a thankless job where they make barely enough to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普通工人做着吃力不讨好的工作，挣的钱勉强够吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE61_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leeches like Gunderson exploit their labour for vast amounts of wealth while the majority struggle to make it by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像冈德森这样的蚂蟥利用他们的劳动力获得大量的财富，而大多数人却在挣扎着过日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE61_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is a den full of snakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR是一个充满毒蛇的巢穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most people in the NCR are good people if you give them a chance. However, I agree that the best way to kill a snake is to cut off its head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你给他们机会，NCR的大多数人都是好人。然而，我同意杀死蛇的最好方法是砍掉它的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE62_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leadership and policies need to change for the betterment of all and not just those ruthless enough to exploit the labour of others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 领导层和政策需要改变，以改善所有人的生活，而不仅仅是那些无情的剥削他人劳动的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaLandowne_0002EE62_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still not clear on why you killed Ella Hawthorne. Can you explain why you did it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不清楚你为什么要杀艾拉·霍桑，你能解释一下你为什么这么做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had her killed because she and her family are a group of parasites taking control of the market from hard working Vegas farmers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了她是因为她和她的家人是一群寄生虫，从努力工作的维加斯农民手中夺取市场的控制权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyKillE_0002F141_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They pitch their store as a "Freeside Coop" when all they function as is a middleman taking caps for nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把自己的商店说成是 "自由城合作社"，而他们的作用只是一个白赚瓶盖的中间人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyKillE_0002F141_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, we tried to intimidate her to leave. Ideally this would have been resolved without bloodshed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我们试图恐吓她离开。理想情况下，这应该在没有流血冲突的情况下得到解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyKillE_0002F141_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, she didn't learn her lesson. She hired mercs like you to find and harm us and for that she had to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，她没有接受教训。她雇了像你这样的雇佣兵来找到并伤害我们，为此她必须死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyKillE_0002F141_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you can see I was just protecting my people. Now, are there any more questions you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能明白我只是在保护我的人。现在，你还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyKillE_0002F141_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the other merc before me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我之前的另一个雇佣兵怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean Frank? He's safe and sound. You might be meeting him sooner than you expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是弗兰克？他安然无恙，你和他见面的时间可能比你预期的要早。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatHapp_0002F143_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatHapp_0002F143_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23SecurityBotForceGreeting
Halt! Facial recognition scan failed. Identify yourself or you will be forcefully removed from the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住！面部识别扫描失败。请表明身份，否则将被强制驱逐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_0003027A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: EnablePlayerControls
aaVault23SecurityBotScienceCheck
Request granted. There has been a fault detected recently. You are welcome to inspect me at your leisure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请求批准。最近检测到一个故障，欢迎您在闲暇时对我进行检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030840_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, note that time taken above average performance metrics will be logged against your permanent record.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，请注意，超过平均性能指标所花费的时间将记录在您的永久记录中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030840_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is company policy to log your visit in the office. Failure to do so will result in punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据公司政策，在办公室记录你的访问。如果不这样做，将会受到惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030840_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr Reeves has sent for me to take care of your broken identity scanner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷韦斯先生让我来处理你坏掉的身份扫描仪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hacking is a violation of the agreement between you: the employee and Mr Reeves. Please do not resist or violent force will be utilized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑客行为违反了您：雇员和雷韦斯先生之间的协议。请不要抵抗，否则将动用暴力手段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030B23_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player startcombat player aaVault23Turret01Ref.startcombat player aaVault23Turret02Ref.startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaVault23RobotFaction
There must be a way to hack you or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定有办法黑进你的系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23SecurityBotLuckCheck
Voice pattern recognised. Welcome Mr Reeves. We hope you're feeling better today. You have not been at your office for 73365 days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声音模式识别。欢迎雷韦斯先生，我们希望您今天感觉好些了，您已经有73365天没去办公室了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030B21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you are in need of an extra day to recuperate then you are encouraged to do so. Enjoy your day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果您需要额外的一天来恢复，那么我们鼓励您这样做。好好享受这一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030B21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feign voice> Yes. I am Mr Reeves. I had my face changed this morning. How do you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: <伪装声音>是的，我是雷韦斯先生，我今天早上换了脸。你好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Identity confirmed. Intruder detected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 身份确认。检测到入侵者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030B22_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have failed to comply with the advice given in the workers manual and are now liable to receive lethal force as punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有遵守工人手册中的建议，现在可能会受到致命武力的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030B22_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player startcombat player aaVault23Turret01Ref.startcombat player aaVault23Turret02Ref.startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaVault23RobotFaction
Just let me by please. Pretty please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请让我过去，求求你了好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Not more robots... Ah well, gotta take care of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>没有更多的机器人...啊好吧，我得解决你了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vandalism is a crime that can be punished with lethal force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破坏行为是一种可以用致命武力惩罚的犯罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault 23 Hardened Sentry Bot [0101C41A] (mod) Quest : ([01030278]aaVault23SecurityBotDialogue) 01030278 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaVault23SecurityBotBossVoiceType\aaVault23S_aaVault23Securi_00030B25_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaVault23Turret01Ref.startcombat player aaVault23Turret02Ref.startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaVault23RobotFaction
Hosea plans to make contact with a Vault. Bolster his ranks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿计划与一个避难所取得联系，壮大他的队伍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. That's not good at all. My superior will sign off on this. I have no doubt. You've done a good job and the NCR doesn't forget its allies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这一点都不好，我的上级会批准的，我毫不怀疑。你做得很好，NCR不会忘记它的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_00030E0A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a favour to ask you though. I need you to remain undercover in his ranks just incase those scumbags have an ace in the hole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我还是想请你帮个忙，我需要你继续在他的队伍里做卧底，以防那些人渣还有底牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_00030E0A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be vigilant and wait for us to come siege the camp. Once we're there tell Hosea he has no choice but to surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持警惕，等待我们来包围营地。等我们到了告诉何西阿，他别无选择，只能投降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_00030E0A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully he'll come quietly but something tells me that won't be the case. Do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望他能安静地来，但直觉告诉我不会是这样。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_00030E0A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 230 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 235 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 235 set aaRTBNcrQuest.toldRangerWilsonAboutVault23 to 1
What should I do if they ask me to kill an NCR citizen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们要求我杀死一个NCR公民，我应该怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see your concern. I hope it doesn't come to that but I'm afraid I can't provide you any immunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能理解你的担忧，我希望不会到那种地步，但恐怕我不能给你任何豁免权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310E9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's something you end up having to do then I'm afraid that'll make you a criminal and we'd have to arrest you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是你最后不得不做的事，恐怕你会成为罪犯，我们不得不逮捕你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310E9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry but I cannot offer you that level of immunity. I know its crass but you are just a merc to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，我不能给你那种程度的豁免。我知道这很无理，但你对我们来说只是个雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310E9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any other questions? Let's hope the answer isn't too grim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有其他问题吗？希望答案不会太残酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310E9_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about any citizens in the Vault? What should I do with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所里有居民吗？我该拿他们怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and convince them that Hosea is their enemy. The NCR has the law and order that they lost when the bombs dropped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着让他们相信何西阿是他们的敌人。NCR拥有他们在核弹袭击中失去的秩序和法律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310EB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they won't join us then it would be in the NCR's best interest for you to get rid of them. We can't handle any more enemies at this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们不加入我们，那么你除掉他们对NCR来说是最有利的。目前我们无法再对付更多的敌人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310EB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_000310EB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad. Good luck. I know its tough to hang out with raiders and not be tempted to stoop to their level. I've done a bit of undercover work myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴，祝你好运。我知道要和掠夺者混在一起而不被诱惑到他们的水平是很难的，我自己也做过一些卧底工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonN_000310ED_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your chin up alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要有信心好吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonN_000310ED_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got into Vault 23. Everyone was dead. There seemed to have been a rebellion that failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进入了23号避难所。所有人都死了，似乎发生过一场失败的叛乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? Everyone? What the hell could have happened? This is not what we need right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？所有人吗？到底发生了什么？这不是我们现在需要的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23C_000313CC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you ready for combat stranger. Make sure you've loaded your magazines and got all the stims you can carry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你准备好战斗，陌生人。确保你已经装好了你的弹匣，并带上了所有你能携带的兴奋剂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23C_000313CC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 240 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 235 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.enable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.enable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.enable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.enable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.enable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.AddScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.AddScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.AddScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.AddScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage
I got into Vault 23. Everyone was dead. There seemed to have been a rebellion that failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进入了23号避难所。所有人都死了，似乎发生过一场失败的叛乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone's dead? What a waste. They must have rebelled for a reason. Were you able to figure out why it happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人都死了？太可惜了。他们反抗一定是有原因的，你能找出原因吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23C_000313CE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it really matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的重要吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Has no-one ever taught you the value of history? When you live to be my age perhaps you'll see why its important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。没人教你历史的价值吗？当你活到我这个年纪的时候，也许你就会明白为什么这很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaVault23Finish_000316AD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, do you know what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你知道发生什么了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaVault23Finish_000316AD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not really sure what happened but I managed to find some plans for a hydroponic lighting device.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太清楚发生了什么，但我设法找到了一些水培照明装置的设计图。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hydroponics? Here? That's great news! Do you know how useful that could be for the people of Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 水培？在这里？这真是个好消息！你知道这对维加斯的人有多重要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaVault23Finish_000316AF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are the plans? On your Pipboy? Let's take a look at those. Come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 设计图在哪里？在你的哔哔小子上吗？让我们来看看这些，到这里来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaVault23Finish_000316AF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.gaveVault23PlansToHosea to 1 DisablePlayerControls
The residents didn't feel like they were being treated right by the Overseer: Reeves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居民们觉得他们没有受到监督雷韦斯的正确对待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you no doubt saw, rebellion was a feature of the old world too. Even back then, people fought back against those they considered to be monsters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如你所看到的，反叛也是旧世界的一个特征。即使在那个时候，人们也会反抗那些他们认为是怪物的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaVault23Finish_000316B1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some things never change I'm afraid. I'm curious, what do you think? Were the people of Vault 23 right to rebel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕有些事永远不会改变。我很好奇，你怎么想？23号避难所的人有权利反抗吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaVault23Finish_000316B1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reeves was a tyrant. He starved his people while he lived like a king.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷韦斯是个暴君。他让他的人民挨饿，而他却像个国王一样生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like the barons of the NCR are more similar to the executives of the old world than we knew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来NCR的大亨们与旧世界的高管们比我们知道的更相似。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_000316B3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The people of Vault 23 tried to remove the greedy parasite. Seems like they were ultimately too late.
ESP.TRADUIT: 23号避难所的人们试图除掉这个贪婪的寄生虫，看来他们最终还是太迟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_000316B3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This won't be the case for Vegas. We still stand a chance if we stand together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯就不一样了。如果我们团结一致，我们还有希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_000316B3_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back to business though, did you manage to find anything related to Vault Tec or Poseidon that could help us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到正题，你有没有找到任何与避难所科技或海神能源有关的线索？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_000316B3_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its not really my place to say. I wasn't there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没资格说这些，我不在场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's probably a wise stance to take. We shouldn't be judging people if we don't have the context about their situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能是一个明智的立场。如果我们不了解他们的处境，就不应该评判他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_00031992_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you take your time to ponder these things rather than jumping to a conclusion. The wasteland could use more people like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你花时间考虑这些事情，而不是妄下定论。废土需要更多像你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_00031992_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, back to business. Were you able to find anything related to Vault Tec or Poseidon that could help us in our struggle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，回到正题。你能找到任何与避难所科技或海神能源有关的东西来帮助我们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_00031992_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't know how good they had it down there. Seems to me like they just enjoyed complaining.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不知道他们在下面有多好。在我看来，他们似乎只是喜欢抱怨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember they would've had no idea what the outside world was like locked up down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住，他们关在里面根本不知道外面的世界是什么样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_00031994_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: People usually behave aggressively for a reason. You'd do well to remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们的攻击性行为通常是有原因的，你最好记住这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_00031994_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, back to business. Were you able to find anything related to Vault Tec or Poseidon that could help us in our struggle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，回到正题。你能找到任何与避难所科技或海神能源有关的东西来帮助我们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23F_00031994_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I have some plans for some hydroponic lights the residents were using.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有一些居民正在使用的水培灯的设计图。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hydroponics? Here? That's great news! Do you know how good that could be for the people of Vegas?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 水培？在这里？这真是个好消息！你知道这对拉斯维加斯人民来说有多棒吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23G_00031996_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are the plans? On your pipboy? Come here. Show me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 设计图在哪里？在你的哔哔小子上吗？来这里，给我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23G_00031996_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.gaveVault23PlansToHosea to 1 set aaRTBTheVulturesQuest.givenVulturesLights to 1 DisablePlayerControls aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.SetRestrained 1
<Lie> I wasn't able to find anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我没能找到任何东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing? Are you telling me I've led my people here for nothing. Wasted all their time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有？你是说我白白把我的人带到了这里，浪费了他们所有人的时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sure that there had to be something down here. All those sacrifices... I'll have to tell everyone the bad news. I'll need some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信这下面一定有什么东西。所有这些牺牲...我得告诉大家这个坏消息，我需要一些时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, luck wasn't in our favour. I'll have to come up with some more ideas to resist the Bear or else we're in deep, deep trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们的运气并不好。我必须想出更多的办法来抵抗熊，否则我们就麻烦大了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, you've done more than your fair share of work and you deserve to be rewarded. Here, take these caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你已经做了超出你该做的工作，你应该得到奖励。给，拿着这些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make sure to stop by if you need a warm bed or supplies. You'll always be welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要温暖的床或物资，一定要过来。你在这里永远受欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing, I have another important task for you. I need you to find a woman named Joan Harris in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，我还有一件重要的任务要交给你。我要你去自由城找一个叫琼·哈里斯的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give her this letter. You'll be the bringer of bad news I'm afraid. We can't afford to give them their regular shipment of food this month.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这封信交给她，恐怕你得成为坏消息的传递者了。这个月我们没钱给他们运送定期食物了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to have to step up our raids if we want to help the people. We need to do better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们想帮助那些人，就得加大劫掠力度。我们需要做得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaVault23D_00031998_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 1 endif setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 162 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 162 1 player.additem aaTheVulturesFreesideDelivery 1 aaJoanHarrisRef.enable player.additems Caps001 1000 set aaRTBTheVulturesQuest.givenVulturesLights to 0
aaHoseaReadVault23Plans
Truly incredible! This could feed the whole of Vegas if we maintain this right. I'll have to talk more with Dexter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是不可思议！如果我们把这个维护好，可以养活整个拉斯维加斯的人。我得再和迪克斯特谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadVaul_0003199B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: These lights look really easy to work with. With a few UV lamps on hand, calibrating them shouldn't be difficult.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些灯看起来很好操作。只要手边有一些紫外灯，校准它们应该不难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadVaul_0003199B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scavenging those things will be the hard part. Either way, this could be our chance to show the people of Vegas that we're on their side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜集这些东西将是最困难的部分。无论如何，这可能是我们向维加斯的人民展示我们是站在他们一边的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadVaul_0003199B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could feed so many! Solve many of our supply issues as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以养活这么多人！也能解决我们的许多补给问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaReadVaul_0003199B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad we can use this to help so many people. Freeside and Westside could really use this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴我们可以用它来帮助这么多人，自由城和西区真的很需要这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me too! It would be good to talk with Jackie about this. I'll send her a letter sometime after we get these things built.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是！最好和杰姬谈谈这件事。等我们把这些东西做好以后，我会给她写封信的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get a slightly more official channel going. For now, we'll have to rely on folks we trust on the streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找一个稍微正式一点的渠道。现在，我们只能依靠我们在街上信任的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's once we figure out how to build them. The lights you found at the bottom of that Vault can be scavenged in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在我们弄清楚如何建造它们之后。与此同时，你在避难所底部找到的灯可以回收。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done so much for us. I'd like you to take this. Its more than enough for all your hard work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为我们做了这么多，我想让你拿着这个，这对你所有的辛勤工作来说都绰绰有余了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're ever in need of somewhere to sleep or to stock up on supplies. Know that you're always welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要一个地方睡觉或储备物资，要知道你在这里永远是受欢迎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing, I have another important task for you. I need you to find a woman named Joan Harris in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，我还有一件重要的任务要交给你。我要你去自由城找一个叫琼·哈里斯的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give her this letter. It contains a meeting location for the delivery of essential supplies for those desperate in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这封信给她，它包含了为自由城的绝望者运送必需品的会面地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the potential yields from those hydroponic lights, we can afford it. Now, before you go, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这些水培灯的潜在产量，我们可以负担得起了。在你走之前，还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199D_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additems Caps001 1000

if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 1 endif setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 1 player.additem aaTheVulturesFreesideDelivery 1 aaJoanHarrisRef.enable
Is that all this is to you? A recruitment tool?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你想要的？一个招聘工具？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think I'd let the people starve? If this leads those who are fed to join The Vultures then I'd call that a win/win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真以为我会让人们挨饿吗？如果这导致那些被喂饱的人加入秃鹫的行列，那么我认为这是双赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can judge me in all manner of ways but don't doubt my commitment to feeding the poor. Despite your feelings on me, you deserve a reward. Take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以用各种方式来评价我，但不要怀疑我为养活穷人所做的承诺。尽管你对我有看法，但你应该得到回报，拿着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're also welcome at Firewater Cave if you ever need somewhere to sleep or restock any ammunition or stims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要睡觉或补充弹药或兴奋剂的地方，烈酒洞穴也欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing, I have another important task for you. I need you to find a woman named Joan Harris in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，我还有一件重要的任务要交给你。我要你去自由城找一个叫琼·哈里斯的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give her this letter. It contains a meeting location for the delivery of essential supplies for those desperate in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这封信给她，它包含了为自由城的绝望者运送必需品的会面地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the potential yields from those hydroponic lights, we can afford it. Now, before you go, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这些水培灯的潜在产量，我们可以负担得起了。在你走之前，还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_0003199F_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additems Caps001 1000

if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 1 endif setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 1 player.additem aaTheVulturesFreesideDelivery 1 aaJoanHarrisRef.enable
Whatever. Just give me my caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，只要把我的瓶盖给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still a mercenary at heart are we? Fine take your money. It sounds like you don't enjoy our company. Either way, you're welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们骨子里还是个雇佣兵，是吧？好吧，拿上你的钱，听起来你不喜欢和我们在一起。不管怎样，你在这里都受欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_000319A1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever need somewhere to sleep or restock then Firewater Cave is open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要找个地方睡觉或补充物资，那么烈酒洞穴是开放的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_000319A1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing, I have another important task for you. I need you to find a woman named Joan Harris in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，我还有一件重要的任务要交给你。我要你去自由城找一个叫琼·哈里斯的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_000319A1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give her this letter. It contains a meeting location for the delivery of essential supplies for those desperate in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这封信给她，它包含了为自由城的绝望者运送必需品的会面地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_000319A1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the potential yields from those hydroponic lights, we can afford it. Now, before you go, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这些水培灯的潜在产量，我们可以负担得起了。在你走之前，还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaJudgeVau_000319A1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additems Caps001 1000

if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 130 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 1 endif setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 1 player.additem aaTheVulturesFreesideDelivery 1 aaJoanHarrisRef.enable
What's the problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR have us surrounded. They've gathered around the cave entrance demanding our surrender!
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR包围了我们，他们聚集在洞口要求我们投降！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C80_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We haven't given them any notion we're here so they won抰 know for certain. However, there's no way they leave without thoroughly checking this cave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还没告诉他们我们在这里，所以他们无法确定。然而，他们不彻底检查这个洞穴是不可能离开的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C80_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, it's only a matter of time before they blow the door down and assault the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，他们炸毁大门和攻击山洞只是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C80_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've probably got the most combat experience out of everyone here so I'll need you to take point. I hope you're okay with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能是这里所有人中战斗经验最丰富的了，所以我需要你带队，我希望你能接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C80_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like a scared rabbit. What the hell's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像一只受惊的兔子，到底发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're cornered! The NCR has us surrounded outside and are demanding our surrender. Damn right I'm scared but I won't go down without a fight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走投无路了！NCR把我们包围了，要求我们投降。没错，我很害怕，但我不会不战而降！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C82_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We haven't given them any notion we're here so they won抰 know for certain. However, there's no way they leave without thoroughly checking this cave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还没告诉他们我们在这里，所以他们无法确定。然而，他们不彻底检查这个洞穴是不可能离开的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C82_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's only a matter of time before they blow the door down and assault the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们炸毁大门和攻击山洞只是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C82_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've probably got the most combat experience out of everyone here so I'll need you to take point. I hope you're okay with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能是这里所有人中战斗经验最丰富的了，所以我需要你带队，我希望你能接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00031C82_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you serious? We have an entire squad worth of people to fight back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的？我们有一整个小队的人去反击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, deadly serious. Don't worry I'll get the people into a position ready to ambush as soon as the shooting starts. You won't be alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，非常严肃。别担心，一开始射击，我就会让大家就位准备伏击。你不会是一个人的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyShoul_00031F61_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhyShoul_00031F61_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, I need you to answer something for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我需要你为我解答一些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it fast. We don't have much time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要快点，我们没多少时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFightNcr_00032240_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good! Its about time we got rid of this pest. Let me know when you're ready and I can get the people into position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好！该是我们除掉这些害虫的时候了。准备好了告诉我，我让大家就位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFightNcr_0003251F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you not see them coming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么没料到他们会来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have the kinda tech you'd see lying about a Brotherhood bunker I'm afraid. Looks like they slipped in between our patrols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我们没有兄弟会地堡里的那种技术，看来他们是在我们巡逻的间隙溜进来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000327FE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wouldn't have thought that they'd have found us this easily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是没想到他们会这么容易找到我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000327FE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want me to kill them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我杀了他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the safest option for sure. You're welcome to try to persuade them to leave but I don't recommend it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这肯定是最安全的选择。你可以去劝他们离开，但我不建议这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032800_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rangers are the inquisitive type though. They leave no stone unturned. I can guarantee it's that lapdog Wilson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵是好奇心强的类型，他们不放过任何蛛丝马迹。我可以保证是那个哈巴狗威尔逊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032800_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's not stopped sniffing my trail for as long as I can remember. I'm hoping you can end this once and for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我记事起，她就一直在嗅我的踪迹。我希望你能一劳永逸地结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032800_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032800_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure there's no other escape route?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定没有其他逃生路线吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As far as I know, there's only one way into this cave. It was supposed to be sheltered from nuclear fallout as much as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，进入这个山洞只有一条路。应该是尽可能地避开了核辐射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032802_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if there were, I know what kinda scum Wilson likes to handpick. Any stragglers would be massacred just like the Khans at Bitter Springs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算有，我也知道威尔逊喜欢挑选什么样的人渣。任何掉队的人都会被屠杀就像苦泉镇的大汗帮一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032802_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're running out of time. I recommend being quick with the rest of your questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的时间已经不多了，我建议你尽快解决剩下的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032802_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to confess that the NCR sent me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须承认，是NCR派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You? You're the fucking rat? This is what I get for letting my guard down for one damn second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你？你他妈就是那个内奸？这就是我放松警惕的下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032804_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I'm shocked that they'd try to recruit you but I really thought you were different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们想要招募你，我倒不是很惊讶，但我真的觉得你不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032804_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have us surrounded but remember your NCR friends aren't here yet. We still have the advantage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能已经把我们包围了，但记住你的NCR朋友还没有来，我们仍然有优势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032804_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd think really carefully about what you say next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会仔细考虑你接下来说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032804_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think The Vultures have a point. I have no loyalty to the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为秃鹫说得很有道理，我对NCR没有忠诚可言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't tell us that you were with the NCR until now. Why should I trust you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你直到现在才告诉我们你是NCR的人，我为什么要相信你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032806_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackConfessionSideWithHoseaSpeechCheck
I can understand that. Maybe you've changed since you joined our ranks. I hope you're not going to make me regret this decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能理解这一点，也许你加入我们后改变了。我希望你不要让我后悔这个决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032808_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a strange feeling around you stranger. I don't know if its fate or if I'm just being foolish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你这个陌生人有一种奇怪的感觉，我不知道这是命运的安排还是我太蠢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032808_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what. Get rid of the wolves at the door and all is forgiven. Do that and you're one of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你吧，赶走门口的恶狼，一切都会得到原谅，那样你就是我们的一员了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032808_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXp 35
I heard what you had to say about the NCR. It's fair to say I was inspired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说了你对NCR的看法，可以说我受到了启发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a lot of people to keep safe, who all need me to lead them. I can't trust someone who'll change sides so quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要保护很多人的安全，他们都需要我来领导。我不相信这么快就改变立场的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032809_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll try to make this quick...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尽量快一点...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032809_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1
I don't really like the NCR anymore. You guys are way better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不喜欢NCR了，你们好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry but you guys are terrorist scum. Time to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，但你们是人渣恐怖分子。该去死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm disappointed that you turned out to be another bootlicker. You had so much potential.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很失望，原来你又是一个马屁精。你有这么大的潜力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003280B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't the day The Vultures fall. I won't be killed by some no-name mercenary. Vultures! This one is a traitor! Kill them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天可不是秃鹫倒下的日子，我不会被无名雇佣兵杀死的。秃鹫！这家伙是个叛徒！杀了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003280B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1
Pay me more caps and I'll deal with the NCR for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我更多的瓶盖，我就帮你对付NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a damn snake! You won't get a single cap from me! You're just like Hawthorne. In fact, you might actually be worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个该死的卑鄙小人！我一个瓶盖也不会给你的！你跟霍桑一样，事实上，你可能更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003280D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vultures! This one is a traitor! Let's get rid of this pest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 秃鹫！这家伙是个叛徒！让我们除掉这个害虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003280D_2.wav
