ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1
<Attack> Ah fuck this! Time to die!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>啊这他妈的！该去死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003280F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1
Okay. I'll deal with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我去对付NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful. I'm pretty sure it's Wilson out there. She's one of the sharpest shots in the Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点。我很确定那就是威尔逊，她是游骑兵中最犀利的枪手之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032811_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be there to back you up as soon as the shooting starts. Keep her busy near the door and we'll attack on your signal. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪声一响，我们就会去支援你。让她在门口附近忙碌，我们会根据你的信号进攻。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032811_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should surrender to the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该向NCR投降。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surrender? Why would we do that? Do you know what NCR does to criminals in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 投降？我们为什么要这么做？你知道NCR是怎么对付莫哈维的罪犯的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032813_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no fair trial. We'll be buried in the desert never to be seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有公正的审判，我们会被埋在沙漠里永远消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032813_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> If you won't surrender then die!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>如果你不投降，那就死吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? Vultures! Kill them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？秃鹫们！杀了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1
aaHoseaNcrAttackSurrenderInitialSpeechCheck
You... you could be right. This campaign has been rough. We've lost so much already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你可能是对的。这次运动非常艰难，我们已经失去太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been following my gut but where has that got us? Stuck in a damn cave with a firing squad pointed at us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在跟着我的直觉走，但那让我们怎么样了？被困在一个该死的洞里被行刑队指着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: First time you lose a soldier, it's a sacrifice that had to be made. One then becomes two. Before you know it, two becomes twenty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一次你失去一个士兵，这是必须做出的牺牲。一个变成两个，不知不觉，两个变成二十个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until eventually all the old guard are gone. Its just you and a bunch of new faces for the meat grinder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到最后所有的守旧者都消失了，只有你和一群新面孔被送进绞肉机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't bear to lose any more of them. I need your advice. What should we do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不忍心再失去任何一个人了。我需要你的建议，我们应该怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF4_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 45
A good leader wouldn't get his people into this situation in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个好的领袖一开始就不会让他的人民陷入这种境地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll get us out of this mess stranger. Just follow my lead and we'll be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我会帮我们摆脱这个烂摊子的。听我指挥，我们会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what we should do. We're all scared here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我们该怎么办，我们都很害怕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget I said anything. Was a dumb idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我说的话吧，这是个愚蠢的想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm glad you brought it up. Its always wise to discuss all the options available to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我很高兴你提起这件事，讨论所有可行的选择总是明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackSurrenderSneakCheck1
You're right! Those bastards just want me. The others could decide what to do from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对！那些杂种只想要我，其他人可以在那里决定怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, the NCR know I run with a gang. There's no way they don't scour this cave top to bottom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，NCR知道我和一个团伙在一起，他们不可能不从头到尾搜查这个山洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AF9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 50
You can still save everyone here. We could all hide in the cave while you distract them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仍然可以拯救这里的所有人。我们可以躲在山洞里，你去引开他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way the NCR don't come down and scour this cave top to bottom. There's too many of us not to get caught.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR不可能不下来把这个洞穴从头到脚搜个遍。我们人太多了，不可能不被抓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AFA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way. We need another way out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门，我们需要另一种方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00032AFA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can hide behind some rocks while you surrender. There's no way they'd even look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以在你投降的时候躲在一些石头后面，他们根本不可能看到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackSurrenderSneakCheckPartTwoUseSneak
I think it might be worth the risk. We might be able to wait this out underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得值得冒这个险，我们也许可以在地下等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The steel doors should be impenetrable from the outside. I don't even think a direct blast with TNT could blow them down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁门从外面应该是打不透的，我甚至认为TNT也不能直接炸开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With how stretched the NCR is, they can't siege us forever. Command will have them pull back at some point if they aren't getting results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于NCR的兵力有限，他们不可能永远围困我们。如果他们没有取得成果，指挥部会让他们在某个时间点撤走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's when we leave. I don抰 even think there抯 a need for me to surrender. I could hide in the bunker too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我们离开的时候。我甚至觉得我没必要投降，我也可以躲在地堡里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B6_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 60 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 250 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250 1 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 250 CompleteQuest aaRTBTheVulturesQuest set aaRTBNcrQuest.hoseaSurrendered to 1 set aaHoseaSurrenderCutScene.hoseaSurrendered to 1 DisablePlayerControls
They'll never find us under the flooring of the bunker if everyone keeps quiet with the lights off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果大家都关着灯保持安静，他们就永远也找不到躲在地堡下面的我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be a fool. An NCR Ranger won't be scared of a few ferals. They'll shoot us on sight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别犯傻了，一个NCR游骑兵不会怕几个野性尸鬼的，他们一看到我们就会开枪的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too risky! We stand a better chance if we hold our ground and fight them face to face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太冒险了！如果我们坚守阵地，与他们正面交锋，胜算更大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can pretend we're feral ghouls or something. Scare them off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以假装是野性尸鬼或什么的，把他们吓跑！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackSurrenderSneakUseAgilityOnSecondCheck
I think it might be worth the risk. We might be able to wait this out underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得值得冒这个险，我们也许可以在地下等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The steel doors should be impenetrable from the outside. I don't even think a direct blast with TNT could blow them down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁门从外面应该是打不透的，我甚至认为TNT也不能直接炸开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With how stretched the NCR is, they can't siege us forever. Command will have them pull back at some point if they aren't getting results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于NCR的兵力有限，他们不可能永远围困我们。如果他们没有取得成果，指挥部会让他们在某个时间点撤走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's when we leave. I don抰 even think there抯 a need for me to surrender. I could hide in the bunker too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我们离开的时候。我甚至觉得我没必要投降，我也可以躲在地堡里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330B9_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 80 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 250 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250 1 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 250 CompleteQuest aaRTBTheVulturesQuest set aaRTBNcrQuest.hoseaSurrendered to 1 set aaHoseaSurrenderCutScene.hoseaSurrendered to 1 DisablePlayerControls
I'll organise the people fairly quickly and we'll move to the bunker and hide underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽快组织好大家，然后我们会转移到地堡，躲到地下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its too risky. We'll have a higher chance of winning if we stand our ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太冒险了！如果我们坚守阵地，胜算可能会更大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000330BA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender to 1
Don't worry, we can run really fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我们可以跑得很快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackSurrenderSurvivalCheck1
Hydroponic lights? Down there? Unbelievable. The technical ingenuity of mankind never ceases to amaze me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水培灯？在那里？难以置信，人类的技术独创性总是让我惊叹不已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00033399_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'd mean there'd be plenty of food. How long do you think they could hole up down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就意味着会有很多食物，你觉得他们能在下面躲多久？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_00033399_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 40
I saw some edible mushrooms in Vault 23's caves and it has hydroponic lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在23号避难所的洞穴里看到了一些可食用的蘑菇，还有水培灯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mushrooms? Could be hallucinogenic or maybe poisonous. We can't take the risk with those. The vegetables you mentioned might be different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蘑菇？可能会引起幻觉，也可能有毒，我们不能冒这个险。你提到的蔬菜可能有所不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, we don't know how edible they are. It's been 200 years. The Vault could have poisoned the food or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们不知道它们能不能吃，已经过去200年了。避难所可能对食物或其他东西下了毒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault Tec are known for conducting all sorts of sick experiments. We can't risk it. Fighting is our best option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所科技以进行各种变态的实验而闻名，我们不能冒这个险，战斗是我们最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender to 1
I saw some mushrooms that we could maybe eat. Plus I saw vegetables or something down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到一些蘑菇，我们也许可以吃。而且我在下面还看到了蔬菜之类的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackSurrenderSurvivalCheckPartTwoUseSurvivalAgain
You think? I think it might be worth the risk. We might be able to wait this out underground then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为呢？我觉得值得冒这个险，我们也许可以在地下等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The steel doors should be impenetrable from the outside. I don't even think a direct blast with TNT could blow them down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁门从外面应该是打不透的，我甚至认为TNT也不能直接炸开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With how stretched the NCR is, they can't siege us forever. Command will have them pull back at some point if they aren't getting results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于NCR的兵力有限，他们不可能永远围困我们。如果他们没有取得成果，指挥部会让他们在某个时间点撤走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's when we leave. I don抰 even think there抯 a need for me to surrender. I could hide in the bunker too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我们离开的时候。我甚至觉得我没必要投降，我也可以躲在地堡里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 60
I reckon we've got enough to last for a few weeks and we won't run out with those lights down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们足以维持几个星期，而且下面的灯不会用光的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can't commit to this plan without specifics I'm afraid. I won't die hungry down in a cave and I doubt any of the others would like to either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我们不能在没有具体细节的情况下执行这个计划。我不会饿着肚子死在洞穴里，我怀疑其他人也不愿意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Standing our ground is the better option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚守阵地是更好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender to 1
Not really sure. Didn't exactly look so I couldn't tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不太确定。看起来不太像，所以我没法告诉你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaNcrAttackSurvivalCheck2UsePerception
You think? I think it might be worth the risk. We might be able to wait this out underground then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为呢？我觉得值得冒这个险，我们也许可以在地下等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The steel doors should be impenetrable from the outside. I don't even think a direct blast with TNT could blow them down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁门从外面应该是打不透的，我甚至认为TNT也不能直接炸开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With how stretched the NCR is, they can't siege us forever. Command will have them pull back at some point if they aren't getting results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于NCR的兵力有限，他们不可能永远围困我们。如果他们没有取得成果，指挥部会让他们在某个时间点撤走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's when we leave. I don抰 even think there抯 a need for me to surrender. I could hide in the bunker too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我们离开的时候。我甚至觉得我没必要投降，我也可以躲在地堡里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003339F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 70
The vegetables looked perfectly edible to me. Looked delicious honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些蔬菜在我看来完全可以吃。老实说，看起来很美味。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its a bit much of a risk to take while we have a concrete chance of surviving if we're able to take this NCR scum out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能把这个NCR人渣除掉，我们就有机会活下来，这样做有点冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000333A0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender to 1
Didn't really see anything wrong with the food down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没发现下面的食物有什么问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't go underground. The NCR will stay indefinitely until they know for sure if you're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能躲到地下。NCR会一直待在那里直到他们确定你是否在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I thought maybe there was still a chance we could make this work. Fate wouldn't be so kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，我想也许我们还有机会能成功。命运不会如此仁慈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003367F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wilson won't stop until I'm either dead or in prison. Perhaps I'll give her what she wants. Luckily my dream will live on through everyone here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 威尔逊不会善罢甘休，除非我死了或者进监狱，也许我会满足她的要求。幸运的是，我的梦想将通过这里的每个人延续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003367F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll be the next generation that'll change everything! Take the torch to the systems that've harmed so many.
ESP.TRADUIT: 改变一切的将是下一代！把火炬带到伤害了很多人的体制中去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 250 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250 1 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 250 CompleteQuest aaRTBTheVulturesQuest set aaRTBNcrQuest.hoseaSurrendered to 1 set aaHoseaSurrenderCutScene.hoseaSurrendered to 1 DisablePlayerControls
I have some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead. I'll answer what I can within reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请讲，我会在合理范围内回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C3C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好。还有什么我可以为你做的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C3E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long have you hunted Hosea?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你追捕何西阿有多久了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been on this mark for a year now. At first, the brass didn't really take him serious. Nothing more than a pest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经为这个目标奋斗一年了。一开始，高层并没有把他当回事，只不过是一种害虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C40_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robbed a few caravans here and there, kidnappings from a few big caravan outfits. Notable but nothing massive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 四处抢劫了几辆大篷车，绑架了几个大商队。值得注意，但并不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C40_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So they sent bounty hunters after him but they all seemed to disappear or find no trace of the man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他们派赏金猎人去追捕他，但他们似乎都消失了，或者找不到这个人的任何踪迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C40_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally, Mr Hawthorne had enough when the attacks were digging into his bottom line. "Ms Wilson, I need you to take care of the problem" he says.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，当攻击直指他的底线时，霍桑受够了。他说:“威尔逊女士，我需要你解决这个问题。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C40_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd already taken care of a few Jackal cells by that point. So I said: 慽t'd be my pleasure.?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时我已经搞定了几个豺狼帮的基层组织，于是我说:"是我的荣幸。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C40_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see where the bounty hunters have had issues. Hosea is a hard man to find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道赏金猎人有什么问题了，何西阿是个很难找到的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C40_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is it you're from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是哪里人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was born in a little town called Modoc. Was cosy enough when I was growing up but a little boring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出生在一个叫摩多克的小镇。在我成长的过程中很舒适，但有点无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C42_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and my brother enlisted soon as I turned eighteen and him twenty. Sadly, he was killed in action against those Viper scumbags.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我哥哥在我十八岁、他二十岁时入伍了。不幸的是，他在对付那些毒蛇帮人渣的行动中被杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C42_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Made those bastards pay but it still doesn抰 get any easier after all these years. After that, I asked to be transferred to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让那些混蛋付出了代价，但这么多年过去了，事情还是没有好转。在那之后，我要求调到莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C42_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, this shithole of a desert feels more like home than Modoc ever was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，沙漠这个鬼地方比摩多克更像家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C42_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are The Vultures after?
ESP.TRADUIT: 秃鹫的目的是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who really cares? Raiders are all the same to me. Best just killing them. But Hosea, like a lot of bosses, thinks himself an idealist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁真的在乎？掠夺者对我来说都一样，最好直接杀了他们。但何西阿和许多老板一样，认为自己是个理想主义者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C44_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's that idealism when he and his gang are shooting men and women with families in the back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他和他的帮派在背后射杀有家人的男人和女人时，理想主义在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonC_00033C44_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever met Hosea?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过何西阿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have once. Didn't realise it was him though as no-one knew what he looked like at the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过一次。当时没人知道他长什么样，所以没意识到那就是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonH_00033C46_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was before the papers came out with the name "Vultures" for his gang. He knew I was hunting him for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在报纸把他的帮派命名为“秃鹫”之前，他肯定知道我在追捕他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonH_00033C46_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was off duty at the time and was trying to wind down. He buys me a few drinks and starts talking politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时我已经下班了，正想放松一下。他请我喝了几杯，开始谈论政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonH_00033C46_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't quite remember but we started arguing and I ended up getting thrown out the bar. Barkeep said I'd had too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太记得了，但我们开始争吵，最后我被赶出了酒吧。酒保说我喝多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonH_00033C46_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The next day, another caravan gets robbed and that's when I see his picture in the papers. It was him. An old vulnerable looking man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二天，又有一支商队被抢了，就在那时我在报纸上看到了他的照片。是他，一个看起来很脆弱的老人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonH_00033C46_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody would've suspected what he was capable of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人会怀疑他的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonH_00033C46_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveHoseaSurrenderedForceGreeting
Well, well! If it isn't the hero of the hour! I wouldn't have thought Hosea would have surrendered; never mind because of a common mercenary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧！这不是我们的英雄吗！我没想到何西阿会投降，更不会因为一个普通的雇佣兵而投降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000344F1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and the NCR brass owe you a drink for sure. He's been a real difficult mark to pin down. Always escaping just in the nick of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和NCR的高层欠你一杯酒。他是一个很难抓住的目标，总是在关键时刻逃脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000344F1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not any more. He's off to an NCR prison now and he better sleep with one eye open. People don't take kindly to terrorists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在不是了，他现在要去NCR监狱了。他睡觉最好睁一只眼闭一只眼，人们不喜欢恐怖分子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000344F1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, strange thing is that he came to us alone. I just wonder where the rest of his gang are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，奇怪的是他是一个人来找我们的。我只是想知道他的同伙在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000344F1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't know anything about that would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对此一无所知，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000344F1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: EnablePlayerControls
Think about all the people you might lose for a completely avoidable scenario. And their families.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想你可能会因为一个完全可以避免的情况而失去所有的人，以及他们的家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all formed this gang together. We're family. They're willing to sacrifice everything for a better future!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一起组成了这个帮派，我们是一家人。他们愿意为了更好的未来牺牲一切！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR can change without The Vultures. The Followers remain popular within NCR land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有秃鹫，NCR也能改变。追随者在NCR的土地上仍然很受欢迎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't make me laugh! The NCR will never change unless it is forced to. The Followers can't do a damn thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别逗我笑了！NCR永远不会改变，除非它被迫改变，天启追随者什么都做不了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure they help a lot of people but that's out of charity. I want a society where the concept of charity isn't needed anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然他们帮助了很多人，但那是出于慈善。我想要一个不再需要慈善概念的社会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without The Vultures I don't see how we can get there. No, I refuse to let us die here like lambs to the slaughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有秃鹫，我看不出我们如何到达那里。不，我拒绝让我们像待宰的羔羊一样死在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll fight those NCR dogs to the last man if needed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果需要的话，我们会和那些NCR的走狗战斗到最后一人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F5_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender to 1
I think The Vultures might be doing more bad than good. The Legion might win at the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得秃鹫做的坏事可能多于好事。军团可能会在大坝上获胜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe in choosing the lesser of two evils. I'd rather not choose at all. I want a future where the people can get what they work for!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信两害相权取其轻，我宁愿不做选择。我想要一个人们努力工作能有回报的未来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not one where we live to line the pockets of the powerful. We deserve more than that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不是为了让权贵中饱私囊而活的，我们应该得到更多！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without The Vultures I don't see how we can get there! No. I refuse to let us die here like lambs to the slaughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有秃鹫，我看不出我们如何到达那里。不，我拒绝让我们像待宰的羔羊一样死在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F7_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll fight those NCR dogs to the last man if needed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果需要的话，我们会和那些NCR的走狗战斗到最后一人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_000344F7_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue.haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender to 1
They shouldn't have to die. A good leader could still get them out this situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不应该死。一个好的领导仍然可以让他们走出这种局面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. They are inside the cave down there in the bunker if you go deep inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。如果你深入地下，他们就在地堡里的洞穴里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which means they'll be real difficult to flush out there without getting shot at. I'll radio command to try and get a breach and clear squad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着他们很难在不被射杀的情况下被赶出那里。我用无线电通知指挥部，试着找一个突破和清理小队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347D8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They should be able to clear that out no problem with the firepower they're carrying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以他们所携带的火力，应该可以将其清除，没有问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347D8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave that to them. You've already fulfilled your end of the bargain and you should be rewarded for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们来做吧。你已经完成了你的交易，你应该得到回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347D8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 1000
<Lie> When Hosea made me do his dirty work, he seemed to have evacuated the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>何西阿让我替他干脏活时似乎就已经离开了洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smart. Spreading his resources around. Perhaps he was trying to make a martyr of himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 聪明，分散他的资源。也许他想让自己成为殉道者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, maybe we'll need to rough him up some to get answers out of him before I take him to Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，在我带他去沙荫镇之前，也许我们得好好教训他一下才能问出他的答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you've fulfilled your end of the bargain and you should be rewarded for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你已经完成了你的交易，你应该得到回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 1000
Are we finished here then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们在这里结束了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I'd say so. The NCR doesn't forget its allies. You had our back and we'll make sure to have yours in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想是的。NCR不会忘记盟友，你是我们的后盾，将来我们也会支持你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take these caps. You certainly deserve them. And have a little bonus for getting Kimball his show trial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这些瓶盖，这当然是你应得的。还能为金博尔得到他的审判而获得一些奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing, Mr Hawthorne, the father of the girl who Hosea murdered, wants to thank you for capturing the bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，霍桑先生，何西阿谋杀的那个女孩的父亲，想感谢你抓住了那个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DC_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He doesn't like to be kept waiting so head on to the Ultra Luxe on The Strip as soon as you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不喜欢一直等着，所以赶紧去长街的超美多酒店吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DC_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's most likely dining in the restaurant, the Gourmand. Good luck. I've heard he can be a real generous fellow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很可能在老饕餐厅吃饭。祝你好运，我听说他是个很慷慨的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DC_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 250 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 251 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 251 player.additem Caps001 200 aaJackHawthorneRef.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard01Ref.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard02Ref.enable
Now that Hosea has been captured, what will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在何西阿被抓了，你要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: War's ratcheting up over the Dam so who knows if they'll need me or not. I'm hoping I get approved for some shore leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坝那边的战争正在升级，谁知道他们需不需要我。我希望我能获准上岸休假。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to blow off some steam in New Reno. The booze is cheaper there and I'm a proud cheapskate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想去新里诺发泄一下。那里的酒更便宜，我是个骄傲的吝啬鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347DE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will happen to Hosea now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿现在会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got orders to take him to Shady Sands. If it were up to me, I'd just shoot him here and bury him just down the hill. Take no chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接到命令带他去沙荫镇。如果由我来决定，我会在这里杀了他然后把他埋在山下，不要冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347E0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reckon Kimball wants to put him on trial. Try and claw back some of those approval ratings. Way I heard it, he's not too popular back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来金博尔想把他送上法庭，试着挽回一些支持率。据我所知，他在国内不太受欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347E0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bloody war with the Legion will do that. You know politicians, assholes always want to put on a show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和军团打一场血战就能做到。你知道的，政客这种混蛋总是喜欢装模作样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000347E0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveHoseaDeadForceGreeting
Oh its you. Forgive all the guns. We weren't sure if those bastards had killed you. Pretty impressive you managed to take them all without us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是你，原谅这些枪，我们不确定那些混蛋是不是已经杀了你。真厉害，你居然能在没有我们的情况下全部拿下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened down there. Is that fucker dead down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么下面发生了什么，那混蛋死了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: EnablePlayerControls
Don't worry, I took care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我已经搞定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would have been nice to get a shot at him myself but regardless you've done a great job. Take these caps. You deserve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能亲自动手就好了，但不管怎样你做得很好。拿着这些瓶盖，这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR never forgets its allies so I'll be sure to mention you by name to the brass.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR从来不会忘记盟友，所以我一定会向上级提到你的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll be good to do something other than hunting down that terrorist scum. Ideally, I'd like to sip on a nice glass of wine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了追捕那个恐怖分子渣滓，做点别的事也不错。理想情况下，我想啜饮一杯好酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 1000
He's in the ground. Really glad I had to do all the work myself. Cowards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他已经入土了，很高兴我自己做了所有的工作。懦夫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch your mouth. Do you know how long I've been hunting that scum? Charging into a narrow chokepoint isn't exactly the most tactical option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说话客气点。你知道我追捕那个人渣多久了吗？冲进狭窄的咽喉并不是最具战术意义的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would have been a meat grinder so I don't appreciate your tone. Either way, you did a good job despite your lack of manners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就像绞肉机，所以我不喜欢你的语气。不管怎样，你做得很好，尽管你不懂礼貌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take these caps. You deserve them. Regardless of how much you care, you've really lifted some weight off my shoulders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这些瓶盖，你应得的。不管你有多在乎，你真的帮我减轻了不少负担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll be good to do something other than hunting down that terrorist scum. Ideally, I'd like to sip on a nice glass of wine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了追捕那个恐怖分子渣滓，做点别的事也不错。理想情况下，我想啜饮一杯好酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 1000
What will happen to the Vultures now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在秃鹫会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean the ones you didn't kill in the cave? We'll arrest those still down there and if they resist they'll be shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说你在山洞里没杀的那些吗？我们会逮捕那些还在下面的人，如果他们反抗就会被枪毙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any stragglers out there who were out on a supply run will also be liable to arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何跑出去补给的掉队者也会被逮捕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are we done here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们到此为止了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you've done more than your fair share. Its good to work with a merc when they're efficient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你所做的比你应得的要多。与雇佣兵合作是件好事，因为他们很有效率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing, Jack Hawthorne, the father of the girl who Hosea murdered, wants to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，杰克·霍桑，何西阿谋杀的那个女孩的父亲，想见你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably wants to thank you for finding and killing the man who killed his daughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是想感谢你找到并杀死了杀害他女儿的凶手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard he's a real generous fella so I wouldn't keep him waiting. Good luck and I hope to work with you again sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他是个很慷慨的人，所以是我的话不会让他久等。祝你好运，希望有机会再和你一起工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00034AC9_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 245 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 251 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 251 aaJackHawthorneRef.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard01Ref.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard02Ref.enable
With Hosea dead, what will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿死了，你现在要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: War's ratcheting up over the Dam so who knows if they'll need me or not. I'm hoping I get approved for some shore leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坝那边的战争正在升级，谁知道他们需不需要我。我希望我能获准上岸休假。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035085_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to blow off some steam in New Reno. The booze is cheaper there and I'm a proud cheapskate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想去新里诺发泄一下。那里的酒更便宜，我是个骄傲的吝啬鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035085_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveStatusQuoWhistleblowForceGreeting
Hold your fire everyone! Its the mercenary I hired to track that son of a bitch Hosea down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家别开枪！这是我雇来追踪何西阿那个混蛋的雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035087_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now to business, we've come exactly as we've promised. You've been a great help but don't worry we can handle this problem from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在说正事，我们已经完全兑现了我们的承诺。你帮了大忙，但别担心，我们现在就能解决这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035087_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, you're welcome to join us in wiping the grin off that old rat bastard's face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，欢迎你和我们一起把那个老混蛋脸上的笑容抹去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035087_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: EnablePlayerControls
aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveStatusQuoNcrDisloyalForceGreeting
Hold your fire everyone! Its the mercenary I hired to track that son of a bitch Hosea down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家别开枪！这是我雇来追踪何西阿那个混蛋的雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035089_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well. Long time no see. I thought you'd forgotten about us but it seems like you just forgot to report in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧，好久不见了。我以为你已经忘记我们了，看来你只是忘了报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035089_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I wonder: did you really forget or has Hosea poisoned you against us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我想知道：你是真的忘记了还是何西阿毒害了你来对付我们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035089_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: EnablePlayerControls
It'd be my pleasure to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you're loyal at least. Now, listen up everyone! This merc here, is to be treated like one of us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你还算忠诚。现在，大家听好了！这个雇佣兵，要像我们自己人一样对待！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_0003508B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful with your angles, I don't want any collateral damage here! Let's make this quick and clean!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心你的角度，我不希望有任何附带伤害！让我们快速而干净地解决这个问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_0003508B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's take this Vulture bastard down and maybe if we're lucky we can all stop for beers in Vegas before we go back to Camp Golf!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们干掉这个秃鹫混蛋，如果幸运的话我们可以在回高尔夫营地之前去拉斯维加斯喝杯啤酒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_0003508B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone form up on me! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家在我面前列队！我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_0003508B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 SetEnemy NCRFactionNV aaTheVultures 0 0 aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.RemoveScriptPackage aaNcrTrooperDrawGunPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonTemporaryCompanionFollowPackage aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1
You're mistaken Wilson. I'm not here to take The Vultures down. I'm here to take you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你错了，威尔逊。我不是来打倒秃鹫的，我是来打倒你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh for fuck sake. Don't tell me you've fallen for Hosea's lies too. Why couldn't you have been a good little merc and just followed the caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢为了他妈的这个。别告诉我你也上了何西阿的当，为什么你就不能做一个好的小佣兵，只跟着瓶盖走？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035656_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me why. What did that asshole tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我为什么，那个混蛋告诉你什么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035656_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 SetEnemy aaTheVultures aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 SetAlly aaTheVultures PlayerFaction aaVultureNcrFight01Ref.enable aaVultureNcrFight02Ref.enable setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1
The NCR don't care about the people of Vegas. They just care about Lake Mead and the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR并不在乎拉斯维加斯的人民，他们只在乎米德湖和大坝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonsense. Hosea is a liar! Without us, this place would be pure wasteland and you'd all be living under the thumb of the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说八道，何西阿是个骗子！没有我们，这个地方将是纯粹的废土，你们都将生活在恶魔帮的控制之下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_00035658_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the republic's critics are the same. They think its all easy but they don't realise that sometimes you've gotta crack a few eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有共和国的批评者都是一样的。他们认为这一切都很容易，但他们没有意识到，有时你必须打破几个鸡蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_00035658_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's start with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们从你开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_00035658_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Taxes... man...
Uh oh, listen up everyone. We've got another one of those Jet addicts. Take em down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哦，大家听好了，又来了个杰特瘾君子。干掉他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
The NCR's laws are broken. They only work for the richest in NCR society.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR的法律已经被破坏了，他们只为NCR社会中最富有的人工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've definitely been listening to Hosea's rhetoric. If you mean the brahmin barons, none of us would have jobs without them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定听到了何西阿的言论。如果你指的是婆罗门大亨，没有他们我们谁也找不到工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No wages. No workers. No workers then no meat on the table for you and I. I think you're all just scared of a little hard work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有工资，没有工人。没有工人，你和我的餐桌上就没有肉，我认为你们都只是害怕一点点的辛苦工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the critics of the republic are the same. They criticise without realising that the world isn't all sunshine and rainbows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有批评共和国的人都是一样的，他们批评时没有意识到这个世界并不全是阳光和彩虹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes law and order requires cracking a few eggs. Let's start with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时法律和秩序需要打破几个鸡蛋，让我们从你开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Don't really have a reason. I guess I just don't like NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实没有什么原因，我想我只是不喜欢NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't be the first. Well, I guess that makes you no different from a typical raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是第一个，我想这让你和一般的掠夺者没什么区别了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, killing you will be easy. Just like all the other raiders I've taken down over the years. Everyone, open fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，杀你很容易，就像这些年来我抓过的其他掠夺者一样。所有人，开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0003565E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveStatusQuoSpeechCheckPartOne
What do you mean cut tail and run? Didn't you try and stop them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是断尾而逃？你没有试图阻止他们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035C1E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 35
The bastard cut tail and run. Him and the gang got out before I could return fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个杂种断尾求生了，他和那帮人在我能够还击之前就跑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not a very good liar. You could have thought of a convincing story at the very least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不太会撒谎，你至少应该想出一个令人信服的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035C1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you really think that'd work? Well, if you're not with us then you're against us. Tell me. What did that bastard say to convince you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得这样有用？如果你不支持我们，你就是我们的敌人。告诉我，那个混蛋说了什么说服你了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035C1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 SetEnemy aaTheVultures aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 aaVultureNcrFight01Ref.enable aaVultureNcrFight02Ref.enable setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1 aaRangerWilsonCampGolfRef.disable
So basically, they um... ran away just before you got here. May as well go home now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以基本上，他们嗯...就在你来之前跑了。不如现在就回家吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveStatusQuoSpeechCheckPartTwoUseSpeech
I guess if I were in your shoes, I'd probably do the same and wait for backup. For fuck sake, I really thought we had him this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想如果我是你，我可能也会这么做，等待后援。看在上帝的份上，我真以为这次我们抓到他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really wanted to put this chapter behind me but looks like I'll be tracking this scumbag forever at this rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想把这一章抛之脑后，但照这样下去，我恐怕要永远追踪这个人渣了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll get him in the end though. There's no way he gets away, not with everything he's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们最终会抓到他的。他不可能逃脱惩罚的，他做了那么多坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, you were able to get inside his crew and get him to trust you even if it was only for a short time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你还是能够进入他的团队，让他信任你，即使只是很短的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's at least more than we've had in the past. I don't know what happens where you're from but hard work pays off in the republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这至少比我们过去得到的要多。我不知道你来自哪里，但在共和国努力工作是会有回报的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take these caps. You deserve them. Although, I'm only allowed to give you a fraction of the original agreed sum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这些瓶盖，你应得的。不过，我只能给你最初约定金额的一小部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't look at me like that, not my decision. Technically the job was only half complete and the brass makes the rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别那样看着我，不是我的决定。从技术上讲，这项工作只完成了一半，规则是由高层制定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of which, we need to head back to Camp Golf, I don't wanna contaminate the camp, destroy some evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到这个，我们得回高尔夫营地了，我不想污染营地，破坏一些证据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There must be some clue to where the bastard's went. Anyway, it's been good doing business with you. Perhaps I'll see you at Camp Golf sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定有什么线索知道那混蛋去哪了。总之，跟你做生意很愉快，也许哪天我能在高尔夫营地见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035EFE_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 500

RewardXP 55 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 155 1 set aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue.wilsonHasSurrendered to 1 DisablePlayerControls
Hosea tried to kill me. I was outnumbered so I hid knowing that an elite ranger force was coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿想杀我，我寡不敌众，所以我藏了起来，因为我知道一支精锐游骑兵部队要来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not a very good liar. You could have thought of a convincing story at the very least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不太会撒谎，你至少应该想出一个令人信服的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035F00_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you really think that'd work? Well, if you're not with us then you're against us. Tell me. What did that bastard say to convince you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得这样有用？如果你不支持我们，你就是我们的敌人。告诉我，那个混蛋说了什么说服你了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_00035F00_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 SetEnemy aaTheVultures aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 aaVultureNcrFight01Ref.enable aaVultureNcrFight02Ref.enable setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1 aaRangerWilsonCampGolfRef.disable
It was all chaos man. Hosea knew I was with the NCR then I tripped and fell and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都很混乱，伙计。何西阿知道了我是NCR的人，然后我摔倒了...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveStatusQuoSpeechCheckPartTwoUseMed
That sounds very unlucky. Yeah I don't think you'd be able to get very far if you're not able to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来很不吉利。是的，我认为如果你不能跑的话，你也走不了太远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000361E2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd go see the Followers' clinic in North Vegas to go get that one checked. It could be serious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去北维加斯的天启追随者诊所检查一下，可能很严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000361E2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For fuck sake, I really thought we had him this time. What are the chances of that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干他妈的，我真以为这次能抓到他。这种可能性有多大？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000361E2_3.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000361E2_4.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们最终会抓到他的。他不可能逃脱惩罚的，他做了那么多坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonF_000361E2_5.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定有什么线索知道那混蛋去哪了。总之，跟你做生意很愉快，也许哪天我能在高尔夫营地见到你。
