ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for making everything clear to me. Don't take this the wrong way but you're wiser than you look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你把一切都告诉我。别误会，但你比看起来要聪明得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I go, I have one last favour to ask you. If you ever see Jackie again. Give her this note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我走之前，我还要请你帮最后一个忙。如果你再见到杰姬，把这张纸条给她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would really appreciate it if you granted this old man his dying wish. Now, its about time I'm off... Look after everyone, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能满足这位老人的遗愿，我会非常感激的。现在，我该走了...照顾好所有人，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D2_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaHoseaLetterToJackie 1
Fucking hell. You never stop talking. Go to the NCR before we get blown the fuck up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的。你说个不停，在我们被炸死之前赶紧去NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I'll need to quickly say my goodbyes to everyone and let them know what's happening first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。我得赶紧跟大家道别，让他们先知道发生了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for making everything clear to me. Don't take this the wrong way but you're wiser than you look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你把一切都告诉我。别误会，但你比看起来要聪明得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I go, I have one last favour to ask you. If you ever see Jackie again. Give her this note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我走之前，我还要请你帮最后一个忙。如果你再见到杰姬，把这张纸条给她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would really appreciate it if you granted this old man his dying wish. Now, its about time I'm off... Look after everyone, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能满足这位老人的遗愿，我会非常感激的。现在，我该走了...照顾好所有人，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaHoseaLetterToJackie 1
<Attack> The only way you're going underground is when I put you six feet under!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>唯一能让你逃到地下的办法就是我把你埋到六英尺深的地方！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! What?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrAttac_0003C3D6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 241 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1
Hosea has surrendered to the NCR. He told me to give you this letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿已经向NCR投降了，他让我把这封信交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait. Hosea surrendered? That letter! Show it to me please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，何西阿投降了？那封信！请给我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Jackie reads the letter>
ESP.TRADUIT: <杰姬读信>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That corny old bastard's the same as he was the day he left. I'd do anything to see that crooked smile on his face one more time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个老不死的混蛋还是他离开时的样子。我愿意做任何事，只要能再看到他脸上那扭曲的笑容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for bringing me this. I assume you were the one that convinced him to turn himself in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你给我带来这个，我猜是你说服他去自首的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did the right thing. Hosea went down a dark path. One that's hard to claw your way back from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做了正确的事。何西阿走上了一条黑暗的道路，这条路很难再走下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stopped him before it was too late and I'd like to thank you for that. Although, I really wish I could've said goodbye one last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你及时阻止了他，我想为此感谢你。不过，我真希望我能说最后一次再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have to ask Julie for some time away from the Fort. Shady Sands is a long way from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得向朱莉请求离开要塞一段时间，沙荫镇离这里很远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to have this vintage whiskey, one of the patients brought it to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想把这瓶陈年威士忌给你，是一个病人给我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wanted me to have it because he didn't trust himself with it the poor soul. I don't really like whiskey much so I thought you might like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想让我拿着它，因为他不相信自己那可怜的灵魂。我不太喜欢威士忌，所以我想你可能会喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't then I'm sure you can get a fair price for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不喜欢，我相信你也可以得到一个合理的价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_0003C992_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaHoseaLetterToJackie 1
player.additem aaVintageWhiskey 1
Hosea has given me a task to prove myself. He wants me to steal an NCR caravan schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿给了我一个任务来证明自己，他要我去偷一张NCR商队的日程表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That makes sense. We've tried to get someone in their ranks for a while now. Each time, we've lost contact with them not long after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这说得通。我们一直想找个人加入他们的阵营，每一次，我们都在不久后与他们失去了联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0003CF52_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll be needing that schedule so he can stage an ambush on one of those caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他需要那个日程表，这样他就可以伏击其中一辆大篷车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0003CF52_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. Take this holotape, this is an old schedule for NCR Ranger patrols. Don't worry, these have all changed months ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿着这个全息磁带，这是NCR游骑兵的旧日程表。别担心，这些在几个月前就已经改了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0003CF52_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We use the same kind of structure as those corn caravans so Hosea likely won't be able to tell the difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们使用的是和那些玉米商队相同的结构，所以何西阿可能无法分辨两者的区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0003CF52_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just be careful, those Vultures seem to always see us coming. Now, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，那些秃鹫似乎总是能看到我们的到来。还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0003CF52_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 25 1 player.additem aaRTBCaravanSchedule 1
The NCR must be full of fools for that to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR肯定是一群傻瓜才会发生这种事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR has plenty of fools within its borders but I wouldn't blame the common man. The majority probably don't support the greed of the barons.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR境内有很多傻瓜，但我不会责怪普通人。大多数人可能不支持大亨们的贪婪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeopleVo_0003D231_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It starts to make sense when you take a glimpse at the top donations given to each of the largest parties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看一看各大政党获得的最高捐款数额，你就会明白这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeopleVo_0003D231_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the biggest contributors in the past three elections since Tandi's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看坦蒂死后过去三次选举中最大的捐款人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeopleVo_0003D231_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The same names keep popping up. Gunderson, Hawthorne, Weston. However, the people still end up attempting to choose the lesser evil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同样的名字不断出现，冈德森、霍桑、韦斯顿。然而，人们最终还是试图选择较小的邪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPeopleVo_0003D231_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR sounds like its rotten to the core.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR听起来像是腐烂到了极点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. It is. Politicians live and die by their funding. Just like everything else in this world, money is king.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，它就是。政客们的生死取决于他们的资金，就像这个世界上的一切一样，金钱为王。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAgreeThe_0003D233_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people have massive influence on the policies each political party run on to the point where the working man does not have a representative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人对每个政党的政策都有巨大的影响，以至于工人们没有代表。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAgreeThe_0003D233_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so it was, a lie sold to the people. A truly free market that would allow anyone with the determination to be a success in the republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实就是这样，一个卖给人民的谎言。一个真正自由的市场，让任何有决心的人都能在共和国取得成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAgreeThe_0003D233_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what a lie it was. The farmhands who voted Kimball in are working longer hours and getting paid less than what they were all those years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个多么大的谎言。那些投票给金博尔的农场工人比多年前工作更长时间，得到的报酬却更少了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAgreeThe_0003D233_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Small caravans businesses and ranch owners have been pushed out the market compeltely as the bigger outfits monopolize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小型商队企业和牧场主已经被完全挤出了市场，因为大企业垄断了市场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAgreeThe_0003D233_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that a system you think is worth saving?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为这是一个值得挽救的体制吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAgreeThe_0003D233_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you and the Vultures do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和秃鹫现在要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the blueprints for these lights, we'll have access to our own farms without any need for natural sunlight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这些灯的蓝图，我们就可以获得自己的农场，而不需要任何自然阳光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the type of war we're fighting, this'll do wonders for morale. The real problem is getting a steady stream of UV lamps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于我们正在进行的战争，这对鼓舞士气有奇效。真正的问题是要有源源不断的紫外线灯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, we'll run out of places to scavenge them. Dexter is a clever man though, more of an expert on tech than I am and it's not even close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我们会用完可以搜刮的地方。虽然迪克斯特是个聪明人，比我更像一个技术专家，但这还远远不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've found plenty of pre-war science books and tech manuals. There's bound to be something in one of those that could help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们找到了很多战前的科学书籍和技术手册，其中肯定有什么能帮上忙的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The instructions that you delivered are great but they seem to assume you have all the UV lamps you could ever need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提供的说明很好，但他们似乎假设你有所有你可能需要的紫外线灯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, knowledge is power and nothing is stopping us from learning how to construct them ourselves. To tell you the truth stanger, I'm optimistic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，知识就是力量，没有什么能阻止我们学习如何自己构建它们。告诉你吧，新来的，我很乐观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vultures haven't been in a better place and we have you to thank for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 秃鹫的处境从未如此之好，这要感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm honestly not sure. The trip to this cave has been a massive waste of time for all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我也不确定。这次洞穴之旅对我们所有人来说都浪费了大量的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We travelled all the way out here and have had nothing to show for it. I think we'll have to relocate, try and slowly build our ranks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们大老远跑过来却一无所获。我认为我们必须重新安置，努力慢慢建立我们的队伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I doubt we'll have the numbers we need to have any real impact after the NCR defend the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑在NCR保卫大坝之后，我们是否有足够的人数来产生真正的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatWill_0003E36E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So overall, so-so. Let's discuss other matters. Is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总的来说，一般般，让我们讨论其他的事情吧。还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be seeing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I forgot to mention, I met Billy Jackson back in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我忘了说，我在自由之城遇到了比利·杰克逊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh you did? I hope he's doing alright. I worry that he'll get a bit lonely without much company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你吗？我希望他过得很好，我担心他没有人陪伴会有点孤单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have to stop by sometime and see him for old time's sake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在过去的份上，我得找个时间去看看他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the delivery go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 送货怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah it went off without a hitch. Met the contact, not sure if you've met him, guy called Clarence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，顺利完成了。见到了联络人，不知道你是否见过他，他叫克莱伦斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I heard it, they're already putting it to good use. Heard we've hit a caravan already. Those supplies could really do some good in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，他们已经在好好利用它了。听说我们已经袭击了一辆大篷车了，那些物资真的可以造福世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not so great. The contact didn't turn up to the meeting point. Was supposed to meet a guy called Clarence and he just didn't show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不太好。联络人没有出现在会面地点，本来要去见一个叫克莱伦斯的人，但他却没来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope nothing bad happened to him. I brought the schedule here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望他没出什么事，我把日程表带来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won't be able to put it to use until we get it into the hands of some field agents though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过除非我们把它交给一些外勤探员，否则我们无法使用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E7_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least, that's what Hosea tells me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少，何西阿是这样告诉我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [010402DC] (mod) Quest : ([010402DE]aaRTBFrankAdamsFirewaterCaveDialogue) 010402DE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsFir_000402E7_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDelacroixHolotapeOne
Doctor's log. November 15, 2077. Things have stabilized around here faster than all original expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生的日志，2077年11月15日。这里的局势稳定的速度比预期的要快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402EC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No rads on any of of our people either. Thank god everyone is safe even if we're all a little shook up still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的人也没有受到辐射。感谢上帝，每个人都很安全，即使我们都有点震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402EC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gray tells me the lead lined walls have kept the radiation out. Weird, the instruments outside haven't picked up any ionization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 葛雷告诉我，衬铅的墙壁将辐射挡在了外面。奇怪的是，外面的仪器并没有发现任何电离现象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402EC_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be a fault caused by the strike. Maybe they're busted. Best to keep locked up for now, not worth the risk of checking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定是罢工引起的故障，也许被破坏了。最好暂时锁起来，不值得冒险检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402EC_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDelacroixHolotapeTwo
Doctor's log. February 26th, 2078. Perhaps we were too optimistic with our original readings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生的日志，2078年2月26日。也许我们原来的读数太乐观了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't the walls that kept the radiation out. Turns out that Vegas wasn't actually hit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是墙壁把辐射挡住了。事实证明，拉斯维加斯实际上并没有被击中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We braved a few expeditions and it turns out House was able to destroy the bombs before they could impact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们勇敢地进行了几次探险，结果发现豪斯能够在核弹撞击地面之前摧毁它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, the walls had some unanticipated gaps according to Gray and we're now suffering from the effects of exposure to nuclear fallout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，根据葛雷的说法，这些墙有一些意料之外的缺口，我们现在正遭受着核辐射的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a decent supply of Radaway which should allow us to get by. However, we'll need a long term solution and fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有足够的辐特宁，应该能让我们撑过去。然而，我们需要一个长期的解决方案，而且要快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully we can get that bastard Reeves to open the Vault door. We're willing to let bygones be bygones but so far all we've had is radio silence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我们能让那个混蛋雷韦斯打开避难所的门。我们愿意让过去的事过去，但到目前为止，我们得到的只有无线电静默。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopper will find a way though. I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，霍珀会找到办法的。我确信这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F0_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDelacroixHolotapeThree
Doctor's log. August 10, 2079. We're not gonna last much longer. Parker and his cronies deserted us and took the radaway with them in the night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生的日志，2079年8月10日。我们撑不了多久了。帕克和他的亲信们抛弃了我们，并在夜里带走了辐特宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My years of medical experience have not helped one bit. I've never seen a condition like this. Skin is starting to fall off Valentine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我多年的医疗经验一点用都没有。我从没见过这种情况，瓦伦丁的皮肤开始脱落了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like his entire physiology is changing too. This is enough to write several papers on but honestly I have no idea what I'm looking at.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来他的整个生理机能也在改变。这足以写几篇论文，但说实话，我不知道我在看什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, gotta look on the bright side, don't you? I lived to see the end of the world, not many people can say the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，总得往好的方面想，不是吗？我活着看到了世界末日，没有多少人能说同样的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueDelacroix\aaFirewate_aaDelacroixHolo_000402F2_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23Briefing
Right. I think that's recording now. Welcome everyone to Vault 23. I know you're all probably worried after what just happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我想现在正在录音了。欢迎大家来到23号避难所，我知道你们可能都很担心刚刚发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. You're safe now. I think we should all give a round of applause for Mr Reeves for giving us this excellent opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，你现在安全了。我想我们都应该为雷韦斯先生鼓掌，感谢他给我们这次绝佳的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Down here, we won't just survive like in other Vaults but we'll thrive thanks to his genius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，我们不仅能像其他避难所一样生存下去，还能因为他的天才而茁壮成长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Audience claps*
ESP.TRADUIT: *听众鼓掌*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FB_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, it's about time we split into groups. Does everyone remember the number they were assigned?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是我们分组的时候了，大家还记得分配给自己的号码吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FB_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take the silence as a yes then. Go to your representative and they'll show you to your rooms. Thank you for your time everyone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就把你的沉默当作是同意了，去找你的代表，他们会带你去你的房间。谢谢大家的宝贵时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FB_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23McCallisterMovieNight
Don't worry it's just a security precaution. Security Chief Holloway tells me recording all meetings is mandatory from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，这只是安全防范措施。安全主任霍洛威告诉我，从现在开始，所有会议都必须录音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only people this'll affect are the criminals so you all have nothing to worry about. Anyway, back to the purpose of this meeting...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只会影响到罪犯所以你们不用担心。不管怎样，回到这次会议的目的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be thinking: "Molly, we can't be bothered with this meeting after everything that's happened: let us get on with our jobs".
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能在想："莫莉，在发生了这么多事之后，我们不能再为这个会议而烦恼了，让我们继续我们的工作吧。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right to raise concerns but don't worry the company has you covered. These type of nights are good for team bonding and relaxation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提出担忧是对的，但不要担心，公司会为你提供保障。这种类型的夜晚有利于团队团结和放松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FD_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus any who come along will be able to see movies from Mr Reeves' holotape collection. He's got the biggest Sci Fi collection I've ever seen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，任何前来的人都能看到雷韦斯先生收藏的全息录像带中的电影。他收藏的科幻作品是我见过最多的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FD_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why join the union when you're well looked after huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你被照顾得很好，为什么要加入工会呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FD_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23McCallisterWarBrokeOut
Reeves' security bots are bringing order back to the Vault. I just need to wait it all out. Everything will be back to normal tomorrow morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷韦斯的安全机器人正在将秩序带回避难所，我只需要等待这一切，明天早上一切都会恢复正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bots will know I've been loyal right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人会知道我一直很忠诚，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : McCallister [01040300] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueMollyMcCallister\aaVault23H_aaVault23McCall_000402FF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaGrayHolotapeOne
I may as well start to log my work as I go. Rachel says my memory is not what it used to be. I only left the oven on that one time...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不妨开始记录我的工作。瑞秋说我的记忆力大不如前了，我只有一次没关烤箱...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeO_00040309_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when she thinks she's right she usually is. I'll need to see Dr Delacroix about upping my medication sometime soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当她认为自己是对的的时候，她通常就是对的。我需要尽快找德拉克洛瓦医生让他给我加药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeO_00040309_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I started looking over the blueprints of this little bunker which happened to include the layout of this entire cave system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我开始查看这个小地堡的蓝图，其中碰巧包括整个洞穴系统的布局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeO_00040309_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might help find us another way into Reeves' little shelter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许能帮我们找到另一条进入雷韦斯小庇护所的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeO_00040309_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaGrayHolotapeTwo
After thoroughly looking through those plans, that place seems locked up tighter than Alcatraz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在仔细看了这些设计图之后，那个地方似乎被封锁得比恶魔岛还严。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeT_0004030B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also discovered that this place wasn't built up to standard. While the thickness of the lead is rarely a problem, the entire thing was a rush job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还发现，这个地方的建造并不达标。虽然铅的厚度很少有问题，但整个工作都是仓促完成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeT_0004030B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ventilation shafts have a very small gap that wasn't accounted for during the construction phase or maybe it just wasn't properly tested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通风井有一个非常小的缺口，这在施工阶段没有考虑到，或者可能只是没有经过适当的测试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeT_0004030B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The architect responsible is either incompetent or ignorant and, to be honest, I don't know which one is more damning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 负责的建筑师要么是无能，要么是无知，说实话，我不知道哪个更糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeT_0004030B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaGrayHolotapeThree
I hope the cash Vault Tec saved building this bunker was worth our lives down here. Delacroix says there's no more Radaway in the stockpile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望避难所科技建造这个地堡所省下的钱值得我们在这里付出生命，德拉克洛瓦说库存里没有辐特宁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeT_0004030D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry Rachel, looks like I'll be joining you up there sooner than I expected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，瑞秋，看来我会比我预想的更早加入你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([010402EA]aaFirewaterBunkerHolotapes) 010402EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueGray\aaFirewate_aaGrayHolotapeT_0004030D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23McWilliamsHolotapeOne
I had a chat with the Chief today about the noises we've heard in the middle of the night. I requisitioned some cameras from security.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我今天和主任聊了聊我们半夜听到的噪音，我从保安处申请了一些摄像头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_00040317_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn man, this is some super secret agency tech we have here. Ready to slide through the vents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死伙计，这是我们拥有的超级秘密机构的技术。准备从通风口悄悄过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_00040317_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reeves has requested that one of the engineers climbs in and places it. Going to have to tell my team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷韦斯要求其中一名工程师爬进去把它放好，我得告诉我的团队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_00040317_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23HardyHolotapeTwo
Fuck man, I have no idea how I'm going to break the news to his family. Brown plucked the shortest straw and had to go into those vents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，我不知道该如何向他的家人宣布这个消息。布朗抽到了最短的一根稻草，不得不进入那些通风口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_0004031B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We saw on his headcam that he fell into some sort of cave system. We got a few seconds of footage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从他的头部摄像头上看到他掉进了某个洞穴系统，我们有几秒钟的录像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_0004031B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were these giant eggs everywhere! Then out of nowhere this giant motherfucking ant came crawling out of the darkness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是这些巨大的卵！然后不知从哪儿冒出来一只巨大的蚂蚁，从黑暗中爬了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_0004031B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's where the footage stops. I'm going to ask security to spare his family the gory details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 录像就到此为止。我请安保人员不要让他的家人知道这些血淋淋的细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_0004031B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both Cooper and Reeves actually showed their faces to express their condolences to the team. Brown should never have been there. It's my fault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 库珀和雷韦斯都露出了脸，向团队表示哀悼。布朗本不应该在那里，这是我的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hardy [01040319] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHardy\aaVault23H_aaVault23HardyH_0004031B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHarteHolotapeOne
Engineer Jessica Hayes here... recording for what could be the last time. This is to keep the record straight on what happened down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是工程师杰西卡·哈耶斯...这可能是最后一次录音，这是为了把这里发生的事情记录下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040321_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reeves and his men have lost their fucking minds and started purging anyone they thought was linked to Cooper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷韦斯和他的手下已经疯了，开始清洗任何他们认为和库珀有关的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040321_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: His robot police force is on a seek and destroy mission. Not like it matters anyway, I'd rather die than work another minute for that parasite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的机器人警察部队正在执行寻找和摧毁任务。反正也不重要，我宁愿死也不愿再为那个寄生虫工作一分钟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040321_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll fight until the very last of us falls. Looks like we'll have to. The airlock has been sealed by the emergency protocol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将战斗到最后一人倒下。看来我们不得不这么做了，根据紧急协议气闸已经被封住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040321_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're running out of rounds. There's no way we can fight our way down to Reeves' office to remove the lockdown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们快没子弹了，不可能一路杀到雷韦斯的办公室去解除封锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040321_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, we're not kissing Reeves' boots anymore. We'll destroy those robots with our bare hands if we must...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们不会再亲吻雷韦斯的靴子了。如果有必要，我们会徒手摧毁那些机器人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040321_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23HarteHolotapeTwo
Hayes here. I'm not sure what's happened to Cooper. Davis saw Vault security take him from his dorm and ever since then he's nowhere to be found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是哈耶斯，我不知道库珀发生了什么。戴维斯看到避难所的保安把他从宿舍里带走了，从那时起，他就不知所踪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040323_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be that Reeves has overstepped the line trying to intimidate us into submission. Technically he can do whatever he wants down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是雷韦斯越界了，想恐吓我们让我们屈服。严格来说，他在这里想做什么就做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040323_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're not allowed to make our voices heard about something as simple as food rationing then what can we do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们都不能在食物配给这样简单的事情上发出自己的声音，那我们还能做什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hayes [01040324] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueHayes\aaVault23H_aaVault23HayesH_00040323_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23HollowayHolotapeOne
This is Security Chief Brian Holloway on the official opening day of Vault 23. Molly and HR did a real good job today handing out the Vault suits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是安全主任布里安·霍洛威，今天23号避难所正式开业。莫莉和人力资源部门今天在发放避难所连身衣方面做得非常好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm impressed at how quickly everyone fell in line after everything that's happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了这么多事，大家都这么快就同意了，真让我印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure there was a bit of panic and some crying here and there. I feel like we're all on the same page that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，有一点恐慌，到处都有人在哭。我觉得我们在这方面是一致的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, I expected a bit more trouble with a nuclear apocalypse and all. I'm not complaining though. Makes my job a hell of a lot easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我还是认为核灾难会带来更多麻烦。不过我并不是在抱怨，这样我的工作就轻松多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of which, I had a brief look at the stock of security supplies. Seems we're lacking in batons and security armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到这里，我简单地看了一下安保物资的库存。看来我们缺少警棍和防护装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reeves assures me that this is fine. He says that we have the ability to mass produce robots down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷韦斯向我保证这没问题，他说我们有能力在这里大规模生产机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: An automated police force. He's starting to make me feel useless in my old age...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一支自动化的警察部队，他开始让我觉得自己年老无用了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23HollowayHolotapeTwo
I wish Reeves would give me a damn minute. He even said himself that this situation needs to be handled delicately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望雷韦斯能给我一点时间，他自己也说过，这种情况需要谨慎处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no. He says it's been long enough and he wants me to take care of Cooper tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是没有。他说已经够久了，他想让我今晚搞定库珀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it were up to me, we'd just need to find some dirt on this guy, they've all got something they want to keep hidden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果由我来决定，我们只需要找到这家伙的黑料，他们都有不可告人的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess that plan is out the window. I'll go over there later tonight with a squad and persuade him to come quietly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这个计划泡汤了。我今晚晚些时候会带一队人去，说服他安静地来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_0004032F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23HollowayHolotapeThree
Holloway here. We've secured the hydroponics wing. All we need to do is hold this and the rest of the Vault will fall in line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是霍洛威，我们已经确保了水培侧厅的安全。我们需要做的就是守住这个，避难所的其他部分就会归位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_00040333_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without food, the rebels will have no option but to give into our demands. I'm going to inform Reeves of the news tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有食物，叛军将别无选择，只能屈从于我们的要求。我今晚要把这个消息告诉雷韦斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_00040333_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a great victory for the future of this Vault...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是避难所未来的伟大胜利...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holloway [01040331] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHolloway\aaVault23H_aaVault23Hollow_00040333_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. If you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你这么说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisSta_0004034C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea told me to give you this letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿让我把这封信交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhhh! Not so loud. The Followers don't take to kindly to that name. Give it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！别那么大声，天启追随者们不喜欢这个名字。给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_0004034E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Joan reads the letter.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <琼读信>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is great news! We'll try and get this distributed in the best way we can. With their bodyguards, the muggers shouldn't be much of a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是个好消息！我们会尽我们所能分发出去。有了保镖，抢劫犯应该不成问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_0004034E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won't forget this. Hosea can count on us in the future. Thank you for your kindness friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不会忘记的，未来何西阿可以依靠我们。谢谢你的好心朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_0004034E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should probably go get started making preparations unless... there's something else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该开始做准备了，除非...还有什么我能帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_0004034E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 160 1 setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 250 player.removeitem aaTheVulturesFreesideDelivery 1 CompleteQuest aaRTBTheVulturesQuest player.rewardxp 400 showmessage aaRTBModCompleteMsg
How do you know our mutual friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么认识我们共同的朋友？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and his friends like to help out the community however they can but there's some folks around here that doubt him still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他的朋友们喜欢尽他们所能帮助社区，但这里有些人仍然怀疑他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisHow_00040350_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those people don't know what they're talking about. He's kept my family's belly full on more occasions than I can count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些人根本不知道自己在说什么，他让我的家人吃饱饭的次数多得我都数不清了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisHow_00040350_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll help him in any way we can when the time comes. Now, do you want anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 时机成熟时，我们将尽一切努力帮助他。现在，你还需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisHow_00040350_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea told me to give you this letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿让我把这封信交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhhh! Not so loud. The Followers don't take to kindly to that name. Give it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！别那么大声，天启追随者们不喜欢这个名字。给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_00040352_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Joan reads the letter.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <琼读信>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't be serious with this. Is this some kind of sick joke? Wait. It's not is it? You can't just take away what you promised like this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会是认真的吧，这是什么无聊的玩笑吗？等等，不是吧？你不能就这样收回你的承诺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_00040352_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friends will be hearing about this. You hear me?! You tell him he won't be getting our support like he asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友们会知道的，你听到了吗？！你告诉他，我们不会像他要求的那样支持他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_00040352_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let him know about the bridge he's burned here today. If my family has to starve, so will his. Now get the hell out of my face. Leave me be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他知道他今天在这里毁了一座桥，如果我的家人要挨饿，他的家人也会。现在给我滚远点，别烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisGiv_00040352_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 162 1 setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 250 player.removeitem aaTheVulturesFreesideDelivery 1 CompleteQuest aaRTBTheVulturesQuest player.rewardxp 400 showmessage aaRTBModCompleteMsg
aaVault23ReevesHolotapeOne
Went to see the doc yesterday. He recommended I take as much rest as I can. He said excess stress could prolong the recovery period.
ESP.TRADUIT: 昨天去看医生了，他建议我尽可能多休息。他说，过度的压力可能会延长恢复期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_00040358_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told him there's a fat chance of me managing to avoid all the stressors of this damn vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟他说我根本不可能避开这个该死的避难所带来的所有压力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_00040358_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some days I wish I just went with the blast like everyone else but then I remember that the Lord blessed me and Anna.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，我希望我能像其他人一样随波逐流，但后来我想起上帝保佑了我和安娜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_00040358_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will keep this entire vault running for that bundle of joy in her belly. This place will be the future of humanity even if it kills me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让整个避难所为她肚子里的一束快乐而运转。这个地方将是人类的未来，即使它会杀死我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_00040358_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23ReevesHolotapeTwo
Our supplies of pre-war food have started to shrink. I'm glad to see that my push on the board for diversifying Poseidon's interests has paid off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的战前食品补给已经开始减少了。我很高兴看到我在董事会上推动的海神利益多元化已经得到了回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it weren't for those lights, we'd all be starving down here. It's a shame thinking of all the money we could've made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是那些灯，我们都要饿死了。想想我们本可以赚那么多钱，真是太可惜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter, this place is everything I pictured it to be. Makes me think I've died and went to heaven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，这地方就是我想象中的样子。让我觉得我已经死了，上了天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, only when I don't need to hear Cooper's shrill little voice complaining. What a blowhard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，只有当我不需要听到库珀尖锐的抱怨声时。真是个吹牛大王。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23ReevesHolotapeThree
We won but at what cost? We don't have much of a workforce left to tend to the crops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们赢了，但代价是什么呢？我们没有足够的劳动力来照料庄稼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd just be me, Anna and our child left along with what's left of the security team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就只剩下我，安娜和我们的孩子，还有剩下的安保人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't condemn a child to live an empty life in what's left of this hellhole. There's no fucking way I allow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会让一个孩子在这鬼地方过着空虚的生活的，我他妈绝不允许。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's only one thing left to do here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里只剩下一件事要做了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reeves [0104035A] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueReevesVoiceType\aaVault23H_aaVault23Reeves_0004035E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23
Marchesi here. We're pinned down in the diner! Don't worry I've got a plan. I've told the others not to worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是马凯西，我们被困在餐厅里了！别担心，我有个计划，我已经告诉其他人不用担心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_00040366_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this goes wrong, let this be a record of what happened here. Reeves is a monster and has us working our asses off for scraps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果出了问题，就把这里发生的事记录下来。雷韦斯是个怪物，让我们拼命干活，只为了吃残羹剩饭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_00040366_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it goes right, he'll learn why you should never fuck with a marine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果进展顺利，他就会明白为什么不能和海军陆战队员乱来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_00040366_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVault23MarchesiHolotapeTwo
These fucking ants man! They won't stop coming! The others, I boosted up to safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些该死的蚂蚁，伙计！它们不停的来！我把其他人托到了安全的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_0004036A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Hayes can open the Vault door they can escape to the bunker above. I'm hoping at least some of us can get away from those killer bots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果哈耶斯能打开避难所的门，他们就能逃到上面的地堡里。我希望我们中至少有人能摆脱那些杀人机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_0004036A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marchesi signing off. Semper Fi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马凯西完毕，永远忠诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_0004036A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMarchesiHolotapeThree
Marchesi here. Can't say I'm hating my first few days here. Beats sweeping for mines on Anchorage praying I didn't get frostbite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是马凯西。我不能说我讨厌刚来的这几天，比在安克雷奇扫雷还得祈祷不被冻伤强多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_0004036C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giulia and the kids seem fairly happy. They do complain about the food though. I keep hearing about how different the corn tastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 茱莉亚和孩子们看起来很开心，不过他们确实对食物有意见。我一直听人说玉米的味道很不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_0004036C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It honestly isn't so bad. Next time I hear them whining I'm gonna tell them about the MREs we used to get. They'll want to vomit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，这并没有那么糟。下次再听到他们抱怨，我就告诉他们我们以前吃的军用口粮，他们会想吐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marchesi [01040368] (mod) Quest : ([010402F9]aaVault23Holotapes) 010402F9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueMarchesi\aaVault23H_aaVault23Marche_0004036C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是哪里人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean my accent? Yeah me and my family aren't from here. We're from a place which I think you Americans call England.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说我的口音？对，我和我的家人都不是本地人，我们来自一个你们美国人称之为英格兰的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhe_0004038A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's not much of an England left I'm afraid. Me and my husband escaped all the fighting on a ship owned by a man called Tenpenny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕英格兰已经所剩无几了。我和我丈夫在一艘船上躲过了所有的战争，这艘船的主人是一个叫特佩尼的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhe_0004038A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue.hasAskedWhereJoanIsFrom to 1
How did you get to New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么来到新维加斯的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Working on the ship kept us in work for a while. My husband had some experience with construction and me in security.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在船上工作了一段时间，我丈夫有建筑方面的经验，我有安全方面的经验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhy_0004038C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So once we docked, Tenpenny had plenty of work for us in helping renovate some old tower in the capital.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我们一靠岸，特佩尼就给我们安排了很多工作，帮助翻修首都的一些旧塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhy_0004038C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But eventually, Tenpenny had to let us go. We weren't the clientele he was looking for. His words, not ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但最终，特佩尼不得不让我们离开。我们不是他要找的客户群，这是他的原话，不是我们说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhy_0004038C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we've been on the move ever since. We kind of like it here despite the current circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以从那以后我们就一直在搬家。尽管目前情况如此，我们还是挺喜欢这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhy_0004038C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea and his kind are helping make this place better. Just wait and see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿和他的同类正在让这个地方变得更好，拭目以待吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joan Harris [01040344] (mod) Quest : ([01040348]aaRTBJoanHarrisDialogue) 01040348 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJoanHarris\aaRTBJoanH_aaJoanHarrisWhy_0004038C_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the pocket watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有那块怀表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh have you? That's great news! The little one will be so glad. Thank you so much for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢你有吗？这是个好消息！小家伙会很高兴的。非常感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: About the meeting I promised. I'll send a letter to my contact. Hosea should meet you if I put in a good word with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我承诺的会面，我会写信给我的联系人。如果我替你美言几句，何西阿应该会见你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The meeting place should be in one of the rooms on the second floor of The Gray in North Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会面地点应该是在北维加斯灰楼二层的一个房间里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea and Crandon came to an agreement that The Vultures could stay there for their help defending the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿和克兰登达成了协议，秃鹫可以留在那里，帮助他们保卫小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and convince Hosea to turn himself in or at least stop the attacks. This doesn't have to end in violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着说服何西阿自首或者至少停止袭击，这事没必要以暴力收场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it does then it will be the people of North Vegas who'll be caught in the crossfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果真的发生了，那么北维加斯的人民将会被卷入战火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I can't decide for you but at the very least think on my words stranger. Good luck. Now is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我不能替你决定，但至少想想我的话，陌生人，祝你好运。还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000403AD_7.wav

Pantry Of Democracy
ESP.TRADUIT: 储藏室民主

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out where Frank Adams may have gone. Rumour has it, Billy Jackson had spoken to him in the Atomic Wrangler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找出弗兰克·亚当斯可能的去向。有传言说，比利·杰克逊曾在原子牛仔与他交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adams has been using the El Rey Motel as a base of operations. Search the area for clues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当斯一直在使用埃尔·雷汽车旅馆作为行动基地。在这个区域寻找线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Remove Frank Adam's tab from Francine Garret's journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)把弗兰克·亚当斯的账单从弗朗辛·加雷特的日记里删掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Return to Billy Jackson with the news that the tab has been removed.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)回去告诉比利·杰克逊，账单已经被删掉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Talk to Fitz about the kidnapping of Adams.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)跟费茨聊聊亚当斯被绑架的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate McGill's Steelworks for clues regarding Frank Adams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查麦克吉尔炼钢厂，寻找有关弗兰克·亚当斯的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ella Hawthorne with the holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着全息磁带回去找艾拉·霍桑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Learn what Jackie knows about The Vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打探杰姬对于秃鹫的了解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obtain the pocket watch from The Scorpions in the Monte Carlo Suites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从蒙特卡罗套房的毒蝎帮那里得到怀表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return the watch to Jackie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把表还给杰姬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Ella that you've got a meeting set up with Hosea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉艾拉，你已经安排好了与何西阿的会面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick up the holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿起那盘全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bear Strikes Back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊的反击！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet Hosea and earn the the trust of him and The Vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去见何西阿，赢得他和秃鹫的信任。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The meeting did not go as planned. Kill Hosea while you have the chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会面没有按计划进行。趁你还有机会杀了何西阿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson at Camp Golf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到高尔夫营地的游骑兵威尔逊那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to Firewater Cave and eliminate The Vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往烈酒洞穴，消灭秃鹫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson at Camp Golf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到高尔夫营地的游骑兵威尔逊那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to Firewater Cave and eliminate The Vultures and Hosea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往烈酒洞穴，消灭秃鹫和何西阿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson at Camp Golf and inform her of your success.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到高尔夫营地的游骑兵威尔逊那里，报告你的成功。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson and inform her of your success.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到游骑兵威尔逊那里，报告你的成功。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet Jack Hawthorne at the Gourmand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与杰克·霍桑在老饕餐厅见面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed Hosea, eliminate the rest of the Vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了何西阿，消灭了其余的秃鹫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson at Camp Golf and tell her about Hosea's new task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到高尔夫营地的游骑兵威尔逊那里，告诉她何西阿的新任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Complete Hosea's task and wait for the Ranger intervention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成何西阿的任务，等待游骑兵的介入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the situation in favour of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 处理有利于NCR的局势。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson and tell her about Hosea's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到游骑兵威尔逊那里，告诉她何西阿的死讯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ranger Wilson and tell her about Hosea's surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到游骑兵威尔逊那里，告诉她何西阿投降的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Hosea and The Vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死何西阿和秃鹫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Jack Hawthorne at the Ultra Luxe casino on The Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在长街的奢华殿堂赌场与杰克·霍桑交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Tell Ranger Wilson that The Vultures want an NCR caravan schedule to prove your loyalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)告诉游骑兵威尔逊秃鹫组织想要一个NCR商队的日程表，以证明你的忠诚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Race To The Bottom
ESP.TRADUIT: 逐底竞争

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go meet Hosea at The Gray in North Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去北维加斯的灰楼见何西阿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sit on the chair next to Hosea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐在何西阿旁边的椅子上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go and meet the other new recruit at the El Rey Motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去埃尔·雷汽车旅馆和其他新兵见面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the NCR Caravan schedule from the Sharecropper Farms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从佃农农场获取NCR商队的日程表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return the schedule to Frank Adams at the El Rey Motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将日程表交还给埃尔·雷汽车旅馆的弗兰克·亚当斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to The Vultures' base at Firewater Cave and tell Hosea you've completed the initiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去烈酒洞穴的秃鹫基地，告诉何西阿你已经完成了入会仪式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea has an important job. Talk to him when ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何西阿有一项重要的工作，准备好了就和他谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Explore Firewater Bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 探索烈酒地堡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Change the power mode from emergency to normal in Firewater Bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将烈酒地堡的电源模式从紧急改为正常模式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Explore the upper floors of Firewater Bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 探索烈酒地堡的上层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Hosea with news of your discovery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找何西阿，告诉他你的发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open the Vault 23 gear door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开23号避难所的齿轮门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out what happened to the residents of Vault 23.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解23号避难所居民的遭遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Hosea with the archived hydroponic lighting plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着归档的水培照明设计图回去找何西阿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the situation in favour of The Vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 处理对秃鹫有利的局面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Wilson has been killed. Return to Hosea and let him know the news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵威尔逊已经被杀。回去找何西阿，让他知道这个消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Wilson has been persuaded to leave. Return to Hosea and let him know the news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵威尔逊已被劝说离开了。回去找何西阿，让他知道这个消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Ranger Wilson and the NCR troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死游骑兵威尔逊和NCR的士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deliver the good news of The Vultures' food delivery to Joan Harris in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把秃鹫食品递送的好消息传达给自由城的琼·哈里斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Hosea with the news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着这个消息回去找何西阿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deliver the bad news of The Vultures' food delivery to Joan Harris in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把秃鹫食品递送的坏消息传达给自由城的琼·哈里斯。
