The Hawthorne Husbandary
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍桑畜牧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Visit the Freeside Coop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 访问自由城合作社。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This journal contains all the debts owed to the Garret twins over the past several years. The book contains pages and pages of old debts to the point where a missing entry or two would not be missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本日记包含了过去几年中欠加雷特双胞胎的所有债务。这本书包含了几页几页的旧债，以至于缺少一两个条目都不会被遗漏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Garret Twins Transaction Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 加雷特双胞胎交易日志

ESP.ORIGINAL: Modify entry for a debt of 254 caps owed by a Billy Jackson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修改比利·杰克逊欠下的254瓶盖的债务条目。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the journal alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管这本日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman's body lies on the floor on the motel room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该女子的尸体躺在汽车旅馆房间的地板上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate dead body
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查死尸

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the woman's head and face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查该女子的头部和面部。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the woman's head and face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查该女子的头部和面部。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the torso.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查躯体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the woman's pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查该女子的口袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the woman's pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查该女子的口袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the boots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查靴子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the boots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查靴子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the body alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You examine the head of the victim and her face looks messed up. It looks like she got hit really hard, enough for the damage to be fatal. Other than that you fail to find anything of note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了受害者的头部，她的脸看起来一团糟。看起来她被打得很重，足以致命。除此之外，你找不到任何值得注意的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You investigate the head and face,,,
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了头部和面部...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Using your knowledge of medicine you first examine the head of the victim. There is severe bruising on the right cheek which could have been caused by fists, a gun butt or some other blunt instrument. It is difficult to tell but it looks like the victim's skull has been fractured as a result of the damage. Using your knowledge of blood splatters, it is fair to say that the perpetrator was injured too in the struggle. Whether they were hurt by the dead woman in front of you or by others; it is difficult to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 运用你的医学知识，你首先要检查受害者的头部。右脸颊有严重的瘀伤，可能是由拳头、枪托或其他钝器造成的。虽然很难辨认，但看起来受害者的头骨已经因为损伤而断裂了。根据你对血溅的了解，可以说行凶者在打斗中也受了伤。他们是被你面前死去的女人伤害的，还是被其他人伤害的，这很难说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You investigate the head and face...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了头部和面部...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You examine the woman's torso. There doesn't seem to be anything out of the ordinary. The brahmin skin outfit is relatively unremarkable. It looks like she owned the outfit for several years as it is showing signs of wear and tear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了这个女人的躯干，看起来没有任何异常。婆罗门皮服装相对来说并不引人注目，看起来这身衣服她已经拥有好几年了，因为它有磨损的迹象。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You investigate the torso
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了躯干...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You search the victim's pockets for any clues of what might have transpired in this room. Inside the pockets is nothing of note. Regardless, you find some caps in her pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搜查受害者的口袋寻找房间里可能发生事件的任何线索，口袋里没有什么值得注意的东西。不管怎样，你在她口袋里发现了一些瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You search the pockets...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搜查了口袋...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You examine the victim's pockets in an attempt to find any information on what might have transpired here. Unfortunately, the woman's pockets are empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了受害者的口袋试图找到任何关于这里发生的事情的信息。不幸的是，这位女士的口袋是空的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You search the pockets...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搜查了口袋...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take a look at the victim's boots. The toe caps are made out of steel which is typical of a working boot. This particular set seems to have went through a lot of wear and tear from use over the years. Your keen eyes notice some steel shavings stuck in the soles of the boots. You guess that this woman was in a steel factory at some point not too long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看了看死者的靴子。鞋头由钢制成，这是典型的工作靴，这一套似乎因为多年的使用而磨损得很厉害。你敏锐的眼睛注意到一些钢屑卡在靴子的鞋底，你猜这个女人不久前曾在一家钢铁厂工作过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You search the boots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搜索了靴子...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You examine the victim's boots in an attempt to gather more information. You notice that she is wearing a set of steel toe-capped boots. They look very uncomfortable. You fail to find anything of note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你检查了受害者的靴子，试图收集更多信息。你注意到她穿的是一套钢制鞋头的靴子，看起来很不舒服。你没有发现任何值得注意的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You investigate the boots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你调查了靴子...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Examine the rest of the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查身体的其他部位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear someone or something enter the mill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到有人或什么东西进入了工厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到了什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator does not seem to be working. You could probably pop open the nearby panel and tinker with it to get the elevator working.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电梯似乎无法运转。你也许可以打开旁边的面板，做一些小修理，让电梯运作起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the elevator alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repair the elevator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修复电梯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator does not seem to be working. If you had more experience with fixing machinery, you could probably get it working. (Repair 50 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 电梯似乎没有在工作。如果你对修理机械有更多的经验，也许可以让它运作起来。 （需要50以上修理。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the elevator alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator door opens without a hitch. Buttons corresponding to the different levels of the vault glow faintly along the wall. Which one do you press?
ESP.TRADUIT: 电梯门流畅地打开了。墙上代表避难所不同楼层的按钮正微微发光。你要按哪一个？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the elevator alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管它。

ESP.TRADUIT: 一楼 - 入口

ESP.TRADUIT: 第二层 - 生活区

ESP.TRADUIT: 第三层 - 娱乐和水培

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, thank you for playing Fallout: New Vegas - Race To The Bottom. This mod was a passion project of mine where I wanted to capture everything I liked from this game from its narrative themes to its design philosophy. I'd like to give enormous credit to the voice acting team I slowly assembled over the last year for doing such a phenomenal job. It was a pleasure. Also, big thanks to the mod creator Aurora Whitfield for creating assets and being such a great help!
Finally, I'd like to thank you the player for showing interest and I hope you enjoyed. If so, please leave feedback along with an endorsement on the mod page!
I recommend playing through this mod again with a different set of choices on a second or third playthrough if you enjoyed it. There are multiple endings so I hope you enjoy!
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，感谢你游玩《辐射:新维加斯 - 逐底竞争》。这个mod是我的一个充满激情的项目，我想从游戏中捕捉我喜欢的一切，从它的叙事主题到它的设计哲学。我想要感谢我在过去一年里慢慢组建的配音团队，他们做出了如此出色的工作。很高兴见到你们。此外，非常感谢mod创造者Aurora Whitfield创建的资产和如此大的帮助！
最后，我想感谢玩家表现出的兴趣，希望你们喜欢。如果是这样，请在mod页面留下反馈连同认可！
如果你喜欢这个mod，我建议你在第二次或第三次通关时选择不同的模式。有多种结局，希望你喜欢！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for playing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的游玩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have heard rumblings of a new store opening in Freeside called The Freeside Co-op supposedly selling farming produce at a reasonable price. You have heard rumours that this indeed could be the hub of grub.
